programme.title: Affordable Gadgets And Cheap Hacks!
programme.desc: Discover a collection of cheap, everyday gadgets that are perfect for enhancing your daily life, along with some fun random hacks and popular internet tricks—all for under $5! Perfect for budget-conscious tech lovers looking for practical solutions.

programme.title: Handyman’s Secret Tool Hacks And Repair Tips!

programme.title: Fix Anything in Your House with Minimal Cost
programme.desc: Learn how to tackle home repairs efficiently and affordably, with budget-friendly tips that anyone can use.

programme.title: Wild Bavaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Wild Bavaria - In The Shadow of the Watzmann.
programme.desc: Mighty and mysterious, King Watzmann sits above Germanys only alpine national park.

programme.title: Lions On The Move
programme.desc: Kevin Richardson shares an extraordinary bond with Africa’s most fearsome predators. Together with them, he has experienced some real adventures. However, transporting 27 lions and 14 hyenas to a new home presents a different challenge.The lions new home will be a sanctuary on the edge of Dinokeng, a South African game reserve spanning 18,000 square metres. The huge task ahead includes planning and designing the new enclosures, and securing permits to move the animals.

programme.title: Lions On The Move
programme.desc: Not only are the animals regularly rotated into new enclosures to prevent repetitive behaviour developing out of boredom, but Kevin also has to practice loading them in and out of the van. Can the reluctant lions and hyenas eventually be persuaded to get on board with the move?

programme.title: Elephants: Back to the Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Elephants: Back to the Wild: The Orphanage of Elephants - Nairobi Nationalpark
programme.desc: We follow the rescue of a baby elephant. Once rescued, it will be transported by plane to the breeding station and raised with love and commitment. In order to satisfy the little pachyderm’s urge to move while in the breeding station, there is sometimes an adorable football match between the animals.

programme.title: Elephants: Back to the Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Elephants: Back to the Wild: The Return of the Elephants - Tsavo-East-Nationalpark
programme.desc: We accompany the first steps of a two-year-old elephant who is just starting his release program. We also observe the story of two young elephants in their first night in the wilderness on their own. Captivating film footage allows us to truly learn how elephants behave in the wild.

programme.title: The Cape of Wild Animals, Episode 5
programme.desc: The movie focuses on committed animal rights activists, who fight for the lives of their charges every day, in diverse protection projects and rescue centres along the South African Garden Route.

programme.title: White Lions: Born Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 White Lions: Born Wild - Episode 1: Against all Odds
programme.desc: The two sisters are born as white as snow in May 2009 in South Africa’s Kruger Park. Growing up in this vast, wild wilderness they must not only overcome the same survival challenges that all young lion cubs face, they must also overcome the threats their high visibility brings. In the African bush, anything unusual stands out and is often eliminated by eagle-eyed predators. Will our cubs survive? The odds are stacked against them – 80 percent of all newborn lion cubs don’t make it to adulthood.

programme.title: White Lions: Born Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 White Lions: Born Wild - Episode 2: Fight for Survival
programme.desc: ‘White Lions – Born Wild’ is a true wildlife story, with strong characters and closely studied behaviour. We follow the cubs’ progress as they embark on the pathway to adulthood, learning to hunt, learning to avoid danger, learning to live in their white coats. This is a strong behaviour-led film, a coming-of-age story of a very rare and unusual pair of lions. Through their eyes, we learn what it is really like to be a lion in Africa.

programme.title: Dust And Stripes
programme.desc: In a never-ending quest for grass and water, the striped herds undertake an annual epic trek across the vast lunar landscape of the Kalahari’s Makgadikgadi Pans. Most of the year, the Makgadikgadi is an inhospitable wasteland of windswept, salt-encrusted pans. For the area’s water-dependent zebra, the Boteti River on the western edge of the pans is a dry-season lifeline. However, it is also a death trap, with lions waiting in ambush and crocodiles lurking in dark riverside caves.

programme.title: Masai Mara: The Big Hunt
programme.desc: When food supply in the Serengeti dwindles, the Masai Mara is a paradise for predators. As the black wildebeests, gazelles, zebras and antelopes make their yearly trip from the south of the Serengeti to the north, nature’s best laid trap, the Mara River in Kenya is waiting ahead. Captivating shots filmed under water show how crocodiles prepare for the Big Hunt while other predators lurk on the banks awaiting their bounty. The biggest problems for the migratory animals are the Mara and the Tarek River, where they have to put their lives at risk to get to the other side. A great number of them die as they jump into the river and break their legs, while others are carried away by the drift...

programme.title: Close up with Hippos
programme.desc: This nature documentary shows the many different sides of the Hippo’s lives on one September day in two iconic African locations: the Masai Mara-Nationalpark in Kenya, also the setting for the largest annual animal migration on the planet – one and a half million wildebeests and zebras migrate from the Serengeti to Kenya during this time.

programme.title: Strandwolf
programme.desc: She moves through the seal colony on Namibia’s wild Skeleton Coast with purpose and focus, gingerly stepping around the adults who snap at her heels. She’s searching for smaller prey. Following her is a young German field scientist, Ingrid Wiesel, who has now spent 17 years with Tosca’s clan; tracking, observing, and learning everything she can about one of the world’s least understood and most unusual predators.

programme.title: The Dying King
programme.desc: In the open wilderness of Africa, there are only 20.000 lions living a free life. In the last decade, humans have killed hundreds of thousands– mostly for purely hunting purposes. In the last couple of years, a new industry has developed called the canned hunting, where animals are bred for 4-5 years then released into a confined area. This confined area is created for the sole purpose optimizing the odds of the hunter obtaining a kill. The corpse of the dead, often male, lion is thereby treated as a trophy. Tourists pay up to 40, 000 USD for this privilege.

programme.title: The Incredible Five - A Cheetahs Tale
programme.desc: Cheetahs are the high-speed hunters of the Savannah. Few attempt to take on larger prey than gazelles or smallish antelopes. But on occasion, the predatory cats reveal their surprisingly different side. In the Northern Serengeti, a group of male cheetahs emerges and turns all we know about them upside down. Males are usually loners or live in small groups, but here we have five tomcats hunting together as one. It is actually, the largest alliance of the animals ever seen! This film has many stories to tell about the sleek hunters.

programme.title: The Original Fight Club: Animal Fights Caught on Camera
programme.desc: There are many reasons for animals to fight and each have their own weapons and rules of combat. They rarely fight without good reason: usually to defend a patch, secure a meal or to attract a mate. With so many reasons for warfare, life can be a never ending battle – for all creatures no matter how great or small, life is a struggle – but they endure – perhaps because there is a fighter in us all …

programme.title: Lions On The Move

However, transporting 27 lions and 14 hyenas to a new home presents a different challenge.The lions new home will be a sanctuary on the edge of Dinokeng, a South African game reserve spanning 18,000 square metres. A great number of them die as they jump into the river and break their legs, while others are carried away by the drift...

programme.title: mareTV: In Alaskas Fjord World
programme.desc: Gigantic fjords and over 5,000 small islands: In Alaskas south theres a lot of wilderness and little civilization. The region between the capital Juneau and the Canadian border is also known by locals as the "Last Frontier", the last outpost. Michelle Masden, for example, has come to terms with the harsh conditions here. She is the only seaplane pilot in the region. She earns her living with her 65-year-old Beaver: as an air taxi, transport plane and now and then as a rescuer in last necessity. Michelle flies anything and everything: spare parts and food, doctors, hikers and hunters. For the fishermen of southern Alaska she searches for large shoals of fish and guides the captains to...

programme.title: mareTV: Newfoundland - Canadas Eastern Point
programme.desc: In Newfoundland, at the easternmost tip of North America, the landscape is pristine, dramatic, and very sparsely populated. In summer, icebergs occasionally drift along the steep cliffs. When the "Titanic" collided with an iceberg and sank just 300 miles off the coast of Newfoundland in 1912, the last radio messages were picked up in a small wooden hut on the Avalon Peninsula. Today, most Newfoundlanders live on Avalon. There are particularly many seabirds here. In Witless Bay, the newborn puffins are ready for their first descent into the Atlantic. But some stray onto the coastal road, attracted by the lights of the hotels and restaurants. In doing so, they run the risk of being run...

programme.title: mareTV: Peru - Coast of the Incas
programme.desc: Dramatically, the coast plunges into the sea, the so-called Costa of Peru is a gigantic desert on the Pacific Ocean, 2,400 kilometers long. Rugged, bizarre, like from another star. Ancient cultures settled here, the Moche and the Chimú. Later the proud Inca, the self-proclaimed royal people of the Andes, ruled. In the small town of Huanchaco in northern Peru, the fishermen build a new boat every month: from reed. The small ships are called Caballito de Totora (reed horses), because the shape is reminiscent of a horse and the fishermen ride in it kneeling in the waves. About 2,000 years ago, the moche used it to go out to sea. Carlos Segura Azola is a descendant of the moche. He is...

programme.title: mareTV: Mexicos Caribbean Coast
programme.desc: The palm tree laden beaches on Mexicos Riviera Maya on the Yucatan peninsula are endless, and the turquoise sea with its gentle Caribbean surf is a warm 25 degrees during the mild winter in this part of the world. Between Cancún and Punta Allen, where once there was little more than bushland and a few sleepy fishing villages, vibrant life has evolved during the past three decades. Richard Sowa has lived on a floating island for the past 15 years: an island he built himself out of empty plastic bottles. The bon vivant him-self sees it as a "solution for our planets refuse problem". Off Punta Allen, a village in the bay of Sian Kaan, Mexican Mara Coral Ley and her cousin Kim, continue to...

programme.title: mareTV: The Caribbean for explorers: St. Vincent and the Grenadines
programme.desc: Much more Caribbean than on the islands of St. Vincent and the Grenadines is hardly possible. Deserted beaches, uninhabited islands, lush vegetation, the 33 islands in total are dreamlike with extremely hospitable inhabitants. Miranda Phillips runs a laundry and water boat on Bequia. Every morning, the 32-year-old navigates from yacht to yacht with her small bright green service vehicle and is already expected by most skippers. Miranda promises radiantly fresh laundry, which she delivers again the same day. And so there is always something going on in her tiny laundrette in the harbour. It turns into a karaoke bar in the evening, because that is Mirandas great passion. Eban Olliver has...

programme.title: Caribbean sisters: The Lesser Antilles St. Kitts and Nevis
programme.desc: In the centre of the Caribbean, volcanoes rise steeply from the sea, thus shaping the sister islands of St. Kitts and Nevis. Their slopes, covered in lush rainforests, snow-white, sandy beaches and the surrounding tur-quoise tinted waters provide the ultimate setting for this record-breaking, albeit tiny island paradise: Both islets are the smallest of the Caribbean dwarf states and also rank among the world’s ten smallest states. A hot pepper sauce, made of a creative mixture of ginger, garlic, thyme and extraordinarily hot chillies that thrive in the hot and humid climate of Nevis, is simmering on the stove of Violet and Llewellyn’s house. Lemmy Pemberton digs up abandoned turtle nests...

programme.title: Cuba to Go
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Cuba to Go - Episode 1
programme.desc: Ever since the embargo was lifted in the summer of 2015, Cuba’s popularity has been steadily increasing.

programme.title: Cuba to Go
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Cuba to Go - Episode 2
programme.desc: Ever since the embargo was lifted in the summer of 2015, Cuba’s popularity has been steadily increasing.

programme.title: Cuba - Brilliantly Caribbean
programme.desc: Even anyone who has not yet been to Cuba can conjure up certain images of American vintage street cruisers, imposing buildings that have seen better days, white sandy beaches full of palms and loving couples on the Malecon against a backdrop of crashing waves. This island is somewhat of a myth and its people generate a special joie de vivre. The legendary Hershey Train departs for Matanzas from the capital, Havana. On the oldest electrified railway line in the Caribbean, 60-year-old Spanish carriages make their way along al-most 100 kilometres of coastline in the most relaxed way possible. The Salvavidas on Varadero, probably the most famous beach on the island, have a particular-ly...

programme.title: mareTV: Martinique
programme.desc: The island of Martinique is a piece of France in the Caribbean, between Florida and South America. And of course, Savoir-vivre applies just as it does on the other side of the Atlantic, between the English Channel and the Mediterranean. Jacky Pascault is the first and only man to cultivate mushrooms in the Caribbean. Everywhere else, they grow on artificially fertilised soil, but Jackys Champignons Tropicaux flourish on sugar cane fibres. Nicole Vilo tailors hats and dresses out of coconut palms. Of course, the catwalk for the models wearing her first collection is one of the countless dream beaches. The Martiniquais sail on boats they call Yole, which have no keel and are therefore...

programme.title: mareTV: Curacao, Blue Wonder of the Caribbean
programme.desc: Curacao is one of the most popular attractions for countless cruise ships on their trips through the Caribbean, because it is located outside of the hurricane belt. This is why Eric Miguel is constantly in action. He is the bridge keeper of the Queen Emma Bridge, the landmark of Curacaos capital, Willemstad. After his shift, Eric goes to Yvonne Troemans cook-shop. Her speciality is Kadushi, a cactus soup. The ingredients include cactus flesh, pigtails, mussels and a few secret "treats". Barbara van Bebber is the only submarine pilot on Curacao and literally gets to the bottom of things amidst the turquoise-blue wonder of the Caribbean. She charters out her sub to marine biologists and...

programme.title: mareTV: Madeira - Portugals sea of blossoms in the Atlantic Ocean
programme.desc: Flower magic in Madeira: The Flower Festival Festa da Flor is the most important event of the year for the people of the Atlantic island. With it they celebrate spring, which is climatically practically all year round here, their island and themselves. The coast formed by lava, centuries-old laurel forests and green steep slopes make Madeira unique. Those who start right at the front of the big parade of the flower festival in the capital Funchal, will have made it. For Isabel Borges this dream has come true. She opens this years flower parade along the harbour promenade with her festive group. This accolade does not only mean fame and prestige, but also a lot of pressure. Are the...

programme.title: mareTV: Tenerife - The Queen of the Canaries
programme.desc: Tenerife is outstanding among the Canary Islands. If only because of the volcano Pico del Teide, which rises exactly 3.718 meters above sea level and is thus the highest mountain in Spain. But not only scenically Tenerife, the largest of the Canary Islands, stands out...

programme.title: Fuerteventura: The golden beauty of the Canaries
programme.desc: Fuerteventura, the second largest of the Canary Islands, is located just 120 kilometres off the coast of West Africa. The climate is extremely dry and the struggle for water has always been a major setback. Then, around a century ago, returning US emigrants brought what were then modern wind turbine water pumps from the Aermotor Windmill Company with them to Fuerte-ventura. Today, the environmentally friendly and so-called “Chicago’s”, experience a renaissance. Unfortu-nately, original spare parts in good condition are diffi-cult to come by. When Leocadio Araya Sanchez began planting countless cacti on a barren hillside a few years ago, people thought he was mad. His idea was to make a...

programme.title: Dream Islands of Europe: Lanzarote and Fuerteventura
programme.desc: The film presents the two Canary Islands Lanzarote and Fuerteventura. Lanzarote has a rich culture in addition to a volcanic landscape: the film accompanies a ceramic artist, an instrument maker, shows architecture by Cesar Manrique and a camel breeder. On Fuerteventura, in addition to livestock farming and the operation of traditional grain mills, nature conservation plays a major role: islanders are committed to preserving the sand dunes, and there is a turtle hatchery. On Lanzarote, countless volcanic eruptions have formed a bizarre lunar landscape. It is a great challenge for the inhabitants to extract the cultivation of food from the karstic, dry soil. And yet they even manage to...

programme.title: mareTV: The Caribbean for explorers: St. Vincent and the Grenadines
programme.desc: Much more Caribbean than on the islands of St. Vincent and the Grenadines is hardly possible. Deserted beaches, uninhabited islands, lush vegetation, the 33 islands in total are dreamlike with extremely hospitable inhabitants. Miranda Phillips runs a laundry and water boat on Bequia. Every morning, the 32-year-old navigates from yacht to yacht with her small bright green service vehicle and is already expected by most skippers. Miranda promises radiantly fresh laundry, which she delivers again the same day. And so there is always something going on in her tiny laundrette in the harbour. It turns into a karaoke bar in the evening, because that is Mirandas great passion. Eban Olliver has...

programme.title: Caribbean sisters: The Lesser Antilles St. Kitts and Nevis
programme.desc: In the centre of the Caribbean, volcanoes rise steeply from the sea, thus shaping the sister islands of St. Kitts and Nevis. Their slopes, covered in lush rainforests, snow-white, sandy beaches and the surrounding tur-quoise tinted waters provide the ultimate setting for this record-breaking, albeit tiny island paradise: Both islets are the smallest of the Caribbean dwarf states and also rank among the world’s ten smallest states. A hot pepper sauce, made of a creative mixture of ginger, garlic, thyme and extraordinarily hot chillies that thrive in the hot and humid climate of Nevis, is simmering on the stove of Violet and Llewellyn’s house. Lemmy Pemberton digs up abandoned turtle nests...

programme.title: Cuba to Go
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Cuba to Go - Episode 1
programme.desc: Ever since the embargo was lifted in the summer of 2015, Cuba’s popularity has been steadily increasing.

programme.title: Cuba to Go
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Cuba to Go - Episode 2
programme.desc: Ever since the embargo was lifted in the summer of 2015, Cuba’s popularity has been steadily increasing.

programme.title: Cuba - Brilliantly Caribbean
programme.desc: Even anyone who has not yet been to Cuba can conjure up certain images of American vintage street cruisers, imposing buildings that have seen better days, white sandy beaches full of palms and loving couples on the Malecon against a backdrop of crashing waves. This island is somewhat of a myth and its people generate a special joie de vivre. The legendary Hershey Train departs for Matanzas from the capital, Havana. On the oldest electrified railway line in the Caribbean, 60-year-old Spanish carriages make their way along al-most 100 kilometres of coastline in the most relaxed way possible. The Salvavidas on Varadero, probably the most famous beach on the island, have a particular-ly...

programme.title: mareTV: Martinique
programme.desc: The island of Martinique is a piece of France in the Caribbean, between Florida and South America. And of course, Savoir-vivre applies just as it does on the other side of the Atlantic, between the English Channel and the Mediterranean. Jacky Pascault is the first and only man to cultivate mushrooms in the Caribbean. Everywhere else, they grow on artificially fertilised soil, but Jackys Champignons Tropicaux flourish on sugar cane fibres. Nicole Vilo tailors hats and dresses out of coconut palms. Of course, the catwalk for the models wearing her first collection is one of the countless dream beaches. The Martiniquais sail on boats they call Yole, which have no keel and are therefore...

programme.title: mareTV: Curacao, Blue Wonder of the Caribbean
programme.desc: Curacao is one of the most popular attractions for countless cruise ships on their trips through the Caribbean, because it is located outside of the hurricane belt. This is why Eric Miguel is constantly in action. He is the bridge keeper of the Queen Emma Bridge, the landmark of Curacaos capital, Willemstad. After his shift, Eric goes to Yvonne Troemans cook-shop. Her speciality is Kadushi, a cactus soup. The ingredients include cactus flesh, pigtails, mussels and a few secret "treats". Barbara van Bebber is the only submarine pilot on Curacao and literally gets to the bottom of things amidst the turquoise-blue wonder of the Caribbean. She charters out her sub to marine biologists and...

programme.title: mareTV: Madeira - Portugals sea of blossoms in the Atlantic Ocean
programme.desc: Flower magic in Madeira: The Flower Festival Festa da Flor is the most important event of the year for the people of the Atlantic island. With it they celebrate spring, which is climatically practically all year round here, their island and themselves. The coast formed by lava, centuries-old laurel forests and green steep slopes make Madeira unique. Those who start right at the front of the big parade of the flower festival in the capital Funchal, will have made it. For Isabel Borges this dream has come true. She opens this years flower parade along the harbour promenade with her festive group. This accolade does not only mean fame and prestige, but also a lot of pressure. Are the...

programme.title: mareTV: Tenerife - The Queen of the Canaries
programme.desc: Tenerife is outstanding among the Canary Islands. If only because of the volcano Pico del Teide, which rises exactly 3.718 meters above sea level and is thus the highest mountain in Spain. But not only scenically Tenerife, the largest of the Canary Islands, stands out...

programme.title: Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II: Gir National Park: India – Asia’s Last Lion
programme.desc: In the far west of India, unexpected predators roam: lions. Living freely in a human-inhabited area without fences, they occasionally prey on the livestock of the indigenous Maldhari people, who nevertheless take pride in sharing their region with these lions—a unique coexistence of humans and predators. In northern Gujarat, desert landscapes dominate, where semi-nomadic communities breed a unique camel breed capable of swimming: Karai camels swim up to 3km daily to mangrove islands for grazing.

programme.title: Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II: Kinabatangan River: Borneo – Forgotten Paradise
programme.desc: In Sabah, northern Borneo, flows the 560km-long Kinabatangan River. Nowhere else in Sabah are wild animals as easily spotted as along this river: orangutans, elephants, crocodiles, and proboscis monkeys. However, biodiversity is threatened as more rainforest gives way to palm oil plantations. Wildlife ventures into inhabited areas in search of food, leading to conflicts. Locals are fighting to preserve the rainforest and its unique wildlife, demonstrating that conservation and prosperity can coexist even in a modern society.

programme.title: Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II: Pu Mat National Park: Vietnam – Of Bears and Men
programme.desc: The jungle in northern Vietnam is nearly impenetrable, with some areas never touched by humans. The remote rainforests of Pu Mat National Park serve as a refuge for endangered wildlife such as black bears, monkeys, and pangolins. Tuan, a biologist and bear specialist, embarks on an expedition to these untouched regions of the park in search of bears. The most hunted animal here is the pangolin, sought after for its scales believed to have medicinal properties and its meat considered a delicacy. A small Vietnamese conservation organization fights for the survival of this species.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: In Whistler B.C., a winter wonderland for the rich and trendy, three people meet: the son of a wealthy Frenchman, a Vancouver businessman looking for investors and a real estate agent trying to sell a mountainside estate; one of them is a con man.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: In 2002, several bank robberies take place; all of them link to an overweight man; but when his identity is eventually revealed, it is a huge surprise for all.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: A woman is told by a friend that she was a passenger in a car where she was confronted with a guys head in a bucket.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Jennifer Fulford was a middle-aged nanny excited to travel to Dallas to meet her grandchild for the first time. But when ex-con Scott Nelson looked at her, he saw a target for his rage.

programme.title: Someone They Knew... With Tamron Hall
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Someone They Knew... With Tamron Hall

programme.title: Texas Heart

programme.title: Broken Ceiling
programme.desc: When Angela Walker is passed over for yet another promotion, she decides shes going to have to break through the invisible corporate barriers once and for all.

programme.title: Hope Dances
programme.desc: Hope Douglas has a dream but her parents have thrown her into battle between playing sports and dancing ballet.

programme.title: Mum Said
programme.desc: A widower takes his new girlfriend camping to bond with his children but the kids see this as an opportunity to get rid of her.

programme.title: Clarity
programme.desc: When 20-year-old Maggie collapses at a surprise celebration dinner, her family discover that she has a rare genetic kidney disorder.

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: In an effort to control the city the Mayor opens the doors to the Russian Mob. It is not long until he realizes they arent going to follow his rules.

programme.title: Gold Fools
programme.desc: When a successful family man gets laid off, he leads his friends on a gold panning expedition in the mountains of Sonora, oblivious to what lurks where the water runs real deep.

programme.title: TangerineLAnd
programme.desc: Beth Harris is getting married. The only problem is, she already has a husband; pro-surfer, Sonny Baker.

programme.title: Friends, Foes and Fireworks
programme.desc: A group of female friends reunite for a New Year’s Eve celebration but old tensions resurface and past rivalries reignite, causing the night to descend into chaos and sparks and revelations to fly like fireworks.

programme.title: Comfort
programme.desc: A late night courier boy agrees to pick up the feisty daughter of an important client. The two youngsters form a close connection and spend two nights exploring LA’s local food scene while their romance blossoms.

programme.title: Bathing Franky
programme.desc: When an ex-con falls under the spell of a backyard magician, the illusion is shattered.

programme.title: American Sophmore
programme.desc: A group of high school kids enjoy many adventures throughout their formative tenth grade year.

programme.title: The Fat Boy Chronicles
programme.desc: Jimmy always gets teased by the football team for being overweight. As a school assignment he writes about it in his journal, but soon he finds out that he’s not the only kid in school with problems.

programme.title: About an Age
programme.desc: It’s Friday night and five friends on the cusp of adulthood gather at a house to celebrate the end of another school week.

programme.title: The Map Reader
programme.desc: In a small New Zealand town, 16 year-old Michael leads a lonely, introverted existence with his single mother Amelia whose guilt and alcoholism threatens to drive her cherished son away. Uncomfortable with the adolescent exploits of his “friends,” he finds escape through a passionate love of maps.

programme.title: Stunt Games
programme.desc: Adan and Samuel, twin brothers who dream of success as cinema stunt men, become entangled with mafia after accepting an obscure assignment.

programme.title: Boone: The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When fame-seeking reality show bounty hunter, Boone, attempts to bring down a drug lord and his empire, he uncovers more than he bargains for.

programme.title: Sam
programme.desc: An alpha New York City male is magically transformed into a beautiful girl, falls in love, and learns what it means to be a woman.

programme.title: Shirin In Love
programme.desc: Love has no borders and therein lies the premise of the charming, Iranian-American romantic comedy "Shirin in Love."

programme.title: Hell and Mr. Fudge
programme.desc: In 1970s Alabama, a young preacher struggles with his faith, and attacks from his church, after being hired to prove whether or not Hell exists.

programme.title: Executor
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin, trained to kill in the name of God by a corrupt priest, re-evaluates his life purpose after saving a little boy from one of his own assassination attempts.

programme.title: The Menkoff Method
programme.desc: In this satirical office comedy introverted bank worker, David Cork, joins forces with corporate gun Ruby Jackson to defeat the evil HR guru – Max Menkoff.

programme.title: Beauty in the Broken
programme.desc: The worlds of a depressed psychologist and an emotionally disturbed homeless woman collide. While trying to rescue her they fall in love, and each gets a second chance at a new life.

programme.title: The Phoenix Project
programme.desc: Four scientists craft a machine to reanimate deceased organisms.

programme.title: The God Question
programme.desc: A scientist asks an experimental super-intelligent computer the ultimate question: Is there evidence for God, for a spiritual framework to life?

programme.title: Treasure Lies
programme.desc: Hardworking teenager Sean feels let down by life, but faces a crisis of character through a series of his own bad decisions.

programme.title: God and Salsa
programme.desc: A grief-stricken therapist determined to help a suicidal teen regains her faith in the process with the help of her Pastor and Salsa instructor.

programme.title: American Dream
programme.desc: The American Dream embarks on a journey with two college bound football buddies. They must decide between the fast money on the streets and keeping on a straight path.

programme.title: The Kiss of Lady X
programme.desc: A disgraced former secret agent risks his life as well as the lives of his ragtag team as he seeks revenge against the charismatic terrorist who killed his wife.

programme.title: Appleton
programme.desc: In the rural farm town of Appleton, Wisconsin, a harsh winter has set in and a rogue figure named Mitchell has returned to the town he once terrorized.

programme.title: A Murder of Innocence
programme.desc: A new pastor learns how important it is to provide stability, healing and hope after a double homicide shakes his community to its core.

programme.title: Family Games

programme.desc: When Reno tracks down assault and battery suspect Jason Calhoun, the head of a gang of surfers, he is immediately enthralled by the young mans charisma but soon thereafter uncovers evidence of Calhouns involvement in a much larger operation

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: When Reno attempts to bust his latest bounty at a railway station, the man slips from his grasp and the station, but not before stealing a car and killing the owner.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: A contract killer is hired to take out a small town judge.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Bobby and a reluctant Reno head to San Francisco when Bobby is contacted by a Import/Export magnate to find alleged Industrial spy Rikki Yeager.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: News reports of Lt. Enrique Vilas escape from El Salvador are accompanied by offers of a $100,000 reward for his capture.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: After Reno saves Rikki Yeager from a psychotic bounty hunter, his attempt to turn her over goes up in smoke when the plane sent for their transport explodes in an obvious ambush plot.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Reno gets kidnapped by an insane woman who wants him to marry her sister.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: A juvenile spots an officer and takes off running, the teen eventually admits to minor vandalism.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: Bystanders defend apprehended suspects at the scene of a burglary call.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: Things seem fishy during questioning with a suspected carjacker and an eventual arrest is made.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: An intoxicated man is jailed for safety.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: The driver of a stolen Jeep bails from the vehicle abandoning a female passenger and a baby.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: A man is arrested in Virginia Beach for gun possession and outstanding warrants.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: An emotionally disturbed man is involuntarily committed to the hospital for supervision.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: A drunk driver resists arrest in Lakewood.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: Shots heard from a moving car are investigated, the car is pulled over and a gun is recovered.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: An officer arrests suspects in a drug bust. A DUI crash injures a pregnant woman.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.sub-title: S01 : E64 Meth Lab On Wheels
programme.desc: Deputies recover a stolen jet ski and arrest two.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: A man bails from a stolen vehicle during a traffic stop. An officer helps resolve a bizarre domestic call.

programme.title: Street Patrol
programme.desc: A heap of police cars team together in the hunt for a federal fugitive.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Thats My Sister, Pal
programme.desc: Carlos and Connie search for a missing teen who has upset a drug lord.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 If You Could Pick Your Own Parents...
programme.desc: Elderly man missing, wife attempts suicide. Group plans a holiday party for the lieutenant. Jumpers body hasnt been found and no ones reported him missing. Boy reports his mom is missing.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Cabe... What Kind Of Name Is That?
programme.desc: Carlos brings in photos of his newborn son. Bobby searches for the missing son of a Filipino lady, meanwhile a little boy is found who hasnt been reported missing.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Mans An Emotional Termite
programme.desc: A young womans parents arrive for a visit and find her missing; a young girl is an apparent runaway; and an older mans entire family disappears.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.desc: As we meet the characters, Johnny investigates a case of a little Polish girl snatched on a subway train, Carlos tries to find a 14 year old victim of sexual abuse, Bobby searches for a missing law student, and Connie gets frustrated because she isnt given any cases.

programme.title: Scarlet Street
programme.desc: A man in mid-life crisis befriends a young woman, her fiance persuades her to con him.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On May 17th 2005, a body is discovered in a forest of Sucy-en-Brie; Christophe Belle, 40 years old, a renowned pastry cook.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The disturbing missing case in Paris of a four year old.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On October 13th 1996, the body of young Angelique Dumetz, 18 years old, is recovered down a ditch in Oise forest. An important clue is found on the crime scene.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On February 23th 2017, policemen are alerted of the disapearrance of Brigitte Troadec, her husband Pascal, and their children Sebastien and Charlotte.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Night of Horror at Devils Plateau (Marie-Jeanne Meyer Case) - On June 18, 2011, Marie-Jeanne Meyer, 17-years old, waved goodbye to her little sister before leaving for her daily jog on the heights of Tournon in Ardèche. She never came back. Three days later, her mutilated body was found in a freshly dug pit, near an area known to be cursed, "The Devils Plateau." Whats more, the crime scene looked like a mystical ritual ... Was it a ritual murder? Revenge? An unfortunate encounter? ...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Mysterious Murder at the Farm (Valerie Bary Case)- On Friday, March 26, 2004, in the region of Dijon, Laurent Bary came home from his work to discover the lifeless body of his wife, Valerie, bathing in a pool of blood. According to the investigators initial findings, the 38-year-old nurses aid had been stabbed several times, seeming to validate the theory of a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 13, 2011, two boaters retrieved a suitcase that was floating in the bay of Lorient. Inside, they discovered the tied up corpse of a man.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Bloody Christmas next to the Leman lake (CASE OF RUTH LÉGERET) - On January 4, 2006, Ruth Legeret was found dead in the middle of a pool of blood at her luxurious property in Vevey, Switzerland. Next to her was the lifeless body of her friend, Marina Studer. Who could have killed these two simple and wealthy widows? Clue after clue, the Swiss polices investigation would revolve around an environment of family jealousy and financial greed.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: September 16 2005. The lifeless body of Audrey Jouannet, 24, is found hidden under the bed in her small apartment in Soisy-sur-Seine. It soon becomes apparent that the young woman has been tortured at length before being strangled. But surprisingly, though the highly meticulous murderer has taken care to leave no sign of his passage, the autopsy reveals traces of sperm on the victim. It will take all of the investigators intuition to pierce the mystery of this heinous crime...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Sylvain Dromard finds the body of his wife Laurence lying in a pool of blood in the kitchen. The crime was particularly violent and the theory of a burglary that went wrong is soon excluded. But investigators dont understand who could want the adorable hairdresser of Saint-Martin-dAblois dead. During the investigation, the work of profilers will enable them to draw a very precise portrait of the murderer...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: After an ordinary dinner, Pierre and Gabrielle Labrell suffer severe abdominal pains.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Nelly Cremel, 39, leaves her home to go jogging... never to return. Eight days later, after a vast search campaign, her body is found. Theres no doubt that its murder. The case soon ignites public opinion, even inflaming passions at the highest level of the state. The clues lead investigators on a number of trails, from the shadows of the French secret service to a manhunt for a possible sex maniac, in a case of murder most foul.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Willy Pomonti, a retired architect, is found savagely murdered in his opulent villa in La Celle-Saint-Cloud, near Paris. It soon becomes clear that the man has been tortured prior to death. At several points during this extraordinary enquiry, police will feel theyre holding the culprit... It will take them ten years to finally shed light on this particularly violent crime.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The lifeless body of Christophe Lejard is found by his son just metres from their home. The man was shot in the head as he was getting into his car to go to work. A veritable execution, which at first glance doesnt square with the profile of the quiet family man. Yet behind the appearances, the investigation gradually reveals all the hate and resentment that revolved around the victim.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A man walks into a gendarmerie near Saint-Malo to report that his wife has been missing since the previous day. The couple are going through a divorce, but this mother would never have left her seven children alone! An extensive search is undertaken but the woman cannot be found. What has happened to Adeline Piet? The investigation spans several years and experiences many twists.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The corpse of Priscillia Ciatti, 14, is discovered by the side of a field, a few hundred metres from her family home. The teenager has been stabbed sixty times with a knife and -an extra sordid detail - a devil mask is found next to her body. Was Priscillia the victim of a prowler? A serial killer? A maniac inspired by a horror movie? Investigators soon find that the young girl felt she was being watched, and even threatened...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: In the early hours of the morning, Mathilde Croguennec, 18, attending "Teknival" in Brittany, is found at the foot of a tree with her throat cut. Investigators face the task of finding the killer from among the 43,000 participants of this huge open-air festival of electronic music, where drink and drugs are consumed in abundance. An unusual investigation that leads the police down a number of false avenues.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Arriving at her work, the secretary of a small firm in the suburbs of Geneva finds the body of Jean-Raymond Blatti, the companys new accountant. The man is lying in a pool of blood and, on his belly, the murderer has written "DIRTY RAPIST". Yet Jean-Raymond Blatti was never charged with sexual assault. Over the course of the investigation, this inscription will appear as one of the many mysteries of this case which is particularly rich in twists and turns.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 19th 2004, the naked and tied up body of a woman is recovered in the Ourcq canal in Fresnes-sur-Marne. The victim is impossible to identify.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On April 3th 2003, Chantal Ternik, a 48 year old housewife, is discovered hanged in her house of Sanary-sur-Mer, in Var.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On March 28th 2013, the burnt body of Anne Barbot, 38 years old, is discovered in a forest of Maine-et-Loire.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On May 17th 2005, a body is discovered in a forest of Sucy-en-Brie; Christophe Belle, 40 years old, a renowned pastry cook.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers

programme.desc: The story of how the supersonic Concorde aircraft crashed and burned into the aviation history books.

programme.desc: Top aviation experts share their theories about the mysterious whereabouts and final fate of Malaysia Airlines MH370.

programme.desc: The story of the engineering, design, and sociopolitical factors that led to the catastrophic 2017 Grenfell Tower fire that killed 72 people in London.

programme.title: Sinking Cities
programme.desc: In this episode, travel with scientists from the Earth Observatory of Singapore across the region to understand what is causing cities to sink.

programme.title: Extreme Weather. Powerful Tsunamis.
programme.desc: For scientists at the Earth Observatory of Singapore, it is a race against time to understand the effects climate change will have on coastal infrastructures.

programme.title: Urban Oceans. Super Corals.
programme.desc: Dive with scientists from the Earth Observatory of Singapore as they investigate the impact climate change is having on the ocean.

programme.title: Sea Level Rise and Engineering Solutions
programme.desc: South-east Asia is a unique part of the world, featuring low-lying countries, pristine islands, and vast coastal habitats.

programme.title: Patagonia
programme.desc: Meet Rene Araneda, a wildlife filmmaker and Patagonia explorer, as he takes you on a tour of his favorite place in the world: Torres del Paine.

programme.title: Southern California
programme.desc: Throw on your wetsuit, and join filmmakers Kyle McBurnie and Alex Warham as they show off their California wild backyard, deep in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: New York City
programme.desc: The hustle and bustle of New York City is legendary worldwide, but right in its backyard lies a serene natural haven that most know very little about.

programme.title: Manyoni Reserve
programme.desc: Join ecologist Karen Odendaal as she gives us a tour of the Manyoni Private Game Reserve in the heart of Zululand, South Africa.

programme.title: Janos Biosphere Reserve
programme.desc: Take a trip to the north of Mexico with our host, Eréndira Hernández, as she shows off one of the most extraordinary landscapes in the Americas.

programme.title: Call Of The Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Nature Through Her Eyes
programme.desc: Childhood curiosity can build a lifelong passion for the natural world. What is special about women’s connection to the wild?

programme.title: Who Tells The Story?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Nature Through Her Eyes
programme.desc: Many of nature’s greatest champions are women. Can their storytelling help restore balance to a troubled world?

programme.title: Climbing The Mountain
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Nature Through Her Eyes
programme.desc: Our stories of the wilderness have traditionally been told by white men. But in recent decades pioneering women have overcome obstacles to make their voices heard.

programme.title: One World
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Nature Through Her Eyes
programme.desc: Partnerships between men and women, young and old, black and white, give us a fresh appreciation for the creatures we share this earth with.

programme.desc: Wherever we find patterns and symmetry in nature, we also find that nature conforms to certain rules. Rules that combine elegance with efficiency.

programme.desc: Mathematical formulas can be found in the arrangement of seeds on a sunflower, and the structure of the spirals in the shells of certain marine animals.

programme.title: The Bermondsey Horror
programme.desc: In 1849, a man suddenly disappeared in Bermondsey. The discovery that he had been brutally murdered enraptured the press and the public.

programme.title: In The Shadow Of Jack
programme.desc: At the time of Jack The Ripper, London was home to some of the most terrible individuals the city has ever seen. One of the very worst was the elusive Borough Poisoner.

programme.title: Finding Dr. Crippen
programme.desc: Having killed his wife and buried her in the basement, Dr. Crippen believed he had escaped on a ship to Canada. But the police managed to hunt him down.

programme.title: The Brides In The Bath Killer
programme.desc: George Smith had many aliases. He needed them for his many wives who he would soon murder in order to claim the inheritance.

programme.title: Terror In The Roaring Twenties
programme.desc: Edith Thompson and Frederick Bywaters were in love. But the young couple was convicted for murdering her husband in a case that shocked society and fascinated Hitchcock.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Tigers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: Siberian tigers are the largest of all cats. Over the last century, theyve experienced an almost total population crash, and at least 97% of those tigers have gone.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Snow Leopards
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: Often referred to as the gray ghost or ghost of the mountains, this animals rarity and elusiveness was legendary.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Pumas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: These cats are much more closely related to cheetahs than lions. While pumas are often found in mountains, theyre also found in the lowlands, dense forests, or deserts.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Lions
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: There are now thought to be fewer than 15,000 lions remaining in Kenyas Masai Mara, a drop of 75% in 50 years.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Leopards
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: The leopard is a master of secrecy. Its one of the hardest of all big cats to see, let alone observe. Mainly because leopards need absolute invisibility to hunt.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Jaguars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: The first jaguar scientists struggled to go anywhere near their subjects. But times have changed.

programme.title: The Last Frontier
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Trackers Diary: Bears of Katmai
programme.desc: In Katmai National Park, Alaska a massive population of coastal brown bears gather to eat salmon as they migrate back to the rivers and streams where they were born.

programme.title: Fish Like a Bear
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Trackers Diary: Bears of Katmai
programme.desc: The crew heads inland to a section of the river to observe the many different families as they fish.

programme.title: A Working Ecosystem
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Trackers Diary: Bears of Katmai
programme.desc: During a lull in bear and salmon activity, Casey and the crew decide to head inland in search of the spawning fish.

programme.title: The Wolf and The Storm
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Trackers Diary: Bears of Katmai
programme.desc: After seeing a wolf in the distance and tracks on the shore, the crew head inland in search of more clues to the wolfs whereabouts.

programme.title: Neighbors, Old and New
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Trackers Diary: Bears of Katmai
programme.desc: Casey and the crew go out in search of the family of the lost cub from the previous night. They hope that if they find them, the cub will have found them as well.

programme.title: No Place Like Home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Trackers Diary: Bears of Katmai
programme.desc: As the end of their expedition draws near, salmon and bear activity begins to decline, but that doesn’t mean that there aren’t some bears still lingering around the area.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Tigers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: Siberian tigers are the largest of all cats. Over the last century, theyve experienced an almost total population crash, and at least 97% of those tigers have gone.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Snow Leopards
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: Often referred to as the gray ghost or ghost of the mountains, this animals rarity and elusiveness was legendary.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Pumas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: These cats are much more closely related to cheetahs than lions. While pumas are often found in mountains, theyre also found in the lowlands, dense forests, or deserts.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Lions
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: There are now thought to be fewer than 15,000 lions remaining in Kenyas Masai Mara, a drop of 75% in 50 years.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Leopards
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Camp X-Ray kertoo nuoresta naisesta, joka liittyy Yhdysvaltain armeijaan ollakseen osa jotain itseaan ja pikkukaupunkinsa juuria suurempaa. Han paatyy kuitenkin vartijaksi Guantanamo Bayhin, missa han solmii ystavyyssuhteen yhden vangin kanssa. Eettisia kysymyksia pohtiessaan naiden kahden eri lahtokohdista tulleen ihmisen ystavyys muuttaa heidan molempien elaman.

programme.title: Varg
programme.desc: Varg on elamaa suurempi tarina Ruotsin ja Norjan rajalla asuvasta Klemensista (Peter Stomare) ja taman sisarenpojasta, Nejlasta.

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Hayden Christensen nayttelee tassa kriitikoiden ylistamassa tarinassa hapaistysta toimittajasta, jonka on ohjannut ja kirjoittanut Billy Ray, CAPTAIN PHILLIPSISTÄ Oscar-ehdokkuuden saanut kirjoittaja. Kun kuuluisa toimittaja Stephen Glass (Christensen) joutuuu Forbes.com toimittajan (Steve Zahn) tutkinnan alle, paljastuu etta Glass on keksinyt monet hanen tunnetuimmista tarinoista, joka johtaa hanen tuhoonsa tassa mukaansatempaavassa, tositarinassa.

programme.title: Brain On Fire
programme.desc: Susannah Cahalan on hiljattain valmistunut yliopistosta ja elaa unelmaelamaa New Yorkissa. Han on lupaava toimittaja New York Postin toimituksessa ja rakastunut muusikko Stepheniin. Lisaksi esimies on antanut hanelle toimeksiannon, joka mahdollistaa uran lapilyonnin, joten kaikki on kohdallaan. Pian asiat alkavat kuitenkin luisua kasista. Susannah sairastuu sitkeaan flunssaan, unohtaa asioita ja myohastyy aikatauluistaan. Han kuulee ihmisten puhuvan selkansa takana, on varma, etta Stephen tapailee toista naista eika pysty hallitsemaan kehoaan. Ja tilanne pahenee; Susannah alkaa saada voimakkaita kohtauksia ja hanen yha psykoottisemmaksi kayva kaytoksensa vaatii jatkuvaa valvontaa.

programme.title: The Greatest
programme.desc: Allen ja Grace Brewerin vanhin poika on kuollut auto-onnettomuudessa. Yhtakkiaovikello soi, ja oven takana on Rose. Han vaittaa tunteneensa pojan ja kantavansahanen lastaan. Tieto saa perheen etaantymaan toisistaan. Voiko kauheista onnettomuuksista seurata kuitenkin jotain hyvaa?

programme.title: Equals
programme.desc: Utopistisessa maailmassa, missa vakivalta ja rikollisuus on kitketty poistamalla ihmisten tunteet geneettisesti, eletaan Nian ja Silasin tavoin rauhallista ja yksitoikkoista elamaa. Tyopaikallaan tiedotusmateriaalien tuotantolaitoksessa he vaihtavat tyotoverien kesken ainoastaan kohteliaisuuksia. Elama on yksinkertaista kunnes huhu tartunnasta, jonka seurauksena ihminen nayttaa tunteensa, leviaa. Sairastuneet lahetetaan pois, eika heita nahda enaa koskaan. Silas epailee kantavansa tartuntaa, ja asian vahvistuttua hanesta tulee hylkio. Silti han tuntee vetoa Niaan, joka on myos saanut tartunnan, mutta onnistuu salaamaan oireensa.

programme.title: Dont Come Knocking
programme.desc: Hollywood-tahti Howard Spence (Sam Shepard) on nahnyt parempiakin paivia, mutta nyt han ratsastaa vain menneella maineellaan. Jalleen yhden irstailuillan jalkeen han pakenee uuden lankkarin kuvauksista ja ratsastaa preerialle kuin yksi sankareista, joita han on niin usein naytellyt. Han etsii suojaa aitinsa (Eva Marie Saint) luota, jota han ei ole nahnyt vuosiin. Tosin siellakaan han ei viivy kauan saatuaan tietaa, etta hanella saattaa olla poika, josta han ei ole tiennyt. Howardille tama tuo toivoa siita, ettei hanen elamansa ole ollutkaan taysin turhaa. Ehka jossain on paikka, jonne han kuuluu.

programme.title: Paamies
programme.desc: Eras poika nakee mafia-asianajajan murhan ja saa tietaa salaisuuden, jota suojatakseen roistot ovat valmiit tappamaan.

programme.title: Son of the South
programme.desc: KKK-jasenen poika varttuu etelaisissa Yhdysvalloissa 1960-luvun alussa ja lopulta han liittyy mukaan kansalaisoikeustaisteluun.

programme.title: Dinner Rush
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu Manhattanille, Louis Cropan omistamaan ravintola Gigino Trattoriaan. Louis Cropan poika Udo toimii ravintolan paakokkina, ja on onnistunut saavuttamaan ravintolalle mainetta kokkaustaidoillaan. Louis Cropa ei kuitenkaan ole iloinen aikaisemmin perinteista kotiruokaa tarjoilleen trattoriansa muuttumisesta yhdeksi New Yorkin trendikkaimmista ravintoloista. Omistajan elamantilannetta ei helpota sekaan, etta hanen liikekumppaninsa on vasta vahan aikaan sitten murhattu, ja hanen suojatikseen ottamansa ravintolan apukokki Duncan karsii pahasta peliriippuvuudesta.

programme.title: Once Were Warriors
programme.desc: Heken perheessa ei ole rauhallista hetkea. Jake Heke on vakivaltainen humalassa, toinen poika on liittynyt katujengiin ja toinen odottaa syytteita. Beth-aidilla ja lapsilla on edessaan vaikea mutta elintarkea paatos: jaada toivottomaan tilanteeseen tai rikkoa kahleensa. Kerran sotureita on palkittu perhedraama menneisyyden hyvaksymisesta ja tulevaisuuden luomisesta.

programme.title: Kohtalokas Syrjahyppy (Unfaithful)
programme.desc: Edward ja Connie Sumner ovat keski-ikainen pariskunta, jotka elavat amerikkalaista unelmaa New Yorkin esikaupunkialueella. Naennaisesti onnellisesti naimisissa olevien Sumnerien, joilla on kahdeksanvuotias poika, koira ja taloudenhoitaja, hiljainen maailma murtuu, kun satunnainen kohtaaminen muukalaisen kanssa vetaa Connien suhteeseen, joka voisi merkita enemman kuin vain avioliiton paattymista. KOHTALOKAS SYRJÄHYPPY on eroottinen trilleri syyllisyydesta ja raivosta, joka kysyy vaikeimpia kysymyksia kaikista suhteista.

programme.title: Palo Alto
programme.desc: April on lukioikainen tytto, jonka arkea rytmittaa koulun lisaksi jalkapallotreenit ja kavereiden jarjestamat bileet. Varautuneen ja hiljaisen ulkokuoren alle katkeytyy haaveilijasielu, jonka aani ei aina kantaudu hottoisan aidin tai eksentrisen isapuolen korviin. Romanssin ontuessa lukiokaveri Teddyyn kipina tuntuu kuitenkin loytyvan Aprilin ja taman jalkapallovalmentajan yhteisista hetkista.

programme.title: Candy
programme.desc: Candy (Abbie Cornish) ja Dan (Heath Ledger) rakastavat toisiaan ja heroiinia, joka tuntuu vain lisaavan heidan keskinaista onneaan. Mikaan ei voi menna pieleen, kunhan heilla on toisensa. Avioliitto ja lapsi vain lujittavat sidetta. Mutta vahitellen harmiton tapa saa yliotteen ja uhkaa tuhota pienen paratiisin. Candyn vanhemmat ja Danin ystava Casper (Geoffrey Rush) alkavat menettaa toivonsa pariskunnan vajotessa yha syvemmalle omaan rakkauden ja heroiinin savyttamaan maailmaansa...

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: The Good Heart
programme.desc: Kohtalo ja viides sydankohtaus heittavat akaisen, mutta sydamellisen Jacquesin elamaan nuoren Lucasin, jolle mies paattaa luovuttaa baarinsa asiakkaineen. Naisia ei anniskelupaikassa kaivata, ja miesten ystavyys joutuukin koetukselle Lucasin rakastuessa kauniiseen Apriliin.

programme.title: Beatrix Potter
programme.desc: Han on ihastuttanut monia sukupolvia, mutta hanen elamansa on ollut salaisuus. Tahan saakka. Beatrix Potter on 30-vuotias sinkkunainen aikana, jolloin naisen kunnioitettavin tehtava on menna hyviin naimisiin. Kukaan, ei edes Beatrixin oma perhe, ymmarra sita, etta Beatrix haluaa mieluummin piirtaa ja kertoa tarinoita elaimista. Kaikki menee pieleen, kun Beatrix tapaa kokemattoman kustantajan Norman Waynen, joka rakastuu korviaan myoten niin Beatrixin ainutlaatuisiin tarinoihin kuin itse Beatrixiinkin. Beatrix joutuu mahdottomaan tilanteeseen, jossa hanen pitaa irrottautua perheen tukahduttavasta otteesta.

programme.title: Auggie
programme.desc: Felix Greystonen elakeikaan olisi viela tovi, mutta firma painostaa Felixin aikaistetulle elakkeelle. Laksiaislahjaksi han saa alylasit, jotka herattavat kayttajan suurimmat haaveet eloon. Kun Felixin vaimon ura on nousukiidossa ja tytar itsenaistymassa, mies huomaa tuntevansa itsensa kovin yksinaiseksi. Paetakseen piinaavaa yksinaisyytta Felix ajautuu yha syvemmalle alylasiensa maailmaan, joka hiertaa entisestaan Felixin suhdetta etaantyneeseen perheeseensa.

programme.title: Laitakaupungin valot
programme.desc: Laitakaupungin valot kertoo yovartijana tyoskentelevasta Koistisesta, joka joutuu petoksen uhriksi. Laitakaupungin valot oli mukana vuoden 2006 Cannesin elokuvajuhlien kansainvalisessa kilpasarjassa. Elokuva palkittiin parhaan elokuvan Jussi-palkinnolla vuonna 2007. Lisaksi Timo Salminen voitti Jussin parhaasta kuvauksesta ja Markku Patila parhaasta lavastuksesta.

programme.title: Gringa
programme.desc: Ongelmia kokenut teinitytto lahtee Meksikoon etsimaan isaansa, jota han ei edes tunne. He opettelevat yhdessa olemaan perhe, vaikka ensin heita yhdistavat vain menetykset.

programme.title: The Dark Divide - Elamaan eksynyt
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva Sukuvika -sarjasta tutun David Crossin ja Will and Grace -sarjasta tunnetun Debra Messingin tahdittama draamakomedia. Robert on perhostutkija, jonka vaimo sairastuu syopaan. Vaimo patistaa maansa myyneen miehen perhosretkelle, jonka odottamattomat kohtaamiset ja odotetut vastoinkaymiset avaavat Robertin silmat jalleen.

programme.title: Main Street
programme.desc: Pohjois-Carolinassa sijaitsevan pikkukaupungin kuviot menevat uusiksi, kun kaupunkiin muuttaa karismaattinen muukalainen. Han suunnittelee kuolevan kaupungin elvyttamista, mutta suunnitelmat eivat ole kaikkien asukkaiden mieleen. Ainakaan mikaan ei palaa enaa ennalleen...

programme.title: The Truth Commissioner
programme.desc: Totuuskomissaari paljastaa synkkia salaisuuksia Pohjois-Irlannissa, missa valta ja menneisyys tormaavat oikeuden ja sovinnon puolesta.
Nuoren kirjailijan on hyvaksyttava kuolevaisuutensa kun hanella todetaan harvinainen syopa.Parhaan ystavansa ja empaattisen nuoren terapeutin avulla han loytaa rohkeuden taistella sairautta vastaan.

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Hayden Christensen nayttelee tassa kriitikoiden ylistamassa tarinassa hapaistysta toimittajasta, jonka on ohjannut ja kirjoittanut Billy Ray, CAPTAIN PHILLIPSISTÄ Oscar-ehdokkuuden saanut kirjoittaja. Kun kuuluisa toimittaja Stephen Glass (Christensen) joutuuu Forbes.com toimittajan (Steve Zahn) tutkinnan alle, paljastuu etta Glass on keksinyt monet hanen tunnetuimmista tarinoista, joka johtaa hanen tuhoonsa tassa mukaansatempaavassa, tositarinassa.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Camp X-Ray kertoo nuoresta naisesta, joka liittyy Yhdysvaltain armeijaan ollakseen osa jotain itseaan ja pikkukaupunkinsa juuria suurempaa. Han paatyy kuitenkin vartijaksi Guantanamo Bayhin, missa han solmii ystavyyssuhteen yhden vangin kanssa. Eettisia kysymyksia pohtiessaan naiden kahden eri lahtokohdista tulleen ihmisen ystavyys muuttaa heidan molempien elaman.

programme.title: Winged Creatures
programme.desc: Tavallinen paiva tavallisessa ravintolassa Los Angelesissa. Rauha rikkoutuu silmanrapayksessa, kun psykopaatti astelee sisaan ravintolaan, ottaa aseen esiin ja alkaa ampua eparoimatta ympariinsa. Osa ihmisista kuolee. Henkiinjaaneet yrittavat ymmartaa mita on tapahtunut, ja miten elamalle saa taas uuden merkityksen ja turvallisuuden tunteen.

programme.title: Undergods
programme.desc: Mustalla huumorilla viimeistelty scifidystopia maailmasta, jossa vain harva on selvinnyt ja selviytyjistakin jokainen on omalla tavallaan vahan rikki. Kafkamainen miljoo yhdistettyna 2020-luvun romahtaneisiin unelmiin saa jo itsessaan katsojan ihon kananlihalle. Elokuva alkaa, kun kaksi ruumiinkeraajaa kiertelee pitkin autioituneita katuja ja kertoilee tyonsa lomassa romuttuneista haaveistaan, jotka ajoivat heidat tahan kolkkoon nykyhetkeen.

programme.title: Paluu Yorkshireen
programme.desc: Arthur Morrison (Jim Broadbent) saa tietaa, etta hanella on syopa ja vain muutama viikko aikaa elaa. Hanen vanhin poikansa Blake (Oscar-voittaja* Colin Firth) muuttaa Yorkshireen aitinsa luokse, kylaan jossa han syntyi. Kun Arthurin tila heikkenee, Blake puntaroi suhdettaan isaansa. Han muistaa yhteiset hetket, heidan laheisyytensa ja heidan erimielisyytensa. Kun isa kuolee, Blake alkaa muistella heidan valista sidetta – ristiriitoja, turhautumisia, rakkautta ja menetyksia, jotka kaikki kuuluvat monimutkaiseen suhteeseen isan ja pojan valilla.

programme.title: Crime Time Solvers
programme.desc: The chilling abduction of Sullivan Terneis left Roubaix reeling in disbelief. Amidst familial strife and personal vendettas, the truth remained elusive.

programme.title: The Railway Murders
programme.desc: In 1910, the city of Newcastle was transfixed by a murder trial. A clerk had been killed on a train and his wages bag stolen with hundreds of pounds inside.

programme.title: The Railway Murders
programme.desc: Jimmy Alcott was a troubled young man. He had joined the army after leaving school, but his time in Germany ended in disgrace when he was court-martialled for the violent murder of a civilian.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Xavier Flactif, his partner Graziella and their three children suddenly disappear; there are many theories surrounding this mysterious case.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The lifeless, mutilated body of a woman is found in the Rambouillet Forest; the police are perplexed by the clues found at the crime scene and the state of the body which is missing both the head and heart.

programme.title: Unsolved Murders
programme.desc: In 1992, Sylviane Kaas was found dead in her bedroom. Her husband had been the prime suspect for several years. Now exonerated, this murder remains unpunished.

programme.title: Unsolved Murders

programme.title: Mind Investigators

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The country has become a popular holiday destination for tourists from the UK, and it also has plenty to offer when it comes to carp fishing as well.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Ali Hamidi is joined by friends Tom Dove and Neil Spooner as they embark upon a quest to northern Africa in pursuit of the big carp which they have heard about.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Carp fishing definitely isnt something that you would immediately associate with a country that is better known for its stunning beaches, fragrant food and full moon parties.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Every year thousands of British carp anglers travel across the English Channel with their mates to partake in a carp fishing holiday.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The Balkans have made a remarkable recovery considering how recently they were a war-torn part of the world, and now attract large numbers of tourists each year.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The Extremadura region was where the Romans first introduced carp to Spain, and this rugged area now has a reputation for producing some massive ones from the huge lakes.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Croatia has emerged as probably the best place in the world to go and catch a huge carp and will soon be producing fish in excess of 100lb, likely to break the World record.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The intrepid trio travel to Slovenia, a country none of them have ever been to before, to fish two very different waters.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the half-way point in finals week and those chefs who have yet to get a dish onto the shortlist are feeling the heat. With nine dishes tasted and the scores in, theres a shock result for the chefs.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: When the Dessert result is in its down to the judges to pick the perfect menu from all four courses shortlists. Which chef will triumph to cook the starter, fish, main and dessert at the D Day banquet?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The banquet is finally here. Its the culmination of months of hard work as the winning four chefs strive to deliver their dishes to an expectant audience of wartime heroes at St Pauls Cathedral, a bastion of British wartime resilience.

programme.title: Great British Food Revival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Michel Roux jr on Bread / Hairy Bikers on Cauliflower
programme.desc: Michel Roux Jr gets passionate about the lost art of baking bread. He sets out to discover the secrets behind artisan bread and shares his own recipes and The Hairy Bikers bang the drum for the revival of the British cauliflower.

programme.title: Great British Food Revival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 James Martin on Apples / Matt Tebbutt on Mutton
programme.desc: Chef and proud Yorkshireman James Martin takes on the challenge of reviving the British apple and Matt Tebutt leads the charge on behalf of mutton.

programme.title: Great British Food Revival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Ainsley Harriott on Honey / Glynn Purnell on Cheese
programme.desc: Ainsley Harriott shows off his sweet side as he starts a campaign for the revival of British honey and Michelin starred chef and Great British Menu favourite Glynn Purnell rides to the rescue of British cheese.

programme.title: Great British Food Revival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Gary Rhodes on Tomatoes / Angela Hartnett on Crab
programme.desc: Gary Rhodes wants us all to appreciate the virtues of the British tomato and Michelin-starred chef Angela Hartnett attempts to find her sea legs when she delves into why crab is so unloved in Britain.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the battle of the North East chefs Andrew Pern, Stephanie Moon and Tim Bilton. They kick things off with their starters, but which one is going to be first off the blocks?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The chefs from the North East Tim Bilton, Andrew Pern and Stephanie Moon pull out all the stops with their fish dishes: Seafood Stew, Fish Soup with a toasted Kipper Club Sandwich and hot oak smoked Kilnsey Trout, golden tea cream and Daleside scraps.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The chefs from the North East battle it out with their main courses. Stephanie Moon, Andrew Pern and Tim Bilton are determined to win but which dish will take poll position?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the last chance for the chefs from the North East to impress as the one with the lowest total score from across the week will leave the competition today. Tim Bilton, Andrew Pern and Stephanie Moon deliver their desserts.

programme.desc: Its decision time on Great British Menu for the chefs from the North East. One chef left the competition and only two remain, as they cook their entire menus for the Great British Menu judges, Prue Leith, Matthew Fort and Oliver Peyton.
