programme.title: Secret of Captain OHara
programme.desc: Captain O’Hara saves Mary from Navajo warriors and brings her safely to Fort San Antonio. But her fiance, Major Brooks, is not only O’Hara’s rival but also a ruthless enemy of the Native tribes. As tensions rise, O’Hara must fight for peace while facing personal betrayal and growing conflict.

programme.title: The Plunderers
programme.desc: Cavalry officer John Drum attempts to track down outlaw Whit Lacey, but finds he must join forces with Lacey to fight a Sioux war party.

programme.title: Renegade Girl
programme.desc: Ann Shelby, whose family is allied with the notorious William Quantrill, turns outlaw to revenge herself on a renegade Indian who killed her brother.

programme.title: Two Crosses at Danger Pass
programme.desc: Judy and Alex are the only two survivors of a punitive mission ordered by the rich and ruthless Moran.... The girl becomes his maid and the boy is adopted by a Quaker family. Alex, despite the philosophy of forgiveness he has been taught, plans to take revenge.

programme.title: Mackenzies Raiders EP17-20
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: Mackenzies Raiders EP21-24
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: Heads or Tails
programme.desc: Shanda is charged with the murder of the banker, Burton and to save her from being lynched, the sheriff sends her off to Phoenix. During the trip the two deputies to whom she’s been entrusted rape and leave her in the desert, certain that she’s dead. The girl is found by Black Talisman, an outlaw, who takes her to his hideout, nurses her back to health and after hearing her story, determines to avenge her and clear her name.

programme.title: The Great Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A blind man wants to get his mitts on a crooks gold. He cant do it alone, so he hires the quartet of soldiers-of-fortune to help him.

programme.title: Patience Has a Limit, We Dont
programme.desc: During the Civil War, Corporal MacDonald hides a large gold shipment meant for the Union. Before he can retrieve it, hes killed—taking the secret location with him. Now, a Union lieutenant and MacDonalds two sons compete to uncover the buried treasure in a tense hunt filled with danger and deception.

programme.title: The Shakiest Gun in the West
programme.desc: A pardoned stagecoach robber, becomes government agent and marries a naive unsuspecting east-coast dentist in order to join a wagon train.

programme.title: Toughest Man in Arizona
programme.desc: Marshal Landry captures outlaw Girard, but things turn deadly after an Indian attack leaves only a woman and two children alive. When Girard escapes with help from his brothers and robs a silver shipment, Landry uncovers betrayal, a tapped telegraph line, and a shocking revelation before the final showdown.

programme.title: Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: In the 19th century, Maggie Sergent and her family move to Wyoming seeking a new start. But when her husband is murdered, Maggie faces a harsh choice: build a life in the unforgiving West or return to the familiar safety of the East. Tragedy, resilience, and survival collide on the frontier.

programme.title: Two Brothers in Trinity
programme.desc: After inheriting a land plot in a dusty place called Trinity, the antagonistic half-brothers, Lester and Jesse, reunite to pursue different aspirations, only to find themselves neck-deep in trouble. Will they ever fulfil their dreams?

programme.title: Boot Hill Bandits
programme.desc: Shady town businessman Bolton seems to be the leader of the gang but even he takes his order from a higher authority who may have tried to take Marshal Corrigans life.

programme.title: $100,000 for Ringo
programme.desc: Stranger Lee Barton rides into Rainbow Valley, mistaken for a man thought dead. As tensions rise with ruthless town boss Tom Cherry—whos after hidden gold and the affections of a local woman—Barton is drawn into violence and revenge. With a sheriffs help, he seeks justice and a new start with a boy who believes hes his father.

programme.title: The Red Pony
programme.desc: A ranch boy is gifted with a colt, grows to love him but the colt escapes, with tragic results.

programme.title: Captain Apache
programme.desc: A Native American born US Army officer, Captain Apache, investigating a murder, uncovers a presidential assassination plot.

programme.title: Six Bounty Killers for a Massacre
programme.desc: The Governor of Kansas hires six gunfighters to overthrow the tyrannical rule of the self-appointed sheriff of Abilene who is holding several hostages including his family.

programme.title: Mackenzies Raiders EP25-28
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: Ride Out for Revenge
programme.desc: When an Indian chief is murdered in a hateful town, a sympathizing ex marshal tries to stop the Indians from attacking for revenge.

programme.title: The Grand Duel
programme.desc: A grizzled ex-sheriff helps a man framed for murder to confront the powerful trio of brothers who want him dead.

programme.title: Red Coat
programme.desc: Cormack, the lawman most feared by the rugged pioneers at the turn of the century, has a mysterious bond with "Caribou," an outlaw whom he has jailed. When Caribou escapes from prison, he returns to seek revenge.

programme.title: Brother Outlaw
programme.desc: A man is falsely charged with bank robbery, prompting his brother to break him out of prison.

programme.title: Those Dirty Dogs
programme.desc: Near Fort Apache, Mexican bandits raid a U.S. Army supply column, killing soldiers and kidnapping Miss Adams. To stop the raids, President Grant sends Captain Chadwell, Lieutenant Junger, Sergeant Smith, and bounty hunter Korano. Together, they face outlaw Angelo Sanchez and the mad General Mueller in a dangerous mission.

programme.title: Ringo, the Mark of Vengeance
programme.desc: Two adventurers rescue a man bearing a tattooed treasure map on his back. But the quest is far from over—the second crucial map is tattooed on a sheriff’s back. Together, they embark on a thrilling hunt, facing danger and mystery in pursuit of hidden riches.

programme.title: The Django Story
programme.desc: Legendary gunslinger Django is recounting some of his greatest adventures while sitting in a saloon.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: A special agent from Chicago is sent out west to bring in the notorious Reno brothers.

programme.title: The Avenging Angel
programme.desc: Miles Utley, a skilled Mormon commando and bodyguard, is forced to go rogue while investigating a deadly scandal of assassination and land speculation. As danger mounts, he must confront his beliefs and decide where his true loyalties lie in a world of betrayal and faith.

programme.title: The Jackals
programme.desc: Bad bank robber falls in love with granddaughter of miner he and his men planned to rob of gold, has change of heart.

programme.title: A Few Bullets More
programme.desc: Billy starts as an innocent outlaw protecting his mother but soon becomes a ruthless killer. When love gives him hope for change, Pat Garrett, a fatherly friend, helps him try to turn his life around. Yet fate drags Billy back into violence, and Garrett is ultimately credited with his death.

programme.title: The Ballad of a Gunfighter
programme.desc: An outlaw and his partner feud over the same woman.

programme.title: Cattle Queen of Montana
programme.desc: Sierra Nevada Jones must fight a villainous rancher to regain the land that is rightfully hers.

programme.title: LIVEFEED
programme.desc: A raw and intimate experience featuring the kitchen staff of the high-end restaurant North and Navy.

programme.desc: Its time to celebrate the art of smoking with wood! Youll drool over Spencers Cherrywood Smoked Chicken Wings, dry rubbed with his favourite spices and smoked with cherrywood. Next, Spencer marinates sable fish in Japanese ingredients and grills it on a sweet-smoky cedar plank. Then, Spencer shows off his Texas BBQ skills with his Mesquite Smoked Skirt Steak. Engulfed in a thick cloud of white smoke, this skirt steak has the flavour and texture of tasty brisket, but made in a fraction amount of time. Finally, Spencer gives a pork shoulder a long, smoky cook in oak wood. The wait is worth it as he serves it piled high on a bun and topped with a mustardy Carolina BBQ sauce.

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Puglias lush landscape and large coastline characterize its cuisine. Chef Michael Bonacini explores its native ingredients through some of Puglias favourite meals. First up, Michaels antipasto is a guaranteed crunchy bite with crispy Fried Mussels. Stepping away from the sea, Michael highlights Puglias prize crop: tomatoes! Combining colourful tomatoes with flavourful burrata cheese, Michael cooks up comfort in a bowl with his Tomato and Burrata Risotto. Taking on a more festive flair, Michael introduces us to Little Pork Bombs, the hottest street food in Puglia. With a filling of fresh herbs and melted cheese, these pork skewers are savoury and irresistible. Then, Michael introduces...

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Simplicity is key with Sicilian cuisine and Chef Michael Bonacini explores just how the region balances simplicity with intensity through four flavourful dishes. Starting with an antipasto of Folded Flatbread with Ricotta and Fennel Seeds, Michael inspires with its intricate beauty with a simple recipe. Keeping to the theme of simplicity, Michael shows that plenty of flavour can come from little ingredients in his primo of Broccoli and Sausage Rigatoni. The spicy sausage and chili is countered by a creamy broccoli pesto for a dish that highlights Sicilian cuisine. Michael turns to the Italian queen of crops for his secondo: Eggplant Parmesan Roll-Ups. With thin slices of eggplant rolled...

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Filled with ruins in its bustling streets, the region of Lazio sticks with grandeur in all it does, including food! To introduce us to Lazio, Host Michael Bonacini highlights its Jewish influence with a crispy Roman Jewish-style Artichokes. As crunchy as a potato chip, Michaels artichokes are a delicious fried treat that are a perfect way to kick off a delicious meal. For his primo Michael brings together simple ingredients to create a rich Bucatini with Amatriciana Sauce. Michaels secondo turns what was once peasant food into a delectable and tender dish. Cooked with a blend of vegetables and sauce, Michaels Braised Oxtail brings forth the history of cuisine. Returning to Rome for his...

programme.desc: Co-hosts Jasmin Ibrahim and Shahir Massoud get to the "root" of spicing up your food as they cook dishes using spice roots! First up, they prepare a creamy Carrot and Galangal Soup, however they dont use cream, opting for cashews instead! Next up, a frosty, golden Turmeric Semifreddo, studded with jewel-like apricots and pistachios! Last but not least is a steaming bowl of mussels, spiced with not one, not two, but three kinds of ginger! How can you not root for these dishes?

He was also introduced to Capoeira, becoming Champion of Brazil and International Capoeira Champion. He has been able to transfer his knowledge of the control of movement and is now recognized for this knowledge as a coach in MMA community. Hard Knocks Fighter Jess Elverum, among others, using his teachings to expand their flexibility and dexterity, becoming more fluid and calm in movement.

programme.title: Unelmien Naapuri
programme.desc: Teravapiirtokuvalla ja bonusmateriaaleilla varustettu Emile Hirschin, Elisha Cuthbertin ja Timothy Olyphantin tahdittama riehakas komedia on kuumempi kuin koskaan! High Schoolista juuri valmistuva luokan priimus, Matthew Kidman haluaa saada koulun paatokseen ilman teinihorhoilyjen aiheuttamia ongelmia. Valitettavasti, ongelma muuttaa naapuriin, eika Matthew pysty vastustamaan kiusausta.

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Yritysvakoilun hamarassa valtakunnassa kyllastynyt jokamies kompastuu petoksen verkkoon ja hanesta tulee tietamaton vakooja. Kun han navigoi petoksessa ja petoksessa, han tekee yhteistyota viettelevan arvoituksen kanssa paljastaakseen jarkyttavia totuuksia ja saadakseen takaisin identiteettinsa.

programme.title: The Big Short
programme.desc: Kun nelja ulkopuolista naki sen, minka isot pankit, media ja valtionhallinto kielsivat - maailmantalouden romahtamisen - he saivat ajatuksen isosta shorttauksesta. Rohkea sijoittaminen johtaa heidat pankkialan pimealle puolelle, jossa kaikki on kyseenalaistettava. Adam Mckayn (Anchorman, Step Brothers) ohjaama elokuva perustuu tositarinaan ja Michael Lewisin menestyskirjaan (The Blind Side, Moneyball). Elokuvaa tahdittavat Christian Bale, Steve Carell, Ryan Gosling ja Brad Pitt.

programme.title: Kauas pilvet karkaavat
programme.desc: Kauas pilvet karkaavat kertoo helsinkilaispariskunnasta. Raitiovaununkuljettaja ja perinteikkaan ravintola Dubrovnikin hovimestari menettavat tyonsa, mutta eivat toivoaan Aki Kaurismaen (Le Havre) Suomi-trilogian ensimmaisessa osassa.

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Vuonna 1961 Neuvostoliiton ensimmainen ydinsukellusvene lahtee ensimmaiselle matkalleen Pohjois-Atlantille. Mutta sukellusvene ei toimi optimaalisesti, ja koska ydinreaktorissa ilmenee ongelmia, silla on katastrofaaliset seuraukset miehistoon. Miehiston on taisteltava yhdessa ydinkatastrofin valttamiseksi, joka on seka hengenvaarallinen etta voi aloittaa uuden maailmansodan suurvaltojen valilla.

programme.title: Viides Valta
programme.desc: He perustivat vallanpitajia hatyyttavan nettisivun ja heista tuli maailman jahdatuimpia ihmisia. WikiLeaksin perustajat Julian Assange ja Daniel Domscheit-Berg saivat haltuunsa kaikkien aikojen suurimman maaran luottamuksellisia ja vuodettuja tietoja Yhdysvaltain puolustusministeriosta. Silloin kaynnistyi sisainen taistelu. Paljonko kannattaa maksaa vapaan maailman suurimmista salaisuuksista? Mita niiden paljastaminen maksaa?Daniel Domscheit-Bergin oma kirja WikiLeaksista on pohjana aidolle trillerille, joka kertoo aikamme keskustelluimmasta ja ristiriitaisimmasta organisaatiosta WikiLeaksista ja sen perustajasta Julian Assangesta.

programme.title: A Little Bit Of Heaven
programme.desc: Kate Hudson on taydellinen roolissaan sateilevan kauniina Marleyna, nuorena uranaisena, joka sairastuu yllattaen syopaan. Marley on oikea flirttailija, joka ei ole koskaan ollut rakastunut, mutta kun laakarin roolissa on vastustamaton Gael García Bernal, olisiko rakkaus kuitenkin laakkeista paras?

programme.title: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
programme.desc: Valtava asteroidi lahestyy Maata, ja viimeinen keino sen pysayttamiseksi on juuri epaonnistunut. Ihmiset reagoivat 21 paivan paasta koittavaan maailmanloppuun varsin kirjavilla teoilla. Vakuutusmyyja Dodgen ja naapurintytto Pennyn tiet kohtaavat mellakoiden yltyessa ja he paattavat auttaa toisiaan matkalla kohti viimeisia paamaariaan.

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

Mika alkaa tavallisena tyopaivana, muuttuu nopeasti henkea uhkaavaksi taisteluksi pehmealuonteiselle amerikkalaiselle kopilotille, kun joukko terroristeja yrittaa ottaa hallintaansa hanen Pariisiin suuntautuvan lentonsa. Nyt hanen on taisteltava – ei vain oman henkensa puolesta, vaan myos matkustajien ja miehiston – yrittamalla muodostaa ainutlaatuinen yhteys yhteen kaappaajista. Omid Memar on myos mukana.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in America - Suuri gangsterisota
programme.desc: Tarina kahdesta New Yorkista kotoisin olevasta lapsuudenystavasta, joista tulee varakkaita ja vaikutusvaltaisia gangstereita 1920-luvun aikana. Kumpikaan ei kykene tyydyttamaan syvimpia haaveitaan tai himojaan, ja heidan tiensa erkanevat rajahtavan vakivaltaisesti tavalla, josta selviaa totuus vasta 35 vuotta myohemmin.

programme.title: Im Not There
programme.desc: MIES. MUSIIKKI. LEGENDA. Nae Heath Ledgerin ja muiden tahtien loistavat roolisuoritukset. Im Not There on epatavallinen matka halki Bob Dylanin elaman. Kuusi eri nayttelijaa esittaa Dylania eri aikakausilla ja eri rooleissa julkisuuden henkilosta yksityiseen. Lopputuloksena on varikas muotokuva tasta julkisuutta karttelevasta amerikkalaisikonista. Runoilija, profeetta, lainsuojaton, teeskentelija, valovoimainen tahti, rocknroll -marttyyri, uskovainen - seitseman identiteettia, yksi elama, yhta lavea ja hurja kuin ajanjakso, jonka moottori se oli.

programme.title: Paluu Yorkshireen
programme.desc: Arthur Morrison (Jim Broadbent) saa tietaa, etta hanella on syopa ja vain muutama viikko aikaa elaa. Hanen vanhin poikansa Blake (Oscar-voittaja* Colin Firth) muuttaa Yorkshireen aitinsa luokse, kylaan jossa han syntyi. Kun Arthurin tila heikkenee, Blake puntaroi suhdettaan isaansa. Han muistaa yhteiset hetket, heidan laheisyytensa ja heidan erimielisyytensa. Kun isa kuolee, Blake alkaa muistella heidan valista sidetta – ristiriitoja, turhautumisia, rakkautta ja menetyksia, jotka kaikki kuuluvat monimutkaiseen suhteeseen isan ja pojan valilla.

programme.title: Herakles New Yorkissa
programme.desc: Olympos-vuorelta karkotettu Herakles (Arnold Schwarzenegger) lahetetaan Maahan, missa han loytaa todellisen rakkauden ja aloittaa lupaavan uran kehonrakennusbisneksessa.

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: Albert Markovski, Open Spaces -yhdistyksen puheenjohtaja, on kokenut hammentavan sarjan sattumia, joiden tarkoitus askarruttaa hanta. Kahden eksistentiaalisen yksityisetsivan Bernard ja Vivian Jaffen avulla Albert tarkastelee elamaansa, ihmissuhteitaan ja konfliktiaan Brad Standiin, urallaan etenevan suositun tavarataloketjun Huckabeesin toimitusjohtajaan.

programme.title: Murha vailla syyllista
programme.desc: Vuonna 1924 mediamoguli William Randolph Hearst kokosi joitain maailman tunnetuimmista persoonallisuuksista jahtinsa matkalle, joka johti viela ratkaisemattomaan, hiljaiseen murhaan.

programme.title: Kauas pilvet karkaavat
programme.desc: Kauas pilvet karkaavat kertoo helsinkilaispariskunnasta. Raitiovaununkuljettaja ja perinteikkaan ravintola Dubrovnikin hovimestari menettavat tyonsa, mutta eivat toivoaan Aki Kaurismaen (Le Havre) Suomi-trilogian ensimmaisessa osassa.

programme.title: Hakutulokset (Birdman)
programme.desc: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) on musta komedia paluuta tekevasta nayttelijasta (Michael Keaton), joka on jaanyt kuuluisan supersankarihahmonsa vangiksi. Kiinnityksen saaminen uskottavaksi Broadway-nayttelijaksi ei ole helppoa, ja nayttelija paatyy ryhtymaan ohjaajaksi.

programme.title: Herakles New Yorkissa
programme.desc: Olympos-vuorelta karkotettu Herakles (Arnold Schwarzenegger) lahetetaan Maahan, missa han loytaa todellisen rakkauden ja aloittaa lupaavan uran kehonrakennusbisneksessa.

Kirjailija luuli kirjoittavansa tulevaisuudesta, mutta kirjoittikin menneisyydesta. Hanen romaanissaan juna ajaa silloin talloin vuoteen 2046. Jokaisella matkustajalla oli sama aikomus: elaa kadotetut muistonsa uudestaan. Sanottiin, etta vuonna 2046 mikaan ei ollut muuttunut. Kukaan ei tarkkaan tiennyt, oliko se totta, koska matkustajat eivat koskaan palanneet - paitsi yksi. Han oli siella mutta halusi lahtea pois.

programme.title: Keinottelua
programme.desc: Menestyvan liikemiehen Robert Millerin (Gere) taydelliselta vaikuttava elama ajautuu syoksykierteeseen yhden kohtalokkaan erehdyksen seurauksena. Miller loytaa itsensa tasapainoilemasta perhe-elaman, yrityskauppojen, uhkaavan kavallussyytteen ja syrjahypyn ristipaineessa. Saatuaan viela sinnikkaan poliisietsiva Michael Bryerin (Roth) peraansa, joutuu Miller epatoivoiseen kujanjuoksuun yrittaessaan korjata tekemansa virheet ennen kuplan puhkeamista.

programme.title: Tristan and Isolde
programme.desc: Sodan erottamat Tristan ja Isolde joutuvat pitamaan tunteensa kurissa rauhan ja Englannin tulevaisuuden takia. Mutta mita enemman he kieltavat tunteensa, sita vahvempina ne vellovat....

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Matrix 4, Spartacus ja NCIS: New Orleansistakin tuttu Ellen Hollman elamansa roolissa henkihieveriin piestyna naisena, jonka kosto on armoton ja perinpohjainen. Nuori pariskunta lahtee telttailemaan Alabaman metsiin, mutta romanttinen irtiotto arjesta menee kammottavalla tavalla pieleen, kun he tormaavat vakivaltaiseen huumekartelliin. Kartellin miehet tappavat Brennerin aviomiehen Dillonin (Matt Passmore) ja jattavat Brennerin kuolemaan - tai ainakin luulivat jattavansa. Kaikkensa menettanyt Brenner lahtee kostoretkelle, jota kukaan ei osannut odottaa ja jolta yksikaan ei voi valttya. Rajahtavaa toimintaa, joka intensiteetillaan naulitsee katsojan penkkiin jo alkumetreilta!

programme.title: Puhdistaja (Walking Tall)
programme.desc: Kun on kyse lain noudattamisesta, yksi mies voi tehda eron! Toimintatahti Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson ei ota vankeja taistellessaan oikeuden puolesta ja murskatessaan korruptiota tassa tarinassa miehesta, joka ottaa kantaa… ja ottaa kaupunkinsa takaisin!

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: Tulevaisuudessa, jossa aika on kirjaimellisesti rahaa ja ikaantyminen pysahtyy 25 vuoteen, ainoa tapa pysya hengissa on ansaita, varastaa tai peria enemman aikaa. Will Salas elaa minuutti kerrallaan, kunnes yllatysvoitto aikaa antaa hanelle paasyn varakkaiden maailmaan, jossa han ryhtyy yhteistyohon kauniin nuoren perijattaren kanssa tuhotakseen korruptoituneen jarjestelman.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and Candace get married in the Ice Castle. A frustrated Chuck tries to get the Electra to pay her way. A flummoxed Mikey tries to bake a cake for Joes birthday.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After thousands of hours of painstaking preparation and dangerous flying, a terrible accident devastates the waterbomber crew in Turkey - and everyone at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When her husband quits after a blowout with Joe, Kelly is put in a terrible position. Will she stay at Buffalo - or will she go?

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head off to Coventry, England to navigate the potential purchase of an Electra turboprop to add to Buffalos fleet of fire-fighting tanker planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After her husbands acrimonious departure from Buffalo, Kelly has a confrontation that decides whether she, too, will quit.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a deadly fire destroys a northern outpost a week before Christmas, Buffalo puts everything aside to come to the rescue.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The curse of -40 hits Buffalo pilots Devan and Scott on a food mail flight up the Mackenzie Valley when a mysterious rise in oil pressure threatens to destroy one of the C-46s engines.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey goes on a treasure hunt to Venezuela for a rare CL-215 waterbomber.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A vital ferry link is down, so Buffalo mounts an all-out campaign to airlift 100,000lbs of essential goods across the Mackenzie River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A multi-stop mission to the Far North has Devan, Scott and Adam facing a series of white- knuckle obstacles.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Young pilots AJ and Andrew get the chance of a lifetime to fly the magnificent DC-3 specially equipped with skis to land on frozen strips.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo scores the charter of a lifetime when theyre asked to transport the Stanley Cup on a tour of the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Chief pilot Arnie lands the DC-3 on a homemade sand strip at a remote lodge; Electra expert Chuck faces off with a stubborn power unit; Rods wife Sasha goes into labor.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: While training waterbomber captains for the upcoming fire-fighting season, Chief Pilot Arnie makes a surprising decision.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe hires Duane Hicks to help Buffalo navigate the future and coach Mikey; a DC-3 delivery mission goes awry when blizzard conditions and a broken oil cooler force an emergency landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo gets into the stunt flying business when veteran pilot Arnie flies the DC-4 for the re- enactment scene of a famous WWII bombing raid.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Frustrated with her lack of flying and stuck in a rut as a courier driver, Audrey decides her time at Buffalo is over.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra flies to Alert, the northernmost settlement on Earth, forcing Adam and new senior manager Duane to work things out.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Sparks fly when Joe discovers Gord has taken a job with a rival airline after completing expensive training on one of the Buffalo planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Trying to make his mark at Buffalo, Duane lands two more Electra contracts.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duanes decision to leave the Electra crew unsupervised while he spends time at home jeopardizes the completion of a major contract, and could cost him his job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie waterbomber pilot Scott gets his first taste of action when Buffalo responds to an emergency callout to fight fires in Alberta.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When Yellowknife and the northern aviation community are rocked by three crashes in the space of a month, Joe places an extra emphasis on safety.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe receives a negative visit from Transport Canada when inspectors threaten to shut down the airline.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After taking command of an intense airlift, and dealing with the ugliest Electra load hes ever seen, Scott takes a scary fall on the icy tarmac.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A week before Christmas, Buffalo agrees to lend a hand to an RCMP initiative to fly toys to isolated communities in the north.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Just months from retiring, Electra captain Ray Weber leads his crew on a multi-trip mission that requires landing on a rough ice strip on a remote lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When South Korean buyers come to Buffalo to look at a water bomber, the pressure is on mechanic Cory to get the plane ready.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: In South Korea, Cory and Justin meet the ship delivering Buffalos water bomber plane to new buyers there.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As spring arrives and Rays retirement day approaches, Sean surprises everyone by leaving Buffalo for a job with the competition.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Greenlands Narsarsuaq airport - known as one the worlds most dangerous approaches - looms on the horizon as Cory and Justin begin a trans-global journey to deliver two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey hire a helicopter for a salvage mission to retrieve the rare tailpiece from a Lockheed 10-A that crashed in the Yellowknife woods forty years ago.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory are stranded in Croatia while trying to complete the delivery of two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot David faces a remote Arctic airstrip with sketchy landing gear. Mikey drafts a Buffalo hockey team to face off against an NHL squad in a charity shootout. Chuck gets a chance to shine on the ice.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe races a quirky antique snowmobile - with an airplane engine and no brakes. The water bomber crew struggles to get two planes out of Turkey. Cocky rampie Chris Staples tries to prove himself in the C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A cold snap triggers massive challenges. Devan runs into gear problems while he ferries a mothballed DC-3 across the country. And Justin has to make a snap decision with his newborn son aboard his plane.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra returns from repairs and the crew takes it right back to the ice strip that it set off from before the crash landing last year. Tyler works up the courage to confront Joe about a big decision. A hotshot Australian pilot tries to earn a job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey trains for High Arctic survival with the Canadian Rangers. The Air Force invades Chucks hangar. Joe faces tough competition at a California plane auction.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and James battle a DC-4 engine fire. Its Joes 69th birthday - and hes never flown a helicopter before, so Mikey plans a special gift of chopper flight lessons.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Cory, Chuck and Brian watch as a 5,000-pound power unit smash to the ground, denting the Electra and putting it out of commission. Mikey scrambles to manage the crisis while Joe races to England to try and purchase a backup Electra.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Co-pilot Graemes fumbles his Electra training landings. Chris stresses over his C-46 check ride. Adam rescues a stranded C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe flies with the Snowbirds during the Hamilton air show and later teaches Mikey to fly. A surprise departure shakes up Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Ice Pilots NWT celebrates a milestone with a look back at the last five years, a peek behind the camera and reflections from the Buffalo crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: An engine fire and series of mechanical gremlins has Buffalo scrambling to make its Christmas deliveries. Newest rampie Prefkar Mony struggles with life in the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos Electra aircraft is hammered by rough winds up the Mackenzie Valley. In Hay River, a rookie crew faces the worst ice storm in years and one rampie has a tough go trying to fit in at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe leaves to undergo medical tests at the Mayo Clinic in Phoenix, Arizona. Jeff and Sam stress over their DC-3 checkflights and Joe celebrates turning 70-his way.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie pilot Jeff nearly runs off the runway. Prefkar learns to play hockey but drops the ball at Buffalo and Joe goes on a date with a real dog.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey decides to get Buffalo involved in a D-Day paratrooper jump to commemorate the 70th anniversary of D-Day.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos top guns, rookies and vets, go to California for aerial dogfights in real fighter planes. Cory and Mikey race to get ready for the D-Day jump.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot Scott faces his worst nightmare when a faltering Curtiss C-46 Commando engine and low fog force a scary landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Christmas is just around the corner, but Buffalos crucial food and mail runs come to a halt.
