programme.title: To Beep, or Not to Beep
programme.sub-title: S11 : E08 Graveyard Carz S11 - "To Beep, or Not to Beep"
programme.desc: While the ghouls finish up the ornamentation and chrome moldings for the 1969 GTX, Cousin Dougie enlists the Greenhorns help to disassemble our first 1970 Road Runner - with careful precision to hopefully find the cars broadcast sheet.

programme.title: Surviving a Bear Attack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Survival Science S1 - "Surviving a Bear Attack"
programme.desc: Nick and Laura create kick-ass tests to explore the immense power and startling speed of grizzly bears. They use Hollywood stunt tools to experience an attack. Then try to recreate a “miracle” arrow shot that saved a man from being killed by a bear.

programme.title: Surviving Treestand Accidents
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Survival Science S1 - "Surviving Treestand Accidents"
programme.desc: In this exciting episode we’ll find out the reasons why tree stand accidents happen and how we can prevent them. Cool science mixed with dynamic experiments send our hosts, our stunt team and our special crash test dummies plummeting to the ground.

programme.title: The Struggle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Trail S1 - "The Struggle"
programme.desc: Laramy remains stuck at Camp Hell Hole, nursing 7s leg, and struggling to survive in the freezing temperatures without food.

programme.title: On the Move
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Trail S1 - "On the Move"
programme.desc: Laramy and 7 leave camp Hell Hole and hit the trail again. They are headed for lower elevation in search of a more permanent place to call home.

programme.title: Pyrenees Mountains
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Man Eats Wild S3 - "Pyrenees Mountains"
programme.desc: Mario ventures high into the Pyrenees mountain range in search of the elusive chamois, and decides to meet up with an old friend who is one of Frances best wine makers.

programme.title: Like Father, Like Son
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Man Eats Wild S3 - "Like Father, Like Son"
programme.desc: In Cordoba, Argentina doves and pigeons are considered to be in plague proportions and culling them is necessary to maintain balance in the region... however, things turn a little competitive when Mario brings his dad to help.

programme.title: The Lateral Line
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "The Lateral Line"
programme.desc: Old friends Michael Keaton and Tom McGuane share a boat together, which means there will be plenty of action and plenty of laughts. Bonefish and Tarpon Trusts Aaron Adams helps Zach Gilford dance with a tarpon for the first time.

programme.title: Rising Tides
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Rising Tides"
programme.desc: Off the coast of Belize, the group of anglers continue their pursuit of bonefish and tarpon. Michael Keaton and Zach Gilford chase tarpon, while Bill Klyn and Yvon Chouinard are after bone. We also share a boat with Aaron Adams and Tom McGuane.

programme.title: Day One Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day One Pt. 1"
programme.desc: Day one begins as the four 2-man teams blast off from Hurricane Hole Marina in Key West with nine different cameras rolling on all the action including helicopter and underwater cameras.

programme.title: Day One Pt. 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day One Pt. 2"
programme.desc: Day one continues as the four teams search for huge hungry sharks in the beautiful waters of the coast of Key West, Florida.

programme.title: Just Another Fijian
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Just Another Fijian"
programme.desc: Dwane and Jools are joined by their pint sized proteges this week, as 12-year-olds Eli and Reef tag along on the adventure with the old men on a mission to explore the far flung waters of North Eastern Fiji.

programme.title: Fiat 500
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Fiat 500"
programme.desc: Mat Watson is asked to track down a Fiat 500 for a client with a tiny garage, but finding a good example of this little motor proves a massive challenge.

programme.title: Porsche 911
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Porsche 911"
programme.desc: Mat Watson crosses Europe in search of the ultimate seventies sports car, as he hunts down the iconic Porsche 911.

programme.title: Crushed By A Boulder - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Fight to Survive S3 - "Crushed By A Boulder - Part 1"
programme.desc: While solo climbing Mt. Goddard, a remote peak in the California Sierra, Gregg Hein’s leg is crushed by a boulder and he’s sent careening down the mountain. Barely able to stop his fall, he’s now faced with a horrific compound fracture.

programme.title: Crushed By A Boulder - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Fight to Survive S3 - "Crushed By A Boulder - Part 2"
programme.desc: After his leg is crushed by a boulder, Gregg Hein is stranded on a high Sierra peak with an infected compound fracture. Knowing he won’t be reported missing for days, Gregg attempts to crawl off the mountain and rescue himself.

programme.title: Iraqi Sniper Attack
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Fight to Survive S3 - "Iraqi Sniper Attack"
programme.desc: On deployment in Anbar Province, Marine Corp Master Sergeant Buck Doyle throws himself in harms way to save a fallen comrade from an Iraqi sniper and becomes a target himself. This is a story of survival on and off the battlefield.

programme.title: Fish Tales Fly Shop (Calgary Alberta)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E08 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Fish Tales Fly Shop (Calgary Alberta)"
programme.desc: Jenna McKeown visits Calgary Alberta to fish the Bow River. This is one of the few rivers in the world that runs through a major city yet has excellent fishing.

programme.title: Snowshoe Camp Resort (Algoma)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E09 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Snowshoe Camp Resort (Algoma)"
programme.desc: Mikey Metcalfe and Mark Melnyk are hunting for giant smallmouth bass, even a record, on a fly. They visit one of the best areas to do so in Ontario.

programme.title: The Lodge At Palisades Creek (Idaho)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E10 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "The Lodge At Palisades Creek (Idaho)"
programme.desc: This region of Idaho has become famed for the trout fishing and variety of locations to do it. Mark Melnyk explores this area with one of the top guides.

programme.title: Moldova
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 Road Less Traveled S3 - "Moldova"
programme.desc: Jonathan enters Europe’s poorest country with a purpose: Enter the little know breakaway Soviet Republic of Transnistria with a “package.” for a friend. It’s a journey that will begin with urban exploration in the decay of Bucharest and end with close calls with secret police in Tiraspol.

programme.title: Horses Can Think... Rafts Cant
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Horses Can Think... Rafts Cant"
programme.desc: Episode two begins where one left off, with Casey facing a decision. Positioned precariously on the mountain, they realize the ram theyre chasing isnt legal, forcing them to retreat.

programme.title: Band of Ten
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Band of Ten"
programme.desc: In episode three, the crew encounters a canyon with ten rams, sparking initial excitement. However, the subsequent desappointment sets in as none of the rams meet the legal criteria.

programme.title: Now or Never
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Now or Never"
programme.desc: As the fog passes on the peak of Fish Hooks rocky face, the outline of the crew appears exactly where the ram was bedded last. Did they shoot and Chris not hear the shot?

programme.title: Hunger Pains
programme.desc: Symptoms of starvation have set in for Chris and Casey, who haven’t eaten in days. When they cross paths with a grouse, the unexpected happens. Frustration peaks as the temperatures drop. The brothers set up a new camp, but will it help the hunt?

programme.title: White Out
programme.desc: With still no big game in sight, Chris and Casey are forced to rely on fishing for food. The cold temperatures have slowed down the fish, creating challenges. When Mother Nature brings a brutal snow storm, the brothers are tested like never before.

programme.title: Motherly Love
programme.desc: After weeks of trying to survive in Saskatchewan, Chris and Casey have yet to kill big game. Time is running out as the bear begin to hibernate. Mental willpower is wearing thin. But a message from back home changes everything.

programme.title: Nicosia
programme.desc: Josh is in Cyprus for a local exploring adventure across the island on a roadtrip from Nicosia to an abandoned amusement park, an asbestos mine and a shipwreck.

programme.title: New Orleans
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Epic Exploring S2 - "New Orleans"
programme.desc: Cody is with Lexi Limitless in the ‘Big Easy’ to explore New Orleans, visiting an abandoned Charity Hospital before meeting Brutus, the giant alligator.

programme.title: Yerevan
programme.desc: Josh goes local exploring in Armenia and its capital Yerevan, visiting some amazing abandoned Soviet buildings, a knitting factory and a luxurious hotel.

programme.title: The Good the Bad and Terry
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S1 - "The Good the Bad and Terry"
programme.desc: In this classic western, Clint Eastwood – aka “Blondie” – saves Eli Wallach from the hangman’s noose three separate times by shooting and severing the rope that he hangs from. We test the reality of these shots with the weapons that were used.

programme.title: Dying Hard
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S1 - "Dying Hard"
programme.desc: John McLain (Bruce Willis) finds himself dangling from the side of a building. The only way to save himself is to shoot through the glass window and break through to safety.

programme.title: Schapbo
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S1 - "Schapbo"
programme.desc: John Rambo’s ability to decimate enemies all by himself has created some of the most incredible weapon stunts in Hollywood history. We test the reality surrounding these iconic scenes from this blockbuster franchise.

programme.title: FMX Nomads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 FMX Nomads S1 - "FMX Nomads"
programme.desc: Join Dan Whitby, Samson Eaton and Arran Powley for a day in the life of globetrotting freestyle motocross team, Bolddog.

programme.title: Snowshoe Camp Resort (Algoma)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E09 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Snowshoe Camp Resort (Algoma)"
programme.desc: Mikey Metcalfe and Mark Melnyk are hunting for giant smallmouth bass, even a record, on a fly. They visit one of the best areas to do so in Ontario.

programme.title: The Lodge At Palisades Creek (Idaho)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E10 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "The Lodge At Palisades Creek (Idaho)"
programme.desc: This region of Idaho has become famed for the trout fishing and variety of locations to do it. Mark Melnyk explores this area with one of the top guides.

programme.title: Moldova
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 Road Less Traveled S3 - "Moldova"
programme.desc: Jonathan enters Europe’s poorest country with a purpose: Enter the little know breakaway Soviet Republic of Transnistria with a “package.” for a friend. It’s a journey that will begin with urban exploration in the decay of Bucharest and end with close calls with secret police in Tiraspol.

programme.title: Meet Island Air
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Meet Island Air"
programme.desc: Veteran bush pilot Bob Stanford risks everything to save hunters struggling to stay alive in a remote area of Kodiak.

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Fight or Flight"
programme.desc: While on a routine sightseeing flight, a massive storm has the pilots fighting to keep control of the craft and keep their passengers safe.

programme.title: Deadmans Survival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Deadmans Survival"
programme.desc: Island Air battles time and elements, to rescue a group trapped in Deadmans Bay.

programme.title: Day 4
programme.desc: Jalou and Kevin travel to far colder places to challenge each other in an ice climbing competition.

programme.title: Day 5
programme.desc: In the Chinese desert, Kevin finds out that desert racing is difficult. While in Bolivia, Jalou wants to prove to her brother that women can be better drivers.

programme.title: Back Country
programme.desc: Wardens do way more than just drive around in trucks and check licenses. This week the region one wardens go off grid to protect Montanas natural resources.

programme.title: Double Kill
programme.desc: Region 5 has a rash of illegal elk kills and its up to the Wardens to investigate the Double Kills.

programme.title: Winter Largemouth
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Hunt for Monster Bass S1 - "Winter Largemouth"
programme.desc: Host Ott DeFoe hunts down double-digit Largemouth Bass in the dead of winter in Tennessee.

programme.title: Blue Dot on the Map
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Hunt for Monster Bass S1 - "Blue Dot on the Map"
programme.desc: Host Ott DeFoe hunts down double-digit Largemouth Bass in a lake locked off in time in northern Florida.

programme.title: IDENTITY CRISIS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Bottom Feeders S1 - "IDENTITY CRISIS"
programme.desc: Its the first week of April in the upper midwest. Our fisherman are looking for record setting hauls while market is still high.

programme.title: THE NEW GENERATION
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Bottom Feeders S1 - "THE NEW GENERATION"
programme.desc: Everyone deals with harsh conditions as Mike and his son work a tough Lake Pepin, Jedd and his father cant seem to see eye to eye in Wisconsin and Tim heads out with a first timer only to come up pretty much empty handed.

programme.title: Road to Gymkhana Grid
programme.desc: Road to Gymkhana Grid is a feature documentary following eight world-class drivers journey to South Africa to compete in the world drifting championship event.

programme.title: Sniper Attack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Survival Science S1 - "Sniper Attack"
programme.desc: Military snipers are trained in a variety of skills: detection, stalking, camouflage, infiltration, special reconnaissance and target acquisition. Bottom line, a ton of cool shooting and science for Nick and Laura to explore!

programme.title: Surviving a Lightning Strike
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Survival Science S1 - "Surviving a Lightning Strike"
programme.desc: Laura and Nick travel to a state-of-the-art Direct Effects Lightning Test Lab. With some “explosive” experiments, they’ll determine the power lightning and how it behaves? And they’ll find out how can hunters and fishermen best protect themselves?

programme.title: Record Day - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Record Day - Part 1"
programme.desc: The transformation is complete and it’s time for The Flying Kestrel to be put to the test.

programme.title: Permanent Residence
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Trail S1 - "Permanent Residence"
programme.desc: Laramy and 7 find a long term camping spot out of the snow and at a lower elevation. Laramy gets to work making a more permanent shelter and looking for food.

programme.title: Focused on Food
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 The Trail S1 - "Focused on Food"
programme.desc: Laramy locates some whitetail deer and focuses his efforts on hunting them.

programme.title: Thriving
programme.desc: Stocked up on food, Laramy and 7 thrive at their new location. Laramy focuses on building some amenities to make life easier on The Trail.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: The team battles high winds in the heli to save a snowmobiler with a busted femur.

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: Unprecedented three rescues in under twelve hours.

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: Jamie puts his trust in new explosives technology.

programme.title: Record Day - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Record Day - Part 2"
programme.desc: The Flying Kestrel takes on the final records attempts, and the shocking results leave everyone reeling.

programme.title: Empty Handed
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers put boots to ground as their journey through Alaska begins. Armed with nothing but a couple Glock 20s, the brothers immediately begin their search for their first supply-yielding cache.

programme.title: Long Days, Cold Nights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Dropped S1 - "Long Days, Cold Nights"
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers awaken to a frozen tundra. With over 8 miles to cover and no oars, the brothers are forced to trudge their way through shallow water and barren earth as they head downstream in search of they second cache.

programme.title: Choke Point
programme.desc: The terrain begins to change as the Keefer brothers are forced to pick their way downstream. The landscape tightens it’s grip and funnels the brothers to a geographic choke point where both predator and prey gather.

programme.title: Bone-Weary
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers take shelter in a small pine outcropping as a winter storm sets siege to the river. Forced to wait out the arctic blast, the brothers try and retain what little energy they have left.

programme.title: The Broads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Hunting Fish S1 - "The Broads"
programme.desc: Thom hunt is challenged to hunt the mighty Pike in the Uk’s Norfolk Broads.

programme.title: Extremadura
programme.desc: Thom hunt is challenged to hunt a record-breaking Barbel in the Spain’s striking Extremadura.

programme.title: UK
programme.desc: Thom hunt challenges himself to locate and catch four UK species in one week.

programme.title: Iberia Truffle Ibex
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Man Eats Wild S3 - "Iberia Truffle Ibex"
programme.desc: Mario finds the help of a local Spanish baker to lead him high into the Becite mountain after Iberian Ibex, but he must first forage for truffles in order to make a European style pasta with the offal of this cagey mountain goat.

programme.title: Wild West Atacama
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Man Eats Wild S3 - "Wild West Atacama"
programme.desc: Mario ventures into the Atacama desert of Chile, where the volatile land filled with volcanic mountains and unforgiving terrain becomes a brutal mission that leaves him repelling down massive waterfalls to discover active puma dens.

programme.title: Argentina Asado
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Man Eats Wild S3 - "Argentina Asado"
programme.desc: Mario sets out into the La Pampa region of Argentina to share the bounty of his hard work harvesting wild food over a classic Asado with a beautiful local family.

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Fighting Fish"
programme.desc: Angling experts Lori-Ann Murphy and Aaron Adams prove that catching a tarpon is no easy feat as they try to land a silver king in the Florida Keys. Dr. Jerry Ault discusses the research underway as scientists try to unravel the mysteries of these fish.

programme.title: Tippets and Leaders
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Tippets and Leaders"
programme.desc: The teams goal of landing and tagging a mature tarpon is fulfilled, as one of the anglers lands a 60lbs silver king. Michael Keaton and Yvon Choulnard spend time wading throught the flats together and we look back on the week spend in Belize.

programme.title: Lightning Strike
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Fight to Survive S3 - "Lightning Strike"
programme.desc: A bass fishing trip goes horribly wrong when a bolt of lightning strikes their boat, leaving Seventeen-year-old Christian Neal burned and unconscious and his father Gabe blown into the water and paralyzed. It will take a miracle to save them.

programme.title: Mountain Lion Attack
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Fight to Survive S3 - "Mountain Lion Attack"
programme.desc: Marine Anne Hjelle was mountain biking when she was ripped off her bike by a mountain lion. Anne fought back even as the big cat shredded her face in its jaws. Surviving the attack was only the beginning of Anne’s incredible fight to survive.

programme.title: Soul Of A Survivor
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Fight to Survive S3 - "Soul Of A Survivor"
programme.desc: Craig DeMartino examines the stories of other survivors he’s met across the season. Their survival stories are all different, but Craig discovers that these survivors share more in common than you might think.

programme.title: End of the Road
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Extreme Iceland S1 - "End of the Road"
programme.desc: Mike Wilson’s epic adventure in Iceland is almost over, but he has plans to end on a high: base jumping over the Solheimajokull glacier.

programme.title: Empty Handed
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers put boots to ground as their journey through Alaska begins. Armed with nothing but a couple Glock 20s, the brothers immediately begin their search for their first supply-yielding cache.

programme.title: Long Days, Cold Nights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Dropped S1 - "Long Days, Cold Nights"
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers awaken to a frozen tundra. With over 8 miles to cover and no oars, the brothers are forced to trudge their way through shallow water and barren earth as they head downstream in search of they second cache.

programme.title: Choke Point
programme.desc: The terrain begins to change as the Keefer brothers are forced to pick their way downstream. The landscape tightens it’s grip and funnels the brothers to a geographic choke point where both predator and prey gather.

programme.title: Bone-Weary
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers take shelter in a small pine outcropping as a winter storm sets siege to the river. Forced to wait out the arctic blast, the brothers try and retain what little energy they have left.

programme.title: Saddles Sores
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Saddles Sores"
programme.desc: Leaving sheep country on a high, the men face a daunting 22-hour trail ride to Tom-Tom, the first moose camp. Two days of riding loom a head before reaching their destination. However, trouble strikes just eight hours into the journey.

programme.title: Church on the Mountain
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Church on the Mountain"
programme.desc: In the Yukon, decisions are pivotal and amplified in its rugged terrain. The brothers close in on a giant grizzly, now within 500 yards, with the decision lying in Chriss hands.

programme.title: Valley of Snow
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Valley of Snow"
programme.desc: Snow relentlessly pounds the Keefer brothers at Church Camp, reducing visibility to an all-time low. Theyre snowed in with timetable to resume the hunt, as many problems start to surface.

programme.title: Day Two Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Two Pt. 1"
programme.desc: Day two of the Madfin Shark Series begins, as its becoming clearer which of our four 2-man teams will have to do whatever it takes to not be in last place and being eliminated. Hurricane Hole Marina in Key West sees the sharks finding captains idle.

programme.title: Day Two Pt.2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Two Pt.2"
programme.desc: Day two and the battle continues on the Madfin Shark Series. Four of our 2-man teams are catching and releasing the biggest and most dangerous sharks they can for the most points they can accrue. After today, one team will be sent home and eliminated.

programme.title: Day Three Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Three Pt. 1"
programme.desc: Its the third and final day of competition for the remaining 3 teams in this intense shark tournament. See how the first half of the day turns out.

programme.title: Three Kings Redemption
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Three Kings Redemption"
programme.desc: After a break of dawn beach launch off the tip of 90 Mile Beach, the team punch north to the legendary Three Kings Islands, home to dozens of record calibre fish, and in the process, bag a couple of new records for themselves.

programme.title: Gary, Indiana
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Epic Exploring S2 - "Gary, Indiana"
programme.desc: Josh is back in Gary, Indiana, for a local exploring adventure. With friends, he visits a former bank, the memorial auditorium and Union Train Station.

programme.title: Zagreb
programme.desc: Epic Exploring: Going Local visits Zagreb, Croatia. Cody fires a canon from the old tower, explores a never finished University Hospital and a political school.

programme.title: Copenhagen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Running the World S1 - "Copenhagen"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to Copenhagen to meet up with a local free runner and undertake an epic run of Tivoli Gardens.

programme.title: London
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Running the World S1 - "London"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to London where they are challenged to create a run in the Olympic Park.

programme.title: Day 5
programme.desc: In the Chinese desert, Kevin finds out that desert racing is difficult. While in Bolivia, Jalou wants to prove to her brother that women can be better drivers.

programme.title: Deepaks Italy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Car and Country Quest - 30 Min Version S1 - "Deepaks Italy"
programme.desc: The trio experience gladiator combat, drive classic cars through the countryside, and learn winemaking in Barolo. The adventure also includes motocross thrills, blending history, culture, and excitement throughout northern Italy.

programme.title: Ashiques Italy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Car and Country Quest - 30 Min Version S1 - "Ashiques Italy"
programme.desc: Ashique surprises the team with Vespa rides along the coast, adapts plans with an aquarium visit, and arranges a Fiat 500 countryside drive. The day ends with relaxation at a Roman spa.

programme.title: Family Values
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Family Values"
programme.desc: A new generation of female chargers band together to compete in a unique big wave surfing ‘expression session’ on the north shore of Oahu.

programme.title: Skullbase
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Skullbase"
programme.desc: The Walsh twins reveal why water safety crews and rescue teams are the unsung heroes of big wave surfing.

programme.title: Goma, Congo
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Goma, Congo"
programme.desc: Bboy Junior is going back where he was born, The Democratic Republic of Congo. World champion Shigekix will join him, visiting Africa for the first time. Together they will explore the dance culture in the city of Goma.

programme.title: Layla Kerley and Bruno Compagnet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Capturing Winter S1 - "Layla Kerley and Bruno Compagnet"
programme.desc: Layla Kerley is a self-taught adventure photographer and one of the few females in her field. Together with Bruno Compagnet, co-founder of freeski brand Blackcrows, they plan to traverse one of the last wildernesses in Europe: the Italian Dolomites.

programme.title: New Jersey
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 A Simple Path S3 - "New Jersey"
programme.desc: Yann delves into New Jerseys skateboarding culture, meeting skateboarders who are into, fashion, horror, comedy, tattooing, and rug-making. He explores NJ Skate Shop and Freedom Skate Park, encountering Fred Gall and Brian Anderson.

programme.title: Philadelphia
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 A Simple Path S3 - "Philadelphia"
programme.desc: Yann immerses himself in Philadelphias skateboarding culture. He explores Nocturnal Skate Shop eats a Philly cheesesteak, visits Cloud 9 pottery studio, admires Adams art collection, skates with Celina, and experiences the creativity of FDR.

programme.title: St. Petersburg
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 A Simple Path S3 - "St. Petersburg"
programme.desc: Yann explores St. Petersburgs skateboarding community, visiting Anchor Skate shop and meeting Jay Turner, Kris Markovitch, Jake White, Naomi Glueck, Evan Starkey, and Alex Charos. He highlights creativity, self-expression, and the vibrant community.

programme.title: Mexico City
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Running the World S1 - "Mexico City"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave race through an 18th century monastery on the outskirts of Mexico City and whoever rings the bell in the tower first wins.

programme.title: Gran Canaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Running the World S1 - "Gran Canaria"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave are challenged to create a run through an abandoned water park on the island of Gran Canaria.

programme.title: Jamaica
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Running the World S1 - "Jamaica"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave are challenged to create a unique run in an unusal setting on the Island of Jamaica.

programme.title: Real Love at Badrinath
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Road to Dharma S1 - "Real Love at Badrinath"
programme.desc: Badrinath – Reverberating with thousands of years of yogic wisdom… But Jeff won’t even wear a helmet. “You try and talk to him, he won’t listen to me,” says Jen. The ebb and flow of relationships and how to sustain them is found here in Badrinath.

programme.title: True Power in the Hidden Valley of the Flowers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Road to Dharma S1 - "True Power in the Hidden Valley of the Flowers"
programme.desc: Before Riding to the Hidden Valley of the Flowers, we get a rare view of the hidden life of the riders in this “real world of yogis” opening scene.

programme.title: Unity at Hemkund Sahib
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 The Road to Dharma S1 - "Unity at Hemkund Sahib"
programme.desc: A rare in off the cuff dialogue with Anand at breakfast about his father and the true meaning of wealth, sex, power, fame… Then an epic hike up to 15,000 feet and a temple dedicated to service and unity at Hemkund Sahib and its glacial lake.

programme.title: Somalisa Expeditions Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Somalisa Expeditions Camp"
programme.desc: Upon arrival in Zimbabwe, Kristina Guberman travels to Hwange National Park - renowned for it’s impressive elephant herds. She learns about these gentle giants, encounters cheetah on foot and chances upon a cheetah hunt with her guide, David.

programme.title: Mana Pools and Chitake Spring
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Mana Pools and Chitake Spring"
programme.desc: Kristina travels to the Mana Pools and Chitake Springs with guide Craig van Zyl. They come across mating lions, wild dogs, have close encounters with bull elephants, and canoe just meters away from imposing hippos and crocodiles on the Zambezi River.

programme.title: Victoria Falls
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Victoria Falls"
programme.desc: Kristina gets to tick off one of her bucket list dreams – the majestic Victoria Falls. Her guide Beano walks her through the history of the falls formation and they encounter some of the wildlife that live in the surrounding area.

programme.title: Arizona
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 My Van Life S1 - "Arizona"
programme.desc: Lisa spontaneously joins a sober dance party on a mountain top in Sedona, and meets spiritual Van Lifers who have dramatically changed their entire existence, including former NFL player Joe Hawley, and a transformative breathwork practitioner.

programme.title: Utah
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 My Van Life S1 - "Utah"
programme.desc: Lisa heads to Utah, the ultimate playground for Van Life adrenaline junkies: aka Dirt Bags. Base jumper Derrick shows that by confronting death, it helps us appreciate life. We meet a solo female traveler who challenges Lisa by taking her bouldering.

programme.title: Nevada
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 My Van Life S1 - "Nevada"
programme.desc: Lisa meets off-grid desert nomads turning to this lifestyle out of necessity rather than choice. Van Life rebels rule in Slab City, while in Nevada, Bob Wells - the godfather of Van Life - helps thousands turn to nomadic life when in dire straits.

programme.title: One More Round
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Love On The Rocks S1 - "One More Round"
programme.desc: A relaxing trip to Orcas Island takes a turn for the worst when plans begin to fall through; including the ferry ride back to the mainland. This mishap may leave them stranded for longer than expected, putting their final summit attempt at risk.

programme.title: The Honeymoon is Over
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Love On The Rocks S1 - "The Honeymoon is Over"
programme.desc: Tayler and Jason take on their final peak in Washington State, Mt Baker. Tayler struggles when Jason explains all the things that could go wrong, but the reality is a lot could fail if they dont come together as a team.

programme.title: Alison Strong
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Back Home S1 - "Alison Strong"
programme.desc: Join Alison Strong as she travels back home to Colombia to get a closer look at her ancestors.

programme.title: Andrew Kennedy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Back Home S1 - "Andrew Kennedy"
programme.desc: Comedian Andrew Kennedy returns to the country he left shortly after birth, Colombia, to explore his roots and even try his hand at standup comedy - in Spanish.

programme.title: Nicole Chavez
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Back Home S1 - "Nicole Chavez"
programme.desc: Join stylist to the stars, Nicole Chavez, as she travels back home to Mexico to learn about the amazing fashion and styles of her grandparents birthplace.

programme.title: Albania/Kosovo
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 Road Less Traveled S3 - "Albania/Kosovo"
programme.desc: In the month of Movember Jonathan begins his first Balkan adventure. Growing a mustache for charity and exploring the concept of what it means to be a man. He begins in Albania, where strange bomb shelters dot the land. Was there a panic tantamount to America’s Cuban Missile Crisis? There he meets his first manly men.. rally race car drivers who take him on their beasty machines through gnarly back roads.

programme.title: Panna: Land of the Dhole
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Journeys in India S2 - "Panna: Land of the Dhole"
programme.desc: Over the years, Bill has been able to find and film all of the great predators of India, but one—the wild Asiatic Dog or Dhole. These illusive and endangered canines have rarely been captured on camera.

programme.title: Ahmedabad: Land of Gandhi
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Journeys in India S2 - "Ahmedabad: Land of Gandhi"
programme.desc: There is no figure in Indian history that rivals Gandhi. Bill explores the land Gandhi called home and in the process, learns about the man himself. But Ahmedabad is more than Gandhi…its rich history and unusual architecture is revealed.

programme.title: St. Petersburg
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Street Art Challenge S1 - "St. Petersburg"
programme.desc: English and South American street artists pair up to take on an epic challenge in the worlds biggest country, Russia. The men have to finish a complete circus.

programme.title: Athens
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Athens"
programme.desc: Two American street artists try to turn a school into a piece of art. Seems impossible, but this duo turns out to be a real American Dream Team.

programme.title: Bangalore
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Bangalore"
programme.desc: Two worlds collide in one of the busiest cities in the world when Mexico’s most famous street artist is meeting his equivalent on their home turf in India.

programme.title: Sao Paulo, Brazil
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Sao Paulo, Brazil"
programme.desc: Russian Bgirl Kastet is visiting Sao Paulo, the home of Bboy Neguin. Together they will explore the dance, breaking and hip hop culture in the streets of Sao Paulo. Meeting up with legends and learning Capoeira, Jiu Jitsu and Passinho.

programme.title: Albania/Kosovo
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 Road Less Traveled S3 - "Albania/Kosovo"
programme.desc: In the month of Movember Jonathan begins his first Balkan adventure. Growing a mustache for charity and exploring the concept of what it means to be a man. He begins in Albania, where strange bomb shelters dot the land. Was there a panic tantamount to America’s Cuban Missile Crisis? There he meets his first manly men.. rally race car drivers who take him on their beasty machines through gnarly back roads.

programme.title: Panna: Land of the Dhole
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Journeys in India S2 - "Panna: Land of the Dhole"
programme.desc: Over the years, Bill has been able to find and film all of the great predators of India, but one—the wild Asiatic Dog or Dhole. These illusive and endangered canines have rarely been captured on camera.

programme.title: Ahmedabad: Land of Gandhi
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Journeys in India S2 - "Ahmedabad: Land of Gandhi"
programme.desc: There is no figure in Indian history that rivals Gandhi. Bill explores the land Gandhi called home and in the process, learns about the man himself. But Ahmedabad is more than Gandhi…its rich history and unusual architecture is revealed.

programme.title: Paris
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx travels to Paris, the city of love, for inspiration and discovers its diversity and a creative trend called retrofuture.

programme.title: Berlin
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx journeys Berlin, one of the worlds undisputed techno capitals, and discovers the sound of freedom buried in its history.

programme.title: Dubai: 24 hour layover in the desert
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Maximum Foodie S3 - "Dubai: 24 hour layover in the desert"
programme.desc: Sashi is doing something he’s never done! A layover style episode. He’s got just 24 hours in the desert metropolis of Dubai. After seeking out the hive of human activity at Dubai’s bustling souks, Sashi does the absolute opposite, by venturing out in the desert.

programme.title: US Virgin Islands
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Maximum Foodie S3 - "US Virgin Islands"
programme.desc: The US Virgin Islands is one of the most popular destinations in the Caribbean - how about their cuisine? With a true blue Jeep 4x4, Sashi explores the chains of islands, learning stories of local cuisines, brand new distilleries and much more

programme.title: Mountains of Kwazulu Natal
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Africa From Cape to Kruger S1 - "Mountains of Kwazulu Natal"
programme.desc: Andreas Kieling continues his journey east, exploring the coastline and rainforests on his way to see South Africa’s largest inhabitants. A head for heights and a strong stomach are needed for a bungee jump from the magnificent Bloukrans Bridge.

programme.title: The Tropic Cape
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Africa From Cape to Kruger S1 - "The Tropic Cape"
programme.desc: Stage four of his journey takes Andreas Keiling from ocean to mountain, from swamp to sand dune, as he makes his way to a spectacular Lakeland water park. His day starts with a nerve wracking dip in the ocean to swim with a school of

programme.title: The Fedora
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Social Fabric S1 - "The Fedora"
programme.desc: Kyle Ng explores the Pachuco culture, meets a celebrity hatmaker and travels to the UK to run with the Rude Boys, all to find out more about the infamous headwear known as the fedora.

programme.title: Plaid
programme.desc: Kyle Ng visits Scotland to see how tartan is part of a familys DNA, hangs with a low rider club in California and sees how plaid fabric is a part of tribal identity in Africa.

programme.title: Cowboy Boots
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Social Fabric S1 - "Cowboy Boots"
programme.desc: Kyle Ng travels the world to learn how the cowboy boot made its way off the prairie. He visits Texas, where it all began, chills with cowboys in Rome and rocks out with Kenyan heavy metal cowboys.

programme.title: Paris
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 World of Travel S1 - "Paris"
programme.desc: TV Host Lindsey Granger and Director Kolyn Boyd leave no stone unturned in Paris. From Paris Fashion Week, to being up close and personal with Mona Lisa, to sleeping at Bonapartes home, experience Paris in a way you’ve never seen it before.

programme.title: UAE (Dubai and Abu Dhabi)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 World of Travel S1 - "UAE (Dubai and Abu Dhabi)"
programme.desc: Lindsey Granger and Kolyn Boyd explore the UAE. From skydiving over Dubais Palm Jumeirah to swimming with sharks, to marveling at the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, this episode blends adventure, luxury and culture into an unforgettable journey.

programme.title: South of France
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 World of Travel S1 - "South of France"
programme.desc: Lindsey Granger and Kolyn Boyd explore the South of France, better known as Côte dAzur. From lavender fields to spending time at Coco Chanel’s favorite hang-out, to trying the oldest wine in the region, this episode is one for the books.

programme.title: House for an Athlete
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent S4 - "House for an Athlete"
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they’ll like?

programme.title: Treetops
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent S4 - "Treetops"
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He’s a marketing director and she’s a doctor so she’s often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls?

programme.title: Lesbos
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 My Greek Odyssey S2 - "Lesbos"
programme.desc: In this episode Mia Zoi heads south-east, across to the island of Lesbos. Like any Greek island, it has a truly unique personality. It’s the third biggest island in the nation, with a rich and varied landscape.

programme.title: Lesbos, Psara and Chios
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 My Greek Odyssey S2 - "Lesbos, Psara and Chios"
programme.desc: Peter makes his way to the capital of Lesvos, Mitlini. It’s quite the contrast to the rest of the island. From there he’s headed south, where he briefly visits the remote island of Psara, before making his way to Chios, the birthplace of Homer.

programme.title: Chios and Innousses
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 My Greek Odyssey S2 - "Chios and Innousses"
programme.desc: Peter shows us the sites, sounds and tastes of Chios. Then we cruise north to Inousses, thats been called the cradle of the Greek shipping fortunes.

programme.title: Croatia - Sibenik / Zadar
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Wonders Of... S1 - "Croatia - Sibenik / Zadar"
programme.desc: It’s time for donkey races, and some of the most prized National Parks in Croatia, which Ashley will explore by boat! Damatia’s northern coast is deeply rooted with a history built upon this ancient coastal town.

programme.title: Croatia - Dubrovnik
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Wonders Of... S1 - "Croatia - Dubrovnik"
programme.desc: Undoubtedly this region’s architecture comprised of several periods is some of the finest in Europe. Yacht lovers can’t resist and Ashley finds the hidden secrets in the surrounding area from water polo games to horse back rides on the cliffs.

programme.title: Croatia - Slavonia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Wonders Of... S1 - "Croatia - Slavonia"
programme.desc: Continental Croatia’s abundance of land plays a key role for the country and Ashley experiences this while off roading through the plethora of vineyards and open space. Take a ride with Ashley as she rides the Lipizzaner horse breed from Croatia.

programme.title: Uga Bay, Sri Lanka and Istanbul
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Uga Bay, Sri Lanka and Istanbul"
programme.desc: This episode covers fine dining in some of the most peculiar settings at the beautiful beach resort of Uga Bay in Sri Lanka then The Luxury Travel Show flies to Istanbul, the Turkish city where Europe and Asia meet.

programme.title: Grand Cayman and Toledo
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Grand Cayman and Toledo"
programme.desc: From the beautiful Hell on earth, a small town in the Grand Cayman islands, to the equally hot planes of Toledo for a safari, Spanish style.

programme.title: Rennes (Brittany) and Provo (Turks and Caicos)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Rennes (Brittany) and Provo (Turks and Caicos)"
programme.desc: This gastronomic tour of Brittany stops off for a crepe in Renne, Oysters in Cancale and some fine wines in the Turks and Caicos Caribbean islands.

programme.title: Fabulous
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent S4 - "Fabulous"
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Fun House
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent S4 - "Fun House"
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They’re looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl’s got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Fishermans Dream
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Fishermans Dream"
programme.desc: Bed and breakfast owners receive feedback from their final guests of the season. Will weddings make or break a Spanish BandB, and can the Costa’s newest fisherman make his dream a reality?

programme.title: Challenges
programme.desc: Still reeling from the blow to their budget, can Hastings couple Joe and Maria regroup and find a home? And in Wellington Americans Bonnie and Matt want a warm, dry home for their family and they’ve come up with a bold plan…

programme.title: Race for the Place
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 House Hunt S1 - "Race for the Place"
programme.desc: Will Bonnie and Matt’s dreams of prefab living come true or will it all come crashing down? And in Hamilton, animal lovers Monique and Chris need to find their first home in a hurry…

programme.title: MONACO and VENICE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Travel in Style S1 - "MONACO and VENICE"
programme.desc: Monaco is the home of extravagance, but then let’s not forget the legendary Hotel Cipriani in the wonderful city Venice that is also featured in this glitzy luxury extravaganza.

programme.title: SUPERYACHTS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Travel in Style S1 - "SUPERYACHTS"
programme.desc: This glitzy adventure starts in the idyllic town Portofino -Italy, then our super-yacht moors offshore Monaco where we board a privately owned 212 ft, 80 million euro super yacht – The White Rose of Drachs.

programme.title: SWITZERLAND and SWEDEN
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Travel in Style S1 - "SWITZERLAND and SWEDEN"
programme.desc: Zermatt is one of the most exclusive Ski Resorts in the world. In Sweden, we stayed in award winning Victory Hotel a welcoming and exclusive hotel with a personal atmosphere.

programme.title: Brittany V Cayman Islands
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Jet Set S1 - "Brittany V Cayman Islands"
programme.desc: So who will be crowned with the overall Jet Set victory in series 1? In this final episode Gill embarks on a gastronomic tour of North West France. While Richard has an altogether different aqua experience, swimming with dolphins and stingrays.

programme.desc: Yann delves into Phoenixs diverse skateboarding scene, exploring Cowtown Skateboards. Meeting Hendren a sfashion designer, Christians band, Garnak, Triple paint designs, Justin a blacksmith and Douglas Miles Jr the owner of Apache skateboards.

programme.desc: Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada raskaan kaluston vuorelle ennen kuin tulvivat joet katkaisevat paasyn kaivosalueelle.
