programme.desc: A trustee finds himself in hot water after officers discover his contraband stash. A disgruntled oil worker doesn’t think the charge fits the crime after stealing two hedge trimmers. Conflicting accounts arise when an officer and a stylish inmate butt heads in booking. A woman learns to put herself first after failed attempts to help her boyfriend’s addiction land her in prison.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers fear a man may attempt to hang himself and decide to intervene. A heavily injured man ends up in jail after taking cocaine and acid. Irascibility shadows a man with low blood sugar.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Old Habits Die Hard
programme.desc: An inmate demands that officers follow her instructions while in jail. A man insists that he has been kidnapped by the police and is being held illegally. An elderly man discovers that domestic violence does not have an age limit. A young woman makes the hard decision to turn herself in to change her life around.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man is arrested at a popular theme park for public intoxication. A detainee swallows his earring during processing. Officers attempt to restrain a combative woman in custody.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After refusing a breathalyzer test, an irate man bangs his head against plexiglass. A man transforms into a “cell warrior” within his holding pen. Soon to be released, an inmate considers the future.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate swallows a stash of drugs and then comes down with a case of the munchies. A 72-year-old offers an unusual excuse for dealing drugs to teens at a mall, and a woman charged with assaulting a landlord fakes being sick to get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Sunshine on a Cloudy Day
programme.desc: A woman who says she’s called “Sunshine” has less than a sunny disposition. A man ditches a halfway house for jail to get his life in order. A career criminal shows no regret for his “thug life.” Tense moments in Booking as officers and medical staff try to save a young man from a drug overdose.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT officers break up an altercation between two inmates. In Portland, OR a belligerent man questions the authorities. In Sarasota, FL a man is busted for DUI. In Las Vegas, NV a woman is taken into custody for battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a belligerent woman is restrained. In Portland, OR a repeat offender is placed in isolation for unruly behavior. In Las Vegas, NV a man opens up about how his friends and family feel about him in a holding cell. In Spokane, WA a man is jailed in an attempt to steal coffee for his friends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man claims royal lineage during a combative booking process. After resisting officers and harboring a vicious animal, a man is arrested. Later, intoxicated individuals create havoc for officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an upset inmate damages the door on a patrol car. In Portland, OR a man over-estimates the legal consequences of his actions. In Tacoma, WA a couple charged with domestic violence denies getting physical even though there’s blood in the woman’s hair.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman arrested 45 times gives advice to recently released drug users. Two Australian brothers can’t understand why playing a game of “footie” in a hotel hallway would land them in jail. A drunken nightclub security guard wrecks his scooter.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Angry over her arrest, a woman becomes combative with officers. Busted once again for drugs, a smart young woman knows she is making dumb choices but can’t stop using. A man eluding the police swipes food from his workplace before landing in jail. Officers get a laugh from an arrested panhandler who wants to buy a permit for panhandling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After falling down a flight of stairs while drunk, a young man is amazed he is in jail for refusing to go to the hospital. A correction officer tries to explain to a young man why carrying a gun-shaped knife is not a good idea. An expectant father is arrested after a gin-fueled rampage at his parents house and misses the birth of his first child. A woman arrested for selling fake designer purses as real ones says she didn’t know it was a crime.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Tequila is to blame when a mans behavior gets him locked up. A woman tries to sell drugs online. A detainee in holding for a DUI is of the opinion that he’s been jailed for driving too slow.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman finds herself in jail after telling police she was frightened by a monkey mask. An intoxicate man feels an officer is very special. During a search, an officer finds contraband in a pack of cigarettes that has big consequences to an inmate. A young man says his mom tried to pepper spray him over his brother’s drug use while officers discover the truth to his arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested during a dangerous drug deal struggles to face jail time. Tempers flare when a man makes threats against the arresting officers. Marijuana falls out of a man’s pockets during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 One Too Many Times
programme.desc: A man learns it’s never a good idea to light up a joint next to an active crime scene. An officer encourages a young drug addicted couple to seek treatment. Luck runs out for a tutu-wearing prostitute, and officers pick up an at-risk kid for their 93rd time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV an intoxicated man is placed in isolation after exhibiting combative behavior. In Portland, OR a man wearing a red dress is brought in for trespassing and tells officers that he is in the FBI. In Reno, NV two young men are set straight after stealing a car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: We follow the men and women of LVMPD as they do their best to tame the New Years Eve festivities up and down the Las Vegas Strip.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers struggle with an angry man after he kicks out a patrol car window. A relationship ends when a woman takes a bite out of her boyfriend. An upset wife stabs her husband and he ends up in handcuffs. A woman is happy to celebrate her birthday by going to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man is charged with possession of an illegal substance. Police arrest a woman for narcotics, and a couple is caught passing a fake prescription.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Melee in the Cell
programme.desc: A brawl breaks out between inmates during a routine jail breakfast. An inmate alters their uniform in provocative and outlandish ways. Concerns abound as one-man issues violent threats at deputies.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An agitated man is overly concerned about his 30K watch. cries when he has blood drawn. An inebriated woman threatens her arresting officers with bodily harm, and a woman has no recollection of her arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An eccentric jail regular is welcomed back. Man fleeing Mexico details the horrors he escaped. Young woman describes her lucrative fling as a stripper. A woman finds that trying to drink away a bad boyfriend and then asking the boyfriend for bail money is not a good idea. A man collapses during booking after being arrested for drunk driving. Officers have heart to heart with a depressed inmate going through a breakup with a cheating girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A homeless man punches a singing transient over a racist comment. An assailant hits a sleeping man with a brick over a money dispute. A sobbing young man insists he was falsely arrested. A bar fight sends a UFC fighter to the hospital and the bartender who slugged him to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is brought in for attacking her boyfriend. A talkative inmate is moved to isolation, and an daring inmate attempts to escape his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers conduct a strip search after an inmate is accused of carrying contraband. A repeat offender dances for deputies and fellow inmates. High on meth, a man acts erratically during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A high-priced escort is accused of skipping out on her limo tab. A ladies man directs foul language at the jail nurse, and a seasoned prostitute considers getting into the sex-toy business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Crack Pipe on Phone Wall
programme.desc: Chaos surrounds a routine medical screening of an inmate. In the prison phone center, a smoking pipe is discovered and a mystery ensues. A pregnant woman is investigated over potential sex crimes.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Needles are found on one woman while a stun gun is discovered on another. A DUI test stirs up bad memories for a man driving while intoxicated, and a convicted murderer becomes violent.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man believes he is an alien wrongfully arrested for obstruction. Claiming to be a law school student, a man just doesn’t understand why he was arrested for trespassing. A woman claims she swallowed her friend’s pills for good reason. A family reunion ends with a bruised and bloodied husband.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers try to deal with a sloppy and combative drunk. A man gets locked up after he blows all his casino winnings, and a woman gets tricked by her bail bondsman.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Acts of aggression cause a man to be placed in a restraint chair. Jail lockdown occurs after an inmate is stabbed with a pencil. After being booked for road rage a woman unleashes a venomous tirade.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman is placed in a restraint chair. A troubled woman with a drug addiction is brought in on prostitution charges. One man is taken to a sobering cell to sleep off his intoxication.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman fights arrest resulting in a trip to the isolation chamber. One inmate calls 911 within jail walls causing confusion. Later, officers run to the rescue when a man passes out.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a truculent man is sent to the drunk-tank to sober up. In Portland, OR a drunk woman is jailed for attacking a child. In Sarasota, FL an intoxicated man has difficulty recalling why hes been arrested. In Spokane, WA a man "borrows" a car to curb his drug habit.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Toilet Paper Love Song
programme.desc: A man attempts to eat marijuana in jail. The Special Detention Unit investigates forbidden letters hidden amongst inmates. A bloody, vicious brawl escalates between an imprisoned duo.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A media circus surrounds OJ Simpson as he is placed in jail for violating his bail agreement. During a body search, a man is tased and pepper-sprayed. A parole violation calls for all hands-on deck.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 In the same League
programme.desc: Booze and a cellphone dispute lead one man to the “green suit.” A couple of panhandlers profess their undying love to each other. Alcohol pushes a proud father across the line. A homeless woman gives officers career advice.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A dominatrix is arrested for playing rough. A father is accused of assaulting his daughters boyfriend, and an inmates negative attitude leads to trouble.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Portland, OR a man in custody accuses officers of being involved in the 1992 event at Ruby Ridge. In Sarasota, FL a drunk man falls off his bike and purports to have been hit by a car. In Las Vegas, LV a daring inmate attempts to make a break for it while the supervising officers attend to a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man thinks the doctors are CIA agents. A homeless karate practitioners actions land him in an isolated cell, and a Canadian man with no pants wants to arm wrestle.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A young father pulls a desperate double robbery to make ends meet. A routine shakedown gets deadly when officers uncover alarming contraband. An inmate plays innocent about her criminal past until confronted by officers. An antsy woman’s brazen behavior tests the patience of officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Im Not Jane Doe
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a lewd woman is jailed. In Las Vegas, NV a man is placed in the restraining chair after attempting to bite his own fingers off. In Portland, OR a man is brought in for possession. In Sarasota, FL a homeless man is brought in for trespassing and battery.

programme.title: Come to Daddy
programme.desc: Kun Norval saa odottamatta kirjeen vieraantuneelta isaltaan, han matkustaa isan syrjaiselle rantatalolle. Mutta hyvin pian han huomaa omituisen tunnelman, ja kaivatusta jalleentapaamisesta muodostuu helvetillinen painajainen.

programme.title: The Female Brain
programme.desc: Mika saa naisen swaippaamaan oikeaan herra Vaaran ja vasempaan herra Oikean kohdalla? Sofia Vergara ja Whitney Cummings tahdittavat elokuvaa, joka kertoo ihan oikeasta tieteesta (usein kaduttavien) romanttisten impulssiemme takana. Suoraviivainen neurologi Julia tutkii miesten ja naisten aivojen eroja, jotka esitellaan kolmen eri suhteen vaiheessa olevan pariskunnan elaman kautta. Julian jamerat oletukset joutuvat kuitenkin koetukselle, kun tutkimuksiin osallistuu uusi nuori komistus...

programme.title: Majava
programme.desc: Majavasta voi olla apua sinullekin! Walter Blackin huumori on yhta mustaa kuin hanen sukunimensa. Toissa menee huonosti, vaimo on saanut tarpeekseen ja poika vihaa isaansa. Masennuksen syovereissa - ja kesken itsetuhoisen ryyppyputken - Walter loytaa roskasailiosta nuhruisen kasinuken. Majavan. Kangasnukke kadessaan Walter voi jalleen puhua vapaasti. Ja vielapa brittiaksentilla! Mutta samalla kun Walter loytaa itsensa uudelleen, uusi majavapersoona saa hanesta yliotteen! Kaksinkertaiset Oscar-voittajat Mel Gibson ja Jodie Foster ovat tehneet palkitun kasikirjoituksen avulla yhden vuoden omaperaisimmista elokuvahelmista.

programme.title: Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach
programme.desc: Yhdysvaltalaisen opinahjon sahlari vahtimestari ryhtyy koulun hairikkonuorten tennisvalmentajaksi. Tavoitteena on voittaa Nebraskan osavaltion tennismestaruus.

programme.title: Epic Movie
programme.desc: Tarina keskittyy neljaan ei-niin-nuoreen orpoon: yhden heista on kasvattanut Louvren kuraattori; toinen on pakolainen meksikolaisesta vapaapainista; kolmas askettainen hanen lentokoneessaan olleiden kaarmeiden uhri; ja neljas "normaali" asukas mutantti "X" -yhteisosta. Onneton kvartetti vierailee suklaatehtaalla, jossa he tormaavat lumottuun vaatekaappiin, joka kuljettaa heidat Gnarnian maahan (hiljaisella ”G”: lla). Siella he kohtaavat prameilevan merirosvokapteenin ja vilpittomat taikuuden opiskelijat – ja yhdistavat voimansa muun muassa viisaan, mutta kiimaisen leijonan kanssa voittaakseen Gnarnian ”Pahan Valkoisen Nartun”.

programme.title: Break Point
programme.desc: Veljekset Jimmy ja Darren ovat vieraantuneet toisistaan. Darren on rahapulassa ja Jimmy haluaa tehda paluun tennismaailman huipulle. Siispa he paattavat lyottaytya yhteen, perustaa uudelleen nuoruutensa nelinpeliparin ja pyrkia Grand Slam -turnaukseen karsintojen kautta. Kumpikaan ei ole entisessa vedossaan, mutta erikoisten ystaviensa ja rohkaisevan, vaikkakin kyynisen isansa avulla nama nahjusmaiset sankarit saattavat oppia voittamaan parhaimmatkin vastustajansa. Rooleissa muun muassa koomikot Jeremy Sisto, Adam Devine ja Oscar®-palkittu J.K. Simmons.

programme.title: The King of Comedy
programme.desc: Uransa kanssa kamppaileva koomikko uhkapelaa epavarman tulevaisuutensa tehdessaan hullun suunnitelman saada lunnaiden avulla tiensa televisioon kidnappaamalla suositun keskusteluohjelman isannan.

programme.title: A Haunted House
programme.desc: Raavittoman hauska ja torkean naurattava kauhukomedia Paranormal Activityn tyyliin. Rakastunut nuoripari Malcom ja Keisha muuttavat unelmiensa taloon aloittaakseen yhteisen elamansa. Pian talossa alkaa tapahtua mystisia asioita ja selviaa, etteivat he olekaan kahden vaan Keishan on riivannut havyton demoni. Ahdistunut Malcom palkkaa manaajan ja lopulta nykypaivan Ghostbustersitkin ajamaan pois pahan hengen, joka terrorisoi hanen parisuhdettaan… ja ennen kaikkea seksielamaansa.

programme.title: Adult Life Skills
programme.desc: Anna on jumissa. Han on melkein 30, mutta asuu aitinsa puutarhavajassa, ei juttele juuri kenenkaan kanssa ja viettaa aikansa tekemalla lyhytelokuvia, joissa nayttelevat hanen peukalonsa. Jotakin puuttuu, ja eristyneisyys nayttaa olevan Annan tapa kasitella suurta surua. Mutta kun Anna sattumalta ystavystyy kahdeksanvuotiaan cowboyn kanssa, han alkaa pikkuhiljaa avautua. Adult Life Skills on Rachel Tunnardin ensimmainen pitka elokuva, joka kertoo yhta lailla surullisen kuin hauskankin tarinan kuolemasta ja sen kanssa elamisesta. Broadchurch-tahti Jodie Whittaker tulkitsee sulkeutuneen Annaan roolin kauniisti ja humoristisesti.

programme.title: Herakles New Yorkissa
programme.desc: Olympos-vuorelta karkotettu Herakles (Arnold Schwarzenegger) lahetetaan Maahan, missa han loytaa todellisen rakkauden ja aloittaa lupaavan uran kehonrakennusbisneksessa.

programme.title: Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach
programme.desc: Yhdysvaltalaisen opinahjon sahlari vahtimestari ryhtyy koulun hairikkonuorten tennisvalmentajaksi. Tavoitteena on voittaa Nebraskan osavaltion tennismestaruus.

programme.title: Fat Kid Rules The World
programme.desc: Troy Billings on seitsemantoista, ylipainoinen ja itsetuhoinen. Juuri kun han aikoo hypata bussin eteen, hanet pelastaakin Marcus, lukion kesken jattanyt hurmaava katumuusikko. Kaksikon valille syntyy orastava ystavyyssuhde kun Marcus ottaa musiikillisilta taidoiltaan vajavaisen Troyn rumpaliksi uuteen punkbandiin. Troy ei aavista, etta hanen pienena hupina pitamassaan asiassa onkin kyse Marcusin halusta paasta punkrockin huipulle, keinolla milla hyvansa..

programme.title: Nimeni on Trinity - paholaisen oikea kasi
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kiertava Trinity paatyy polyiseen pikkukaupunkiin, jossa hanta odottaa todellinen yllatys. Hanen lainsuojaton velipuolensa Bambino on kaupungin sheriffi! Tosin Bambino on ottanut pestin vastaan vain, koska on jalleen lakia paossa ja tarvitsee valehenkilollisyytta piiloutuakseen... Kaupungin mahtavimmalla miehella, majuri Harrimanilla on saalimattomia suunnitelmia valtansa ja maa-alueittensa kasvattamiseksi, mutta laheisessa laaksossa asuva mormoniyhdyskunta on suunnitelmien tiella. Harriman miehineen aikoo vaikka vakipakolla ajaa mormonit alueelta... Mutta yhdyskunnan kanssa ystavystynyt Trinity sotkee mielellaan Harrimanin kuviot.

programme.title: Unelmien Naapuri
programme.desc: Teravapiirtokuvalla ja bonusmateriaaleilla varustettu Emile Hirschin, Elisha Cuthbertin ja Timothy Olyphantin tahdittama riehakas komedia on kuumempi kuin koskaan! High Schoolista juuri valmistuva luokan priimus, Matthew Kidman haluaa saada koulun paatokseen ilman teinihorhoilyjen aiheuttamia ongelmia. Valitettavasti, ongelma muuttaa naapuriin, eika Matthew pysty vastustamaan kiusausta.

programme.title: 36 Husbands
programme.desc: 36 Husbands on mystinen, musikaalinen Kung Fu -vakoojakomedia, jonka paaosissa on 3 vahvaa naista - ja joukko aviomiehia. Kristalla, huippuvakoojalla ja Kung Fu -mestarilla, on poikkeuksellisia voimia, ja han ottaa ne kayttoon pyrkiessaan hidastamaan tasaista kulkua kohti kolmatta maailmansotaa.

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years Of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe Khatchadorianilla on vaikeasti lausuttava sukunimi, valtavan vilkas mielikuvitus... ja ongelmia auktoriteettien kanssa. Rafe ei ole mikaan vallankumouksellinen anarkisti, mutta han on kuitenkin aloittamassa koulunkayntia jo jarjestyksessa kolmannella ylaasteellaan. Rafen toita paiskiva yksinhuoltajaaiti toivoo, etta tama koulu lopultakin sopisi hanen pojalleen. Mutta Hills Villagen ylaasteella yksilonvapautta ei kunnioiteta, vaan voimassa ovat epaoikeudenmukaiset kayttaytymissaannot. Rehtori-Dwight ei jata huomioimatta yhtakaan rikkomusta, koska han haluaa pysya ykkosena alueen koulujen suoritustilastoissa.

programme.title: Break Point
programme.desc: Veljekset Jimmy ja Darren ovat vieraantuneet toisistaan. Darren on rahapulassa ja Jimmy haluaa tehda paluun tennismaailman huipulle. Siispa he paattavat lyottaytya yhteen, perustaa uudelleen nuoruutensa nelinpeliparin ja pyrkia Grand Slam -turnaukseen karsintojen kautta. Kumpikaan ei ole entisessa vedossaan, mutta erikoisten ystaviensa ja rohkaisevan, vaikkakin kyynisen isansa avulla nama nahjusmaiset sankarit saattavat oppia voittamaan parhaimmatkin vastustajansa. Rooleissa muun muassa koomikot Jeremy Sisto, Adam Devine ja Oscar®-palkittu J.K. Simmons.

programme.title: Herakles New Yorkissa
programme.desc: Olympos-vuorelta karkotettu Herakles (Arnold Schwarzenegger) lahetetaan Maahan, missa han loytaa todellisen rakkauden ja aloittaa lupaavan uran kehonrakennusbisneksessa.

programme.title: Big Mommas House
programme.desc: Karannutta vankia jahtaava agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) lahtee suorittamaan peitetehtavaa ja pukeutuu maarailevaksi ja isokokoiseksi mummoksi, joka mottaa yhta kovaa kuin komentaakin.

programme.title: Wagons East
programme.desc: He tulivat hakemaan kultaa, mutta he tyytyivat mielellaan hyvaan viemarijarjestelmaan.John Candy ja Richard Lewis tahdittavat epatyypillista lankkaria.

programme.title: Majava
programme.desc: Majavasta voi olla apua sinullekin! Walter Blackin huumori on yhta mustaa kuin hanen sukunimensa. Toissa menee huonosti, vaimo on saanut tarpeekseen ja poika vihaa isaansa. Masennuksen syovereissa - ja kesken itsetuhoisen ryyppyputken - Walter loytaa roskasailiosta nuhruisen kasinuken. Majavan. Kangasnukke kadessaan Walter voi jalleen puhua vapaasti. Ja vielapa brittiaksentilla! Mutta samalla kun Walter loytaa itsensa uudelleen, uusi majavapersoona saa hanesta yliotteen! Kaksinkertaiset Oscar-voittajat Mel Gibson ja Jodie Foster ovat tehneet palkitun kasikirjoituksen avulla yhden vuoden omaperaisimmista elokuvahelmista.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Katastrofielokuvassa seurataan joukkoa naurettavan kuvankauniita nuoria, jotka joutuvat yhden illan aikana lahes jokaisen mahdollisen luonnonkatastrofin riepottelemaksi. Asteroidit, pyorremyrskyt ja maanjaristykset saapuvat tuhoamaan kaupunkia ja vaikeuttavat nuorten yritysta keskeyttaa valtoimenaan riehuvaa havitysta. Hyokkayksen kohteeksi joutuvat mm. Indiana Jones, Iron Man, Amy Winehouse, High School Musical ja monet muut suositut elokuvat, pop-ikonit ja julkkikset.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Ice Cube, Anthony Anderson, Sean Patrick Thomas, Eve ja Cedric the Entertainer tahdittavat tata hervotonta komediaa Chicagon parturiliikkeesta, jossa terava huumori ei koskaan mene pois muodista! Calvin (Ice Cube) on yrittajaksi pyrkiva nuori mies suurilla suunnitelmilla... eika perheen parturiliikkeen pyorittaminen kuulu niihin. Mutta kun han myy impulsiivisesti liikkeen epailyttavalle lainanantajalle, han tajuaa pian, kuinka tarkea naapuruston parturi on hanelle... ja kuinka pitkalle han on valmis menemaan saadakseen sen takaisin!

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.title: Unelmien Naapuri
programme.desc: Teravapiirtokuvalla ja bonusmateriaaleilla varustettu Emile Hirschin, Elisha Cuthbertin ja Timothy Olyphantin tahdittama riehakas komedia on kuumempi kuin koskaan! High Schoolista juuri valmistuva luokan priimus, Matthew Kidman haluaa saada koulun paatokseen ilman teinihorhoilyjen aiheuttamia ongelmia. Valitettavasti, ongelma muuttaa naapuriin, eika Matthew pysty vastustamaan kiusausta.

programme.title: MacGruber
programme.desc: Maailmanrauha on vaarassa, terroristit vaanivat, maailma tarvitsee supersankarin, jolla on tukka kuin Hillary Clintonilla. Kenelle pitaa soittaa? MacGruberille! Han on sotakone ilman asetta, mutta kehittaa mita vaan pelkasta klemmarista. Han on niin salainenagentti, etta kukaan ei edes tieda miehen etunimea! Naiset haluavat olla kuin han ja miehet haluavat olla hanen kanssaan... vai miten se meni?

programme.title: Thanks for Sharing
programme.desc: Paallepain ymparistokonsultti Adamilla, yksityisyrittaja Mikella ja ensiapulaakari Neililla ei ole mitaan yhteista, mutta he kaikki ovat mukana 12 askeleen ohjelmassa kohti vapautta riippuvuuksistaan. Adam ei uskalla heittaytya uuteen rakkauteen, Mike yrittaa raivokkaasti kontrolloida perhettaan eika Danny suostu myontamaan ongelmiaan, mutta haasteet ja pienet askeleet yhdistaa miehet perheeksi, joka kannustaa, raivostuttaa ja kiittaa toisiaan matkalla uuteen elamaan.

programme.title: Nurse Betty
programme.desc: Betty katsoo uskollisesti lempisaippuasarjaansa “Syy rakastaa". Tormattyaan kahteen ammattitappajaan katsoessaan yhta sarjan jaksoa Betty muuttuu “Nurse Bettyksi" ja lahtee etsimaan sydamensa valittua, tohtori David Ravellia. Betty hakee unelmiensa prinssia hurjalla retkella halki maan, mutta ehtiiko han loytaa miehen ennen kuin tappajat loytavat hanet?

programme.title: A Haunted House
programme.desc: Raavittoman hauska ja torkean naurattava kauhukomedia Paranormal Activityn tyyliin. Rakastunut nuoripari Malcom ja Keisha muuttavat unelmiensa taloon aloittaakseen yhteisen elamansa. Pian talossa alkaa tapahtua mystisia asioita ja selviaa, etteivat he olekaan kahden vaan Keishan on riivannut havyton demoni. Ahdistunut Malcom palkkaa manaajan ja lopulta nykypaivan Ghostbustersitkin ajamaan pois pahan hengen, joka terrorisoi hanen parisuhdettaan… ja ennen kaikkea seksielamaansa.

programme.title: McLintock
programme.desc: He likes his whiskey hard... His women soft... And his west all to himself! Inspired by Shakespeares The Taming of the Shrew (1594), John Wayne (The Searchers, Stagecoach), Maureen OHara (Miracle on 34th Street, The Parent Trap), and Patrick Wayne (The Searchers, The Alamo) star in this western comedy directed by Andrew V. McLaglen (Gunsmoke, The Wild Geese). George Washington McLintock (John Wayne) is the wealthiest man in his territory who utilizes his power and influence to maintain order between farmers, ranchers, Indians, corrupt government officials, and his own family! McLintock is McNificent!

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid, Pat Garrett, and Doc Holliday ride again in Howard Hughes epic 1943 western, but the character youll remember most is sultry country vixen Rio McDonald. Hughes nationwide search for an actress to play Rio resulted in the film debut of Jane Russell, whose natural assets were allegedly helped by a special bra designed by Hughes. When The Outlaw finally received a nationwide release in 1946, its success vindicated Hughes and made Russell a star. As for Hughes infamous bra, Russell said in her 1988 memoir, I never wore it, and he never knew.

programme.title: The Fighting Westerner
programme.desc: A mining engineer tries to solve the murders of several heirs to a valuable radium mine in this western drama from Paramount Pictures. Stars include Charles Chic Sale, and in one of his early roles, Randolph Scott. This feature, also known as Rocky Mountain Mystery, was directed by Oscar winner Charles Barton, who would go on to direct several popular television shows, including Petticoat Junction and Family Affair...

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west meet their match in this B-Western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Rex Bell, billed on the old print ads as The heroic idol of young America! stars as Breezy Kildare, a New York detective who happens to be in Wyoming. When Breezy leads a group of cattleman against the well-armed city boys, the bad guys will wish theyd stayed in New York! The rest of the cast includes such favorites from the period as George Gabby Hayes, Roy DArcy, and Marceline Day. (Day worked opposite everyone from John Wayne to Buster Keaton, but retired from acting shortly after this movie at age 25.) Directed by Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Diamond Trail
programme.desc: Diamond Trail is an epic that starts in the speeding taxicabs and illegal barrooms of the east coast, and travels west for its exciting climax. Reporter Speed Morgan (Rex Bell), going undercover as Frisco Eddy, infiltrates Flash Barretts gang in order to bring them all to justice. But can he get the job done before they learn his identity? With a cast that includes Frances Rich and Bud Osborne, this action tale from director Harry L. Fraser (The Last of the Clintons) is another forgotten classic from Monogram Pictures.

programme.title: With Sitting Bull at the Spirit Lake Massacre
programme.desc: A long-thought-lost film finally surfaces after being unseen for over eight decades. Created and copyrighted by Sunset Productions in 1925 but not released until June 15, 1927, this silent epic features the superior Native American actor Chief Yowlachie (performing here under the name Chief Yowlache) as Sitting Bull. Other fine actors in the cast include the always popular Bryant Washburn and a young Bob Steele, who appears under his real name Bob Bradbury Jr. The story takes place in the 1860s or 1870s near Spirit Lake, Iowa. Settlements of whites are growing in that region but the Sioux Indians also have professed their interest in one such settlement. Chief Sitting Bull surveys the...

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Vic Carver, and his brother Johnny, searches for Annies Uncle Luke to enact revenge. Annie successfully gets her uncle out of town, but an angry Vic kidnaps Tagg. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Colorado
programme.desc: Theres trouble out west! Its the Civil War and the Union needs troops back east to defend itself. Roy Rogers stars as Lieutenant Jerry Burke, who is sent to investigate why the returning troops are being stalled in Colorado. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Pauline Moore, and Milburn Stone, this film is action packed with a turn you wont see coming!

programme.title: Way of the West
programme.desc: Government agent Gordon (Hal Taliaferro) goes undercover to investigate an ongoing war between cattlemen and sheepmen. But he soon finds himself framed for murder! This low budget western from the short-lived Empire Pictures is from the golden era of shoot em ups, when audiences knew who the bad guys were, and couldnt wait for the good guys to serve up some just punishment!

programme.title: Lawless Frontier
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this vintage western about a man avenging the murder of his parents. Other cast members include frequent Wayne sidekick George Gabby Hayes, plus Yakima Canutt, Sheila Terry, and Jack Rockwell. This Paul Malvern Production from director Robert N. Bradbury also features Earl Dwire, one of the great B-movie villains, as Zanti, the ruthless bandit who sets the action in motion.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: The sons of a Colorado cattle baron, one biological and the other adopted, resent one another and fight for control of their fathers cattle empire.

programme.title: Adventures of Gallant Bess
programme.desc: Rather than a gorgeous Hollywood starlet, actor Cameron Mitchell (Carousel), playing cowboy Ted Daniels, shares the screen in this film with a magnificent wild horse named Gallant Bess, who he tames, trains and keeps for himself. But after Ted is gravely injured in a fixed rodeo, Bess is stolen away from him and forced to join a cruel traveling carnival in this fast-paced western from director Lew Landers (The Adventures of Rin Tin Tin).

programme.title: Doomed Caravan
programme.desc: Hoppy is enlisted to help protect Jane Travers next caravan against robbers who have been terrorizing travelers. He comes across a wily pair of thieves who hve their men disguised as soldiers to escort the caravan. Hoppy isnt fooled for a second and busts up their plan with help from the Bar 20 boys. Not to be outdone, the thieves then capture everyone but Hoppy and puts them before a firing squad. Not its up to Hoppy to rescue his friends singlehandedly. The cast includes William Boyd as Hopalong Cassidy, with Russell Hayden and Andy Clyde as Luky Jenkins and California Jack. For those counting, this was the 32nd of 66 Hopalong Cassidy adventures. They would be edited for syndication...

programme.title: Come on Cowboys
programme.desc: The Mesquiteers are back! This time theyre helping out a friend who has been framed for counterfeiting. And one of their pledges is to look after his young daughter. Robert Livingstone, Ray Corrigan, and Max Terhune star in this Republic Pictures feature, bringing all the usual laughs and action you know from the other Mesquiteer films!

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the worlds most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Hawk of the Hills
programme.desc: A band of Indians led by the Hawk terrorizes prospectors in a valley. HAWK OF THE HILLS was originally released as a ten episode serial in 1927 but was re-edited into a five-reel feature (the version presented here) in 1929.

programme.title: Mason of the Mounted
programme.desc: Canadian Mountie Mason is sent south of the border to look for a horse thief with only a watch chain for evidence. He befriends young Andy and when Calhoun hits Andy, Mason and Calhoun fight. In the scuffle Calhouns watch with the missing chain is dislodged. Mason then sets out to bring in Calhoun and his gang.

programme.title: Rawhide Rangers
programme.desc: Blackies gang is creating havoc and the Ranger, Brand Calhoun and his brother go to investigate.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to Wisconsin to investigate an Indian agents claim that a lumber company is forcing the Chippewa Indians off their reservation in order to harvest pristine stands of pine trees. The G-Mens investigation is hindered by the distrust of the Chippewas as well as the lumbermen. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, Pat and Stoney are ordered to California to investigate reports of an anthrax epidemic and get involved in murder and a feud between neighboring ranchers. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Please Buy My Violets

Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction

Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as railroad detective Matt Clark who needs to track down a group of cattle rustlers along with their notorious leader Billy the Kid (played by Richard Jaeckel).This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery. In this episode, Judge Bean discovers that a young vagabond he jailed for a minor offense may be involved in a major unsolved gold heist.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery. In this episode, a con involving the Haunted Hills draws Judge Roys attention. Letty is among those who undergo hypnosis to recall long past events.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: An ex-convict is trying to work as a rancher, but his outlaw brother wants him to resume his life of crime. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie and Lofty attempt to help Ralph and Mary claim a fertile piece of land after a section of land is opened for settlement. A pair of crooks are aware of the lands value and intend to take it for themselves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which earned a Primetime Emmy Award nomination in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook are assigned to escort an accused criminal to his hanging.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: The Mingo False Faces are accused of a series of thefts sweeping the valley.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper.Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Gunnar, a long-lost relative of the Cartwright family, arrives in Ponderosa, where the family takes him in for the night. Unknown to the Cartwrights, however, is Gunnars leading of The Comancheros, a dangerous band of criminals. After Little Joe and his girlfriend are kidnapped by The Comancheros, the Cartwrights and Gunnar must work things out.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Shine on Harvest Moon
programme.desc: Jackson and his gang are cattle rustlers holed up in Jackson Hole Wyoming. Roys partner Brower was once Jacksons partner and is now suspected of being in cahoots with him. Someone is tipping off Jackson as to the cattles whereabouts and when Roy learns who it is he has a plan to trap Jackson and clear his partner. Starring Roy Rogers, Lynne Roberts, and Myrtle Wiseman as Lulu Belle. Directed by Joseph Kane.

programme.title: Down Texas Way
programme.desc: The sixth film in Monograms Rough Rider series once again follows Buck Roberts (Buck Jones), Tom McCoy (Tim McCall), and Sandy Hopkins (Raymond Hatton) as undercover US Marshals posing as outlaws in order to confound their enemies. When Sandy is framed for murder by a gang of frontier racketeers who hope to take over a small town as their headquarters, Buck and Tom must work separately to save their buddy from a lynch mob and foil the crooks dastardly schemes.

programme.title: In Old Cheyenne
programme.desc: Roy Rogers plays a newspaper reporter sent to Cheyenne to investigate a reputed troublemaker. While on the scene, he discovers who the real bad guys are, and sets out to right some wrongs. Also starring Roys usual sidekick George Gabby Hayes, plus Joan Woodbury, and George Rosener. This Republic Pictures western was helmed by director Joseph Kane (The Undersea Kingdom, Dakota) and features two musical numbers: Bonita and Linda Flor.

programme.title: Tulsa
programme.desc: Susan Hayward stars in this dramatic tale of the Oklahoma oil boom. She plays Cherokee Lansing, a determined young woman out to protect her fathers honor after hes killed by men from a competing oil company. With a cast that includes Robert Preston, Ed Begley, and Pedro Armendariz, this engaging picture from producer Walter Wanger (Cleopatra, I Want to Live!) was nominated for an Academy Award in the Special Effects category. Also, listen for veteran character actor Chill Wills as the narrator!

programme.title: Northwest Trail
programme.desc: Mountie Matt OBrien assignment is simple: He is to escort the rather grouchy, and slightly annoying, Miss Katherine Owens to a remote outpost. Things complicate however when they arrive at the outpost and he stumbles upon an illegal mining operation. Stars include Bob Steele, Joan Woodbury, and Poodles Hanneford.

programme.title: Man from Utah
programme.desc: WHIRLING ROPES AND SNARLING GUNS IN THE GALLOPING GRIP OF A GLAMOROUS DRAMA! John Wayne stars as John Weston, a man hired to investigate shady doings at a local rodeo. It seems all the riders who are on the verge of winning end up dead. Along with Wayne, this tale of action on the range also stars the usual Lone Star Picture stock company, including Gabby Hayes and Yakima Canutt!

programme.title: American Empire
programme.desc: This epic of Americas westward march stars Leo Carrillo and Preston Foster in a tale of men building a cattle empire, only to battle rustlers, the weather, and each other! The romantic adventure from director William C. McGann (In Old California, Alcatraz Island) features a strong leading performance by Oscar nominated RKO star Richard Dix (Cimarron, The Ghost Ship) plus cinematography by six-time Oscar nominee Russell Harlan (To Kill a Mockingbird, Rio Bravo).

programme.title: The Kansan
programme.desc: Richard Dix stars in this epic of the boisterous and brawling Old West! Wounded in a gun battle with the notorious James gang, John Bonniwell (Dix) wakes up in the hospital to find out hes been elected marshal! He quickly learns that this hot-headed frontier town can only be cooled off with blazing lead and dynamite! Jane Wyatt, Albert Dekker, Victor Jory, and Robert Armstrong also star in this tale of smashing fists and crashing bullets from director George Archainbaud (The Lost Squadron).

programme.title: Facing Big Bullies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Work on the Wild Side
programme.desc: Confront an antelope bully, eye a rhino infection, and keep tabs on a caracal.

programme.title: Corralling Chaos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Work on the Wild Side
programme.desc: Check out orphaned rhinos, a perilous giraffe move, and a plastic-waste remedy.

programme.title: A Very Precious Thing
programme.desc: Two tiny orphans struggle to survive. Hope takes a second swing at a release gone wrong.

programme.title: True Colors
programme.desc: Prep for major fallout after Tammy loses it and Megan strikes out in Alberta.

programme.title: Its Pat
programme.desc: Stand by as Megan asks for her job back and Tammy’s love triangle intensifies.

programme.title: Shotgun
programme.desc: Revel in a profitable sale and gasp as a wedding turns the barn upside down.

programme.title: Bride-zilla
programme.desc: Swing into last-minute wedding prep and monitor progress on the big horse sale.

programme.title: Bumping Up Against Challenges
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Bizarre Pet Vets
programme.desc: Check out a pile of puzzling lumps and bumps on a finch, a frog, and many more.

programme.title: Shaking
programme.desc: Sort out canine tooth issues, a wriggly dog’s heart, and broken-down kitty hips.

programme.title: Winning Time
programme.desc: Monitor kitty kidney function, urgent stomach surgery, and cat-fight wounds.

programme.title: Shore Leave

programme.desc: You want to feel like a race driver? The British car manufacture Radical can make your dreams come true.

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: For Porsche fans, its the ultimate fusion of road suitability and race track compatibility: The Porsche 911 GT3. With its 475 hp engine and a maximum torque of 440 Newton-meters, it accelerates from zero to 100 km/h in 3.5 seconds.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Nowadays you associate Bentley with elegance and luxury. But ever since its establishment in 1919, the British brand enjoys successes in motorsports as well.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The T in the name of the Ferrari California T stands for Turbo, which is unusual for a brand like Ferrari. The California T is the first Ferrari to have a turbo engine under its hood since the legendary F40.

programme.title: Super Cars

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: In Rons Garage antique scrap piles from the desert get turned into rolling pieces of art in accordance with customer specifications. If you want to cross the desert, Mercedes has the perfect vehicle.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The Audi RS6 Avant isnt a boring whip at all, seeing that Audis Quattro GmbH get an output of 560hp out of the 4.2-liter V8 engine. But tuning company Meyer isnt satisfied enough.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Delving into the exceptional performance features of three high-powered cars: Mathilda Racings Scirocco GT-R1, Bentleys GT3 R, and Volkswagens Golf R.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: An up-close look at the power-packed customized versions of two popular luxury cars and the Stuck brothers mind-boggling talent on the driving tracks.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Want an everyday car with extra power under the bonnet? The BMW 3-Series, Nissan 370 Z or Citroen CS DS3 are rather average cars. But as M-version, Nismo or Musketier, they get wild and become really powerful.

programme.desc: The Buell 1125R is the only model not powered by a Harley motor. The marquee sets off in a new direction.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Station wagons on a Formula 1 racetrack: Porsche has packed a ton of power into their Panamera with the turbo-charged four liter V8 engine. Perfect Ride takes the Sport Turismo out onto the F1 track in Bahrain.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Whats hot and whats not. There are quests to be undertaken, the search for the ideal auto, for the perfect race track for the ultimate accessory gadget. What are the preferred rides of the race legends?

programme.title: Ignition GT

programme.title: Buyers Guide

programme.title: Sold in 60 Seconds

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: A cruise over the Alps to Italy in a Maserati GranCabrio MC. In addition, a look at the Jaguar XK-RS convertible with 550 hp and the uncompromising performance of Mercedes-AMGs SL models.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: In a city that loves to show off wealth and luxury, the Dubai police are eager to represent this image via its fleet of patrol cars that includes a Chevrolet Camaro, Lamborghini Aventador, Bentley GT, Ferrari FF, and Mercedes SLS.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Aerodynamics influence the performance, track stability and dynamics of a vehicle. Takes a look at the Porsche 911 Turbo S, the BMW M6 convertible and the Kelleners 330d in order to explore the influence of different wings and spoilers.

programme.title: Audi R8 V10 Plus

programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wicket’s new, expensive perfume on the floor.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try.

programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing.

programme.title: Do Not Marry
programme.desc: Lekan tries to put peter off getting married because he wants to continue to live off peter free of charge. He hires a hooker, simi, as a way to get peter’s mind off the marriage train but his plan backfires when simi discovers lekan’s true motives.

programme.title: Grip
programme.desc: A wealthy man, who has vowed to never fall in love, meets a woman that refuses to fall for his charms, forcing him to re-evaluate his stance on relationships.

programme.title: Humble Pie
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A down-on-their luck couple turn to a life of crime, calling themselves Bonnie and Clyde, when the man loses his job due to unfortunate circumstances. Their crimes lead the to a bickering couple, Eric and Zara, and the chance meeting has everyone re-evaluating their actions.

programme.title: Amoral
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Patricia is suspicious that her husband, Ugo, is having an affair because he seizes every opportunity to avoid sexual intimacy with her. She startes an affair after listening to her sister’s advice and begins an affair with her co-worker only for her husband to tell her the true reason for his avoidance; however, her actions have set a series of consequences in motion.

programme.title: Lost Focus
programme.desc: A man plays tit-for-tat with his estranged wife and loses focus which costs him his family, wealth and happiness. The situation gets dire and it seems like the solution lies in the hands of his ex-wife.

programme.title: Unprecedented
programme.desc: Nadia and Simon start developing feelings for each other after Nadia is hired as a nurse for his wife, Theresa. Things get further complicated when their son, Raymond, comes home to visit and Theresa ends up dead.

programme.title: Number 1 Pastor
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Eze was not called by God, but by money when he realizes how much money pastors are making. He decides to venture into the ministry, guising as a pastor, and develops a plan to get money. He plants listening devices in the houses of his church members and pretending to prophesy what he listens in on. His ministry grows big but he soon catches the attention of Shalewa , a young investigative journalist who is desperate for her big break and she decides to do a piece on him.

programme.title: The Housekeepers Daughter
programme.desc: A housekeeper and her boss decide to play matchmaker between her daughter and his son but plans go awry as an unforeseen chain of events and perhaps a sprinkling of fate bring about totally unexpected results.

programme.title: A Dance With Mama
programme.desc: The past and present collide when young man is about to become a father for the first time and sees that some of the challenges his wife goes through appear to mirror what his mother suffered through

programme.title: Benefit Boys
programme.desc: When a group of school boys suddenly start showing off material things on campus, they raise suspicion about where their sudden wealth has come from.

programme.title: Broken Glass
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When lke is released from prison after being convicted for a crime he didnt commit, he finds out that all his properties are gone, his wife is now married to his best friend, and a daughter that barely recognises him. Determined to get his life back, he starts a lowly job that leads him to a young woman, who feels sorry for him and decides to help him get all he has lost.

programme.title: Blurred
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A young couple decide to have an open marriage after being plagued by infidelity for a number of years; putting in place rules of engagement to make sure their relationship stays safe. Things get complicated when one of them falls in love with their new lover and seriously contemplates ending their marriage.

programme.title: Lovers Nest
programme.desc: It is love at first sight when Kenny lays eyes on Mira, but she uses her career as an excuse not to commit to him. Will his persistence pay off or is there another reason Mira refuses to go out with him?

programme.title: Business Men
programme.desc: In a bid to make some extra cash and impress the family of his beloved, David unknowingly gets involved with some nefarious characters leading up to a major police investigation.

programme.title: Insight
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A rich couples plan to have their first child abroad hit a snag when the man loses his main source of income but refuses to let his wife know. He decides to do several jobs to make up the money but ends up neglecting his wife. Things take a turn when she finds out about the deceit by accident.

programme.title: Clandestine
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Alex and Lola are on the verge of a messy divorce due to Alex’s promiscuity. Still raving with desire for each other, Lola’s parents’ step in to try and save the day but would their efforts be enough now that music aficionado Lola has met the canary, George?

programme.title: Dark Horse
programme.desc: Imeldas father vehemently disapproves of her relationahip with her new boyfriend, causing a rift within their family. Is he just over-protective or is there something more sinister behind his behaviour?

programme.title: Digging Deep
programme.desc: A group of young women faces very different challenges in their relationships, from infidelity to negligence, try to help each other out with their problems but things do not go as planned

programme.title: Do Not Marry
programme.desc: Lekan tries to put peter off getting married because he wants to continue to live off peter free of charge. He hires a hooker, simi, as a way to get peter’s mind off the marriage train but his plan backfires when simi discovers lekan’s true motives.

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 1
programme.desc: MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life.

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 2
programme.desc: The new season of MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life.

programme.title: Reform
programme.desc: Two detectives are forced to team up with a sinister criminal to save the daughter of an important man. Can they put their differences aside for the mission?

programme.title: Eva
programme.desc: Eva finds herself in the middle of family drama when she is taken in by a handsome man, not realising the complicated relationship he has with his wealthy father and his father’s cunning and jealous new wife.

programme.title: Intoxication
programme.desc: A hardworking husband and his materialistic wife are at odds with each other when his main means of income is compromised. She does all she can to continue keeping up appearances in public but their relationship is falling apart behind the scenes.

programme.title: Rekindle
programme.desc: Kofi meets Iris, a beautiful woman during her vacation to Ghana and becomes infatuated with her, but she leaves him without leaving any information as to where she can be reached. When he goes to Nigeria to visit, he is surprised to be greeted by a familiar face claiming to be his cousin, Frank’s fiance.

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 1
programme.desc: MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life.

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 2
programme.desc: The new season of MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life.

programme.title: Number 1 Pastor
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Eze was not called by God, but by money when he realizes how much money pastors are making. He decides to venture into the ministry, guising as a pastor, and develops a plan to get money. He plants listening devices in the houses of his church members and pretending to prophesy what he listens in on. His ministry grows big but he soon catches the attention of Shalewa , a young investigative journalist who is desperate for her big break and she decides to do a piece on him.

programme.title: The Best 1977 Party...Ever!
programme.desc: Blimey, what a year! Get ready to turn your telly up LOUD, with the greatest party anthems from 77 including Showaddywaddy, David Bowie, Boney M and The Sex Pistols.

programme.title: Every Party No.1 of the 70s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Every Party No.1 of the 70s!
programme.desc: In year order - the 70 biggest party tunes of the 70s! Every one of them a chart topper.

programme.title: All Day - They Hit The Top Spot!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 All Day - They Hit The Top Spot!
programme.desc: All day - a choice selection of the 168 singles that reached the top of the UK charts in the 1970s!

programme.title: Did They Think They Could Dance?!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Did They Think They Could Dance?!
programme.desc: From 1970 to 1979, videos full of self belief - but have their moves stood the test of time? You decide as we bring you 25 clips of dodgy dance - youll love their Tiger Feet!

programme.title: Saturday Nights Alright!
programme.desc: From the era of Glam Rock, New Wave and Disco - its all the party hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots and flares at the ready?

programme.title: Flares and Floorfillers! 1970-1979
programme.desc: Mmm, sniff that heady waft of Brut mixed with cheap perfume as you hit a dancefloor for our playlist of top bops in your cheesecloth shirt or nylon blouse. Make mine a Babycham!

programme.title: Let The Good Times Roll!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Let The Good Times Roll!
programme.desc: From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul and disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1973
programme.desc: 1973 was another top year in music, as Glam Rock ruled, Paul McCartney did Bond and the UK had its biggest Christmas chart battle ever! Simon Bates has the story - month by month.

programme.title: Let The Good Times Roll!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Let The Good Times Roll!
programme.desc: From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul and disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!

programme.title: David Bowie: Sound and Vision!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 David Bowie: Sound and Vision!
programme.desc: From 1969s chart debut "Space Oddity" to 1980s "Ashes to Ashes" - Bowie was the ultimate icon of the decade. Here are 13 videos - with huge hits, but some you might not know!

programme.title: Abba Gold! 1974-1979
programme.desc: Quite simply the biggest hits from the biggest pop act of the 70s - Abba. 12 songs, 7 UK number 1s.

programme.title: The NOW 100 of the 70s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The NOW 100 of the 70s
programme.desc: Exclusive to NOW 70s, Mark Goodier brings this marathon 100 countdown of the decades biggest acts, based on global record sales, live concert takings, and awards. So whos no.1?

programme.title: 70s Love Songs
programme.desc: Non-stop love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees and Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: Essentials! 70s Crooners
programme.desc: 2 hours of smooth intimate songs from some of the biggest singers of the 70s. Including Elvis, Frank, Neil Sedaka, Andy Williams, Roger Whittaker, Barry Manilow and Elton John.

programme.title: The NOW 100 of the 70s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The NOW 100 of the 70s
programme.desc: Exclusive to NOW 70s, Mark Goodier brings this marathon 100 countdown of the decades biggest acts, based on global record sales, live concert takings, and awards. So whos no.1?

programme.desc: We said goodbye to the Beatles - but hello to Elton John, as well as prog rock, glam rock and heavy metal! The 1970s kicked off right here.

programme.title: The Loss Adjuster
programme.desc: En forsikringsmann som kjemper med tap og kjærlighet, oppdager nye muligheter i en uke full av uventede hendelser og komiske vendepunkter.

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: Tassa lamminhenkisessa joulukomediassa Rodriguezin perheen kauempana asuvat jasenet kokoontuvat vanhempiensa kotiin kenties viimeista kertaa viettamaan joulua yhdessa.

programme.title: So This Is Christmas
programme.desc: Ashley Young on joutunut ojaan elamaansa ja hengailua vaara ihmisia yrittaa paeta kaikkea draama. Yhtakkia kaikki tuntuu muuttaa suuntaa, kun he palkkasivat kasityolainen kannustaa hanta sietaa 1. Heinakuuta pelata oikeudettoman nuorille. Ashley nakee mahdollisuuden parantua oman levoton perheen kannustamalla muita enemman avun tarpeessa. Yhdessa he loytavat hammastyttavaa, mita voi helposti åstakomma kautta ihana lahja, joka vain antaakseni muille.

programme.title: The Christmas Setup
programme.desc: Asianajaja Hugo matkustaa New Yorkista kotikaupunkiinsa Milwaukieen tapaamaan aitiaan. Äiti esittelee hanelle vanhan lukioaikaisen ihastuksensa Patrickin, ja parin valilla alkaa kipinoida. Mutta Hugolle tarjotaan unelmatyota Lontoossa ja hanen on valittava: ura vai juuri loytynyt rakkaus.

programme.title: Jouluhaat
programme.desc: Haley Foster pakeni lapsuutensa pikkukaupungista Pineridgesta ja siirtyi suurkaupunkilaiselamaan losangelesilaisena haajarjestelijana rva Reynoldsin omistamassa eliittiluokan yrityksessa.

programme.title: A Taste Of Christmas
programme.desc: Kun pikkukaupungin yrittelias leipuri Emily saa omatekoisen joulukalenterin salaiselta ihailijalta, paikalliset haluavat kiihkeasti selvittaa lahettajan henkilollisyyden. Kaupungissa juoruillaan seka joulukalenterista etta Emilyn rakkausseikkailuista, koska kaikki poikamiehet ovat kiinnostuneita hanesta. Mutta Emilya kiinnostaa hanen pahin kilpailijansa, ranskalaisleipuri Gerard.

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: Cooperien iso perhe kokoontuu viettamaan joulua yhdessa, mutta perinteisia kuvioita sotkevat yllatysvieraat.

programme.title: A Christmas Coincidence
programme.desc: Joulu lahestyy isoin askelin, kun Paula suostuu hieman vastahakoisesti poikaystavansa kosintaan. Isoaiti Jane tuntee, ettei kaikki ole kohdallaan ja kutsuu Paulan luokseen maalle piristaakseen tyttoa. Paula vierailee laheisella viinitilalla ja tapaa sen omistajan Geryn. Sarja yhteensattumia lahentaa heita toisiinsa. Seudun yli kulkee myrsky, joka pakottaa Paulan jaamaan yoksi. Ja pian han ymmartaa, etta juuri heidat on tarkoitettu toisilleen...

programme.title: 12 Pups of Christmas
programme.desc: Erinin miessuhteen paatyttya han aloittelee elamaansa uudessa tyossa ja uudessa kaupungissa. Mutta juuri kun han luulee paasseensa tasapainoon, han tormaa itsekeskeiseen pomoonsa Martiniin. Mies yrittaa pitaa firmaansa pystyssa ja pyytaa Erinilta apua. Hanen pitaisi juuri ennen joulua huolehtia 12 koiranpennusta, jotka ovat jaaneet toimistolle kuvaustoiden loputtua. Kun Erin ja Martin tekevat tyota yhdessa, tunteet lampenevat, ja rakkaus tulee mukaan sopivasti juuri jouluksi.

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: Menestysmysteerikirjailija Mary Higgins Clarkin romaaniin perustuva elokuva nahdaan jouluna salapoliisitarinana. Naisetsiva lyottaytyy yksiin amatoorietsivan kanssa loytaakseen kadonneen isansa.

programme.title: Guess Whos Coming To Christmas Dinner?
programme.desc: Aktiivinen, liberaali ja edistyksellinen oikeustieteen opiskelija Maya tuo uuden poikaystavansa kotiin jouluksi - kertomatta perheelleen, etta han on valkoinen. Arvaa, kuka tulee joulupaivalliselle?

programme.title: High Holiday
programme.desc: Vapaamielinen Liz ei ole kovin innokas viemaan poikaystavaansa vanhoillisen perheensa joulupaivalliselle. Mutta poikaystava ehdottaa, etta Liz maustaisi salaattikastikkeen marijuanalla, jotta tunnelma vapautuisi. Alkaa kaaos, kun kaikki ovat tietamattaan pilvessa ja perheensisaiset salaisuudet paljastuvat.

programme.title: This is England 88 (Part 3)
programme.desc: Tuhoisat tapahtumat, jotka tapahtuivat 18 kuukautta sitten, vainoavat Lolia (Vicky McClure) ja Woodya (Joe Gilgun), jotka molemmat kamppailevat selvitakseen tunteellisesta tappiosta. Lol huomaa nopeasti, etta hanen voimavaransa ovat ehtymassa, kun han yrittaa hoitaa uusia vastuita ja vanhoja velvoitteita. Yhdessa sielunkumppaninsa Woodyn kanssa, joka on epatoivoinen petoksestaan ja itse valitsemastaan maanpaosta jengin ulkopuolella, Lol eristaytyy ja tuntee itsensa yha yksinaisemmaksi.

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: Cooperien iso perhe kokoontuu viettamaan joulua yhdessa, mutta perinteisia kuvioita sotkevat yllatysvieraat.

programme.title: Mina armahdan Mooses ei (The Troublemakers)
programme.desc: Travis (Terence Hill) on lannen nopein vetaja. Hanen veljensa Moses (Bud Spencer) on vakeva kuin karhu, mutta monin verroin pahansisuisempi ja seudun kovin palkkionmetsastaja. Kun heidan vanha aitimuorinsa paattaa saattaa veljekset yhteen jouluna, saa Travis tehtavakseen houkutella Moseksen kotiin.

programme.title: Tyler Perrys a Madea Christmas
programme.desc: Madea juhlistaa joulua yhdessa ystavansa ja taman maalla asuvan perheen kanssa. Nyt on parasta olla kilttina!

programme.title: Joulukievari
programme.desc: Kun liikenainen Jennifer kuulee vanhempiensa lahtevan matkoille jouluksi ilman hanta, han paattaa jattaa San Franciscon humun taakseen ja lahtea Alaskaan tutustumaan isoaidiltaan perinnoksi saamaansa kievarrin, joka on tarkoitus kunnostaa ja myyda.

programme.title: 12 Gifts of Christmas
programme.desc: Tyoton taidemaalari Anna kamppailee taloutensa kanssa, mutta loytaa tyopaikan kirean liikemiehen Marcin henkilokohtaisena jouluostosten tekijana.

programme.title: Joulu tilauksesta
programme.desc: Gretchen saa joulun tapahtua missa ja milloin tahansa.

programme.title: So This Is Christmas
programme.desc: Ashley Young on joutunut ojaan elamaansa ja hengailua vaara ihmisia yrittaa paeta kaikkea draama. Yhtakkia kaikki tuntuu muuttaa suuntaa, kun he palkkasivat kasityolainen kannustaa hanta sietaa 1. Heinakuuta pelata oikeudettoman nuorille. Ashley nakee mahdollisuuden parantua oman levoton perheen kannustamalla muita enemman avun tarpeessa. Yhdessa he loytavat hammastyttavaa, mita voi helposti åstakomma kautta ihana lahja, joka vain antaakseni muille.

programme.title: Santa Who?
programme.desc: Oikea joulupukki putoaa reesta ja menettaa muistinsa. Han tormaa pian tympaantyneeseen TV-toimittajaan, joka on hanen ainoa toivonsa palauttaa muisti ajoissa, etta joulu voidaan pelastaa.

programme.title: Vain Frendeja
programme.desc: Tapaus: Chris Bander. High school -vuodet eivat sujuneet mallikkaasti: kaveri oli ujo, ylipainoinen ja toivottomasti rakastunut koulun suosituimpaan typyyn nimelta Jamie. Mutta kun Chris viimein saa kerattya tarpeeksi rohkeutta kertoakseen Jamielle tunteistaan, tytto sanoo haluavansa olla vain ystavia. Tanaan Chris on losangelesilainen musiikkimoguli, jolla riittaa misuja vaikka joka sormelle. Mutta kun Chris kohtalon oikusta sattuu kavaisemaan vanhoilla kotinurkillaan, sulavaliikkeiselle pelimiehelle avautuu uusi mahdollisuus yrittaa hurmata Jamie. Mutta frendivyohyke on paha, ja harvassa ovat sielta ulosmurtautuneet uskalikot.

programme.title: Mr. Christmas
programme.desc: Tom on luonut uran auttamalla asiakkaita, jotta nama loytaisivat rakastetulleen taydellisen lahjan. Joulun lahestyessa Tomin paras ystava Paul pyytaa Tomia keksimaan lahjan tyttoystavalleen Jennylle. Kun Tom tutustuu Jennyyn paremmin, asia mutkistuu, koska han huomaa rakastuneensa kaverinsa tyttoystavaan. Tyotehtava on melkein hoidettu, mutta Tom on pahoillaan, koska hanen ainoa mahdollisuutensa loytaa sielunkumppani on kariutumassa.

programme.title: The Christmas Setup
programme.desc: Asianajaja Hugo matkustaa New Yorkista kotikaupunkiinsa Milwaukieen tapaamaan aitiaan. Äiti esittelee hanelle vanhan lukioaikaisen ihastuksensa Patrickin, ja parin valilla alkaa kipinoida. Mutta Hugolle tarjotaan unelmatyota Lontoossa ja hanen on valittava: ura vai juuri loytynyt rakkaus.

programme.title: Guess Whos Coming To Christmas Dinner?
programme.desc: Aktiivinen, liberaali ja edistyksellinen oikeustieteen opiskelija Maya tuo uuden poikaystavansa kotiin jouluksi - kertomatta perheelleen, etta han on valkoinen. Arvaa, kuka tulee joulupaivalliselle?

programme.title: Joulumaa
programme.desc: Joulumaa on nahnyt parempiakin paivia Glindan menehdyttya, ja Julesin taytyy tehda valtavia paatoksia.

programme.title: Mina armahdan Mooses ei (The Troublemakers)
programme.desc: Travis (Terence Hill) on lannen nopein vetaja. Hanen veljensa Moses (Bud Spencer) on vakeva kuin karhu, mutta monin verroin pahansisuisempi ja seudun kovin palkkionmetsastaja. Kun heidan vanha aitimuorinsa paattaa saattaa veljekset yhteen jouluna, saa Travis tehtavakseen houkutella Moseksen kotiin.

Mutta kun Chris kohtalon oikusta sattuu kavaisemaan vanhoilla kotinurkillaan, sulavaliikkeiselle pelimiehelle avautuu uusi mahdollisuus yrittaa hurmata Jamie. programme.title: This is England 88 (Part 2)
programme.desc: Tuhoisat tapahtumat, jotka tapahtuivat 18 kuukautta sitten, vainoavat Lolia (Vicky McClure) ja Woodya (Joe Gilgun), jotka molemmat kamppailevat selvitakseen tunteellisesta tappiosta. Lol huomaa nopeasti, etta hanen voimavaransa ovat ehtymassa, kun han yrittaa hoitaa uusia vastuita ja vanhoja velvoitteita. Yhdessa sielunkumppaninsa Woodyn kanssa, joka on epatoivoinen petoksestaan ja itse valitsemastaan maanpaosta jengin ulkopuolella, Lol eristaytyy ja tuntee itsensa yha yksinaisemmaksi.

programme.title: Happy New Year, Colin Burstead
programme.desc: Colin Burstead paattaa vuokrata ylellisen kartanon ja ottaa uuden vuoden vastaan perheen ja suvun kanssa. Kun David-veli ilmestyy kutsumatta paikalle, veljesten keskinainen kilpailu karjistyy huippuunsa. Uudenvuodenjuhlat, joista Colin oli toivonut suvun leppoisaa jalleennakemista, muuttuvat viheliaiseksi juonitteluksi. Happy New Year, Colin Burstead on kriitikoiden kehuman Ben Wheatleyn uusin elokuva, joka huokuu hanelle ominaista mustaa huumoria ja epasovinnaista kerrontaa.

programme.title: Furry Little Christmas
programme.desc: Suurkaupungin elainlaakari kaatuu pikkukaupungin laakariin, kun tama paattaa jarjestaa New Yorkin joulun hanen kotikaupungissaan Vermontissa.
