programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 WSOF11: Gaethje vs. Newell
programme.desc: Gaethje vs. Newell

programme.title: Lindell - Kaarmeenkantaja - Del 1
programme.desc: Ensi hetkesta alkaen Kaarmeenkantaja pitaa katsojan otteessaan tassa jarkyttavassa psykologisessa draamassa, jossa hulluuden logiikka ajaa tapahtumia kohti vaistamatonta kliimaksia. Sarjamurhaaja kulkee vapaana Oslossa. 43-vuotias, juuri eronnut ja vastarakastunut Cato Isaksen ja hanen kollegansa Oslon murharyhmassa juoksevat kilpaa aikaa vastaan. Silla murhaaja aikoo tappaa uudelleen. Hirvittavalla tavalla Cato Isaksenin yksityiselama punoutuu tuntemattoman murhaajan mielen sokkeloihin. Kun Isaksen viimein tajuaa, kuka murhaaja on, on melkein liian myohaista.

programme.title: Ykkoset Ja Nollat - Osa 1
programme.desc: Kriitikoiden ylistama brutaali gangsteridraama Johan Renckilta! FBI ja Interpol saavat vihia suuresta luottokorttisotkusta, ja narkkari Sebbe napataan kiinni epailtyna. Poliisin aloittaessa kuulustelun he saavat kuulla uskomattoman tarinan Goteborgin alamaailmasta. Ruotsalaiset ja venalaiset gangsterit, marokkolaiset hakkerit, korruptoituneet poliitikot ja ahneet virkamiehet - kaikki haluavat ansaita isot rahat, kukaan ei halua olla rakkikoira.

programme.title: Rosso
programme.desc: Roadmovieta ja rikosdraamaa taidokkaasti yhdisteleva Rosso on kertomus sisilialaisesta palkkamurhaajasta Giancarlo Rossosta, joka on tullut Suomeen etsimaan seuraavaa kohdettaan, joka sattuu olemaan hanen rakastettunsa Marja. Odottamattomasti Rosso saa jaljitysapua Marjan veljelta Martilta, vaikkei heilla ole edes yhteista kielta. Matkalle mahtuu niin romuttamokeikka kuin pari ryostoakin..

programme.title: Pax
programme.desc: Intiimissa romanttisessa draamassa seitseman lentomatkustajaa joutuu kasvokkain kuoleman kanssa, kun heidan koneensa joutuu armottoman myrskyn kouriin. Kriisin keskella matkustajat kohtaavat kunnolla myos itsensa, mika muuttaa heidan elamansa – jos sen vain on tarkoitettu jatkua…

programme.title: Cha Cha Cha
programme.desc: Siltojen alla asusteleva alkoholisti Matti (Matti Pellonpaa) on saamassa Amerikan tadiltaan huomattavan perinnon, mutta miehen tulisi olla edustuskelpoinen tadin vierailun ajan. Matti kertoo tilanteesta autokauppiaana tyoskentelevalle ystavalleen, joka ehdottaa korvausta vastaan roolien vaihtoa.

programme.title: Klaani - tarina Sammakoiden suvusta
programme.desc: Klaani on rikollissuvun tarina, jossa Mika Kaurismaki kasittelee perinteisen eeppisen muodon valityksella olemassaolon ehtoja, lain oikean ja vaaran puolen hailyvalla rajalla. Sammakoitten perheen nuorin poika Aleksanteri on sukunsa valkoinen lammas. Hanen toivotaan pysyvan kaidalla tiella, toisin kuin isansa ja muut suvun miehet. Mutta perhe on pahin ja veri on vetta sakeampaa.. Perhedraama Klaani on upea kunnianosoitus vanhalle Suomi-filmille. Paaosissa nahdaan Markku Halme ja Minna Soisalo ja sivuroolit vilisevat lukuisia huippunayttelijoita: Lasse Poysti, Juhani Niemela, Antti Litja, Kari Vaananen, Soli Labbart.

programme.title: Arvottomat
programme.desc: Mika Kaurismaen ensimmainen pitka elokuva. Kasikirjoituksen han teki yhdessa veljensa Akin kanssa. Arvottomat on ajaton kuvaus siita kuinka Pikkurikollinen Manne, maalaispoika Harri ja kaunis Veera ajavat Volgalla lapi katoavien suomalaismaisemien, poliisien ja gangsterien roikkuessa herkeamatta kintereilla.. Vauhdikasta matkaa siivittavat mm. Juicen ja Rauli Baddingin ikivihreat kappaleet.

programme.title: Long Story Short
programme.desc: Tama on kertomus Ellenista ja hanen ystavistaan seka heidan enemman tai vahemman itse aiheuttamistaan monimutkaisista rakkauselamistaan ja romanttisista unelmistaan. Kolmen vuoden ajan ystavapiirin parhaat ja huonoimmat rakkaustarinat tiivistyvat ja kerrotaan kahdeksan luvun kautta, joista jokainen sijoittuu eri juhlatilaisuuteen. Ryhma kamppailee taydellisen suhteen idean kanssa ja joutuu arvioimaan uudelleen, mita todellinen rakkaus oikein on.

programme.title: Rikos ja rangaistus
programme.desc: Rikos ja rangaistus on moderni tulkinta Dostojevskin kuuluisasta romaanista. Murhaajan (Markku Toikka) ja poliisin (Esko Nikkari, Mies vailla menneisyytta) huimaava psykologinen kaksintaistelu tapahtuu oisen Helsingin sivukujilla ja lain tuolla puolen.

programme.title: Amazon
programme.desc: Suomalainen mies Kari (Kari Vaananen) paattaa vaimonsa kuoltua muuttaa Brasiliaan kahden tyttarensa kanssa. Han tapaa pian ramapaisen amerikkalaisen lentajan ja seikkailja Danin (Robert Davi: Die Hard, 007 - Lupa tappaa), joka kertoo Karille suunnitelmastaan kaivaa kultaa Amazonin viidakosta. Mutta Kari tormaa myos kauniiseen Paolaan (Rae Dawn Chong: Commando, Haivahdys purppuraa), jolta han oppii paremmin Amazonin tilanteesta ja sen uhkakuvista.

programme.title: Ykkoset Ja Nollat - Osa 1
programme.desc: Kriitikoiden ylistama brutaali gangsteridraama Johan Renckilta! FBI ja Interpol saavat vihia suuresta luottokorttisotkusta, ja narkkari Sebbe napataan kiinni epailtyna. Poliisin aloittaessa kuulustelun he saavat kuulla uskomattoman tarinan Goteborgin alamaailmasta. Ruotsalaiset ja venalaiset gangsterit, marokkolaiset hakkerit, korruptoituneet poliitikot ja ahneet virkamiehet - kaikki haluavat ansaita isot rahat, kukaan ei halua olla rakkikoira.

programme.title: Hotet
programme.desc: Lasse Brudell on vastaava ohjelmoija Vidselin lentotukikohdassa Norrbottenissa. Han tyoskentelee huippusalaisen JAS Gripeniin liittyvan EWS-puolustusjarjestelman parissa. Majuri Haglund, karaistunut sotaveteraani, johtaa armeijan erikoisjoukkoja. Miesten tiet kohtaavat, kun Haglund kutsutaan nostamaan turvatoimien tasoa Gripenin ulkomaisille ostajaehdokkaille valmisteltavaa esittelya varten.

programme.title: Kostaja haudan takaa
programme.desc: Jimmylla on pakkomielle saada yhteys kuolleeseen aitiinsa mustan magian kautta ja han on pelottavan lahella onnistua. Mutta kun hanen uusi ystavansa Amir yrittaa saada hanet tekemaan vaikutuksen koulun kuumimpiin tyttoihin yksinkertaisella rituaalilla, jatkat vapauttavat pahan voiman, joka voi herattaa kuolleet ja tehda aidista zombien.

programme.title: Lindell - Suruvaippa - Osa 1
programme.desc: Nelja pikkutyttoa valokuvassa. Kaksikymmenta vuotta myohemmin yksi heista loytyy surmattuna. Toinen on kadonnut jaljettomiin. Cato Isaksen on valmiina ratkaisemaan uusia rikosarvoituksia. Menneisyys saavuttaa Lise Sommerin. Paras ystavatar Esther Synnøve Lønn on loytynyt surmattuna ja kurkku auki viillettyna. Joitakin paivia myohemmin myos Estherin poika katoaa. Kun poliisi alkaa rapsuttaa julkisivua, kay ilmi, etta myos eras Lisen ja Esther Synnøven lapsuudenystava on kateissa. Ystavattarien valinen suhde katkee synkkia salaisuuksia. Mita oikeastaan tapahtui tyttojen ollessa pienia?

programme.title: Lake of Death
programme.desc: Bernhard Borgen romaanin innoittama. Lillianin kaksoisveli Bjorn menehtyy selittamattomasti ollessaan yksin perheen vanhalla mokilla. Vuotta myohemmin Lillian saapuu mokille ystaviensa kanssa hyvastellakseen paikan ennen myyntia, kun oudot tapahtumat alkavat seurata toisiaan. Lillian kavelee unissaan eika erota painajaista todellisuudesta. Joku tai jotkin ovat heidan kannoillaan ja lopulta loytyy ruumis. Onko legenda Tore Gruvikista totta vai onko vihollinen joku ryhmasta? Mita viime kesana tapahtui ja mika Bjorn Werneria vaivasi?

programme.title: Going to Kansas City
programme.desc: Kansas City taalta tullaan!” huudahtaa Mikko (Mikko Nousiainen) lahtiessaan vaihtooppilaaksi jenkkeihin. Sykkivan suurkaupungin sijaan han loytaakin itsensa pienesta Canaanin maalaiskaupungista, jossa ulkopuolisia ei toivoteta tervetulleeksi. Kaiken lisaksi Mikko ihastuu Carly Maloneen (Melissa Galianos), kaupungin katkeroituneen apulaisseriffin (Michael Ironside) tyttareen.

programme.title: 6 Juni
programme.desc: Samira on kaunis 24-vuotias nainen. Hanen perheensa on luvannut hanet vaimoksi miehelle, jota han ei rakasta. Jos Samira ei suostu avioliittoon, hanta uhkaa kunniamurha. Hasse on keski-ikainen mies, joka karsii tuomiota rattijuopumuksesta. Han haaveilee rauhallisesta elamasta vaimonsa ja poikansa kanssa – raittiina. Gertrud on ollut leski jo yhdeksan vuotta. Naapurin Bertil aikoo vihdoinkin voittaa Gertrudin sydamen itselleen ja haudata aviomiehen lopullisesti. Fredrikin tyttoystava on raskaana ja aikoo tehda abortin. 16-vuotias Frederik ei pysty hyvaksymaan tyton paatosta vaan karkaa kotoaan.

programme.title: Calamari Union
programme.desc: Calamari Union on kaikkien aikojen kulttiklassikko, joka kertoo seitsemantoista Frankin ja yhden Pekan matkasta Kallion varjoisilta kujilta kohti Eiran raikkaita tuulia, joista he ovat kuulleet isovanhempiensa kertovan. Epatoivoinen matka kaupungin betoniviidakon halki on taynna vaaroja ja houkutuksia joista alati vaanivat seireenit eivat ole vahaisin, eivatka kaikki matkaan lahteneet mitenkaan voi paasta perille. Jos yksikaanï...

programme.title: Bitchkram
programme.desc: Kristin laskee paivia ylioppilaskirjoituksiin, jolloin han vihdoin voi jattaa pikkukaupungin ja manipuloivan sisarensa unelmiensa New Yorkia varten. Kaikki on taydellista, ja paikallislehti on luvannut julkaista Kristinin kolumneja kaupungista, joka ei koskaan nuku. Mutta Kristin myohastyy lennoltaan ja piiloutuu sen sijaan Andrean, omituisen nuoren tyton, luo syrjaiseen maalaistaloon valttaakseen taydellisen noyryytyksen.

programme.title: Rikos ja rangaistus
programme.desc: Rikos ja rangaistus on moderni tulkinta Dostojevskin kuuluisasta romaanista. Murhaajan (Markku Toikka) ja poliisin (Esko Nikkari, Mies vailla menneisyytta) huimaava psykologinen kaksintaistelu tapahtuu oisen Helsingin sivukujilla ja lain tuolla puolen.

programme.title: Arvottomat
programme.desc: Mika Kaurismaen ensimmainen pitka elokuva. Kasikirjoituksen han teki yhdessa veljensa Akin kanssa. Arvottomat on ajaton kuvaus siita kuinka Pikkurikollinen Manne, maalaispoika Harri ja kaunis Veera ajavat Volgalla lapi katoavien suomalaismaisemien, poliisien ja gangsterien roikkuessa herkeamatta kintereilla.. Vauhdikasta matkaa siivittavat mm. Juicen ja Rauli Baddingin ikivihreat kappaleet.

programme.title: Pax
programme.desc: Intiimissa romanttisessa draamassa seitseman lentomatkustajaa joutuu kasvokkain kuoleman kanssa, kun heidan koneensa joutuu armottoman myrskyn kouriin. Kriisin keskella matkustajat kohtaavat kunnolla myos itsensa, mika muuttaa heidan elamansa – jos sen vain on tarkoitettu jatkua…

programme.title: Rosso
programme.desc: Roadmovieta ja rikosdraamaa taidokkaasti yhdisteleva Rosso on kertomus sisilialaisesta palkkamurhaajasta Giancarlo Rossosta, joka on tullut Suomeen etsimaan seuraavaa kohdettaan, joka sattuu olemaan hanen rakastettunsa Marja. Odottamattomasti Rosso saa jaljitysapua Marjan veljelta Martilta, vaikkei heilla ole edes yhteista kielta. Matkalle mahtuu niin romuttamokeikka kuin pari ryostoakin..

programme.title: Cha Cha Cha
programme.desc: Siltojen alla asusteleva alkoholisti Matti (Matti Pellonpaa) on saamassa Amerikan tadiltaan huomattavan perinnon, mutta miehen tulisi olla edustuskelpoinen tadin vierailun ajan. Matti kertoo tilanteesta autokauppiaana tyoskentelevalle ystavalleen, joka ehdottaa korvausta vastaan roolien vaihtoa.

programme.title: A Polar Year
programme.desc: 28-vuotias Anders paattaa matkata Gronlantiin ja ryhtya opettajaksi pienessa kylassa. Hanen vanhempansa ottavat asiaan etaisyytta, silla he olettavat taman ottavan kotitilan haltuunsa, mutta Anders kaipaa maisemanvaihdosta ja uusia haasteita. Elama pienessa kylassa on kovaa – kovempaa kuin Anders oli olettanut. Kylalaiset eivat lampene tulokkaalle, ja mikali han aikoo olla asukkaille – varsinkin lapsille – lainkaan hyodyksi, on hanen tehtava tarkea paatos. Hanen on opittava tuntemaan ihmiset, opeteltava kylan tavoille ja varsinkin tuntea sen perinteet. Vasta sitten aivan uusi maailma aukenee Andersin edessa...

programme.title: Hotet
programme.desc: Lasse Brudell on vastaava ohjelmoija Vidselin lentotukikohdassa Norrbottenissa. Han tyoskentelee huippusalaisen JAS Gripeniin liittyvan EWS-puolustusjarjestelman parissa. Majuri Haglund, karaistunut sotaveteraani, johtaa armeijan erikoisjoukkoja. Miesten tiet kohtaavat, kun Haglund kutsutaan nostamaan turvatoimien tasoa Gripenin ulkomaisille ostajaehdokkaille valmisteltavaa esittelya varten.

programme.title: Project Z
programme.desc: Ryhma elokuva-alan opiskelijoita vie kolme tyotonta nayttelijaa lakkautettuun hotelliin Norjan vuoristossa kuvatakseen zombielokuvaa. Fiktio muuttuu faktaksi, kun tuntematon olento alkaa terrorisoida kuvauksia.

programme.title: Lake of Death
programme.desc: Bernhard Borgen romaanin innoittama. Lillianin kaksoisveli Bjorn menehtyy selittamattomasti ollessaan yksin perheen vanhalla mokilla. Vuotta myohemmin Lillian saapuu mokille ystaviensa kanssa hyvastellakseen paikan ennen myyntia, kun oudot tapahtumat alkavat seurata toisiaan. Lillian kavelee unissaan eika erota painajaista todellisuudesta. Joku tai jotkin ovat heidan kannoillaan ja lopulta loytyy ruumis. Onko legenda Tore Gruvikista totta vai onko vihollinen joku ryhmasta? Mita viime kesana tapahtui ja mika Bjorn Werneria vaivasi?

programme.title: Blodsbroder
programme.desc: Suoritettuaan pitkan vankilarangaistuksensa Jon on paattanyt aloittaa alusta. Han haluaa opiskella ja elaa ilman huumeita, vakivaltaa ja rikoksia. Lojaalisuus pikkuveljea kohtaan vie hanet kuitenkin pikkuhiljaa takaisin rikollisuuden pariin. Han kohtaa myos suuren rakkautensa Marlenan.

programme.title: Hamlet liikemaailmassa
programme.desc: Maailmankirjallisuuden tunnetuin sukudraama on siiretty nykysuomen liike-elaman vallan linnakkeisiin, keskelle Helsingin rock´n rollin tahdissa sykkivaa betoniviidakkoa.

programme.title: Keepin It Classy

programme.title: Partners in Crime

programme.title: Marge Madness
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Marge Simpson turns to the All Stars to design a date night dress for an evening out with Homer.

programme.title: As Sewn on TV
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Remaining designers visit the headquarters of QVC where they are asked to design a red carpet dress.

programme.title: #Ninas Trending
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Designers team up with influential fashion bloggers to identify a new trend for 2014.

programme.title: Fashion Cents
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: The All Stars work with design house Milly to create ready-to-wear looks to be sold for charity.

programme.title: Are UN Or Are You Out

programme.desc: Season finale. Designers present collections inspired by their own heritage at a VIP runway show.

programme.title: Reunion Special

programme.title: Road to the Runway
programme.desc: Tim Gunn introduces the eighteen new designers on the premiere of Project Runway Season 13.

programme.title: The Judges Decide
programme.desc: 18 new designers meet as they arrive in NYC and face one final audition in front of the judges.

programme.title: Unconventional Movie Nite!
programme.desc: Designers are taken to a movie theatre where they work in teams… with unconventional materials!

programme.title: Welcome To The Future
programme.desc: The designers make a look that could be worn twenty years in the future in Marie Claire magazine.

programme.title: A Suitable Twist
programme.desc: The designers take a men’s suit, and transform it into a high fashion women’s look.

programme.title: The Klum of Doom
programme.desc: Heidi asks the designers to create a red carpet look that she could wear to the Creative Arts Emmys.

programme.title: Rock The Wedding
programme.desc: Designers work in pairs to create looks that could be worn for a “nontraditional wedding.”

programme.title: Priceless Runway
programme.desc: With the help of Chopard, the designers create an extravagant eveningwear piece inspired by jewelry.

programme.title: The Rainway
programme.desc: Inspired by Samsungs Curved TV, designers create avant-garde pieces that look good at every angle.

programme.title: American Girl Doll
programme.desc: The designers create a modern look for a girl, inspired by the “Beforever” American Doll collection.

programme.title: Muse On The Street
programme.desc: The designers are asked to find a stranger on the street to act as their muse/model for a makeover.

programme.title: Highest Bidder
programme.desc: The designers are taken to a warehouse and bid on storage units in order to obtain their materials.

programme.title: Fashion Week: Whos In and Whos Out
programme.desc: Designers are asked to create a “Street Chic” look inspired by a trip around NYC, courtesy of Lexus.

programme.title: Finale Part 1
programme.desc: The final four designers are surprised with a trip to Rome, courtesy of Best Western.

programme.title: Finale Part 2
programme.desc: For the designers, the opportunity to show at New York Fashion Week has finally arrived.

programme.title: Reunion Special
programme.desc: All of the designers reunite one last time to discuss their experiences on Project Runway together.

programme.title: Made in Manhattan
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Designers create collections inspired by NYCs uptown or downtown scene. Ivanka Trump guests.

programme.title: The Art of Construction
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: A construction site forces designers to create feminine fashion from masculine materials.

programme.title: Something Wicked This Way Comes
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: With the Broadway musical Wicked, the All Stars face off to design couture inspired fashion.

programme.title: Wear Your Heart On Your Sleeve
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Nina Garcia returns to judge colorful party dresses inspired by designers personal relationships.

programme.title: Designing for the Duchess
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: The designers meet British royalty in London, England as inspiration for winter wear.

programme.title: Luck Be A Lady
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: The stakes are high as the All Stars designers roll dice on the runway for a fashion gamble.

programme.title: Mix and Match.com
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Love is in the air as the All Stars design looks for Match.com singles on first dates.

programme.title: Making a Splash
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Designers must collect their fabric from under the wate to make Elegant resort wear swimsuits.

programme.title: Sketching with Sharks

programme.desc: Underwater marine life provides inspiration for avant-garde fashion.

programme.title: Versatile Tops and Bottoms

programme.desc: Alyssa and the judges take over Times Square to school the designers in the business of fashion.

programme.title: Always the Bridesmaid
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Marchesas showroom inspires bridesmaid dresses for a real wedding ceremony.

programme.title: Some Like It Hot Dog

programme.desc: Marilyn Monroes timeless beauty inspires dazzling red carpet gowns.

programme.title: 4 Seasons in One Finale
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: The All Stars finalists design collections representing all 4 seasons of the year. Season finale.

programme.title: Reunion Special
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Alyssa Milano reunites all 14 designers to debate the fashion, fights, and turmoil from this season.

programme.title: Road to the Runway
programme.desc: In this seasons casting special, 16 new designers will be introduced with a behind-the-scenes look.

programme.title: Mad Dash Mayhem
programme.desc: Sixteen new designers meet Tim and Heidi at Madison Square Garden for their first challenge.

programme.title: Its All In The Cards
programme.desc: Each designer must create a wearable look using greeting cards as their main textile.

programme.title: Shut Up and Sew
programme.desc: In the first Team Challenge, the designers are paired up for a day on a Celebrity Cruise ship.

programme.title: Fashion Flip
programme.desc: Designers put a modern and unique twist on a classic design. Kiernan Shipka joins as a guest judge.

programme.title: Gunn and Heid
programme.desc: The designers split into two teams and battle for their fabrics in a fierce paintball competition.

programme.title: Lace To The Finish
programme.desc: In an episode full of surprises, Heidi challenges the designers to create lingerie for her line.

programme.title: Haute Tech Couture
programme.desc: Designers dumpster dive for recycled electronics to merge the worlds of fashion and technology.

programme.title: Broadway Or Bust
programme.desc: Broadway serves as inspiration as designers create looks based on the musical Finding Neverland.

programme.title: Broadway Or Bust
programme.desc: Broadway serves as inspiration as designers create looks based on the musical Finding Neverland.

programme.title: The Runways in 3D!

programme.desc: Tthe designers travel to the glamour capital of the world, Los Angeles, to create red carpet looks.

programme.title: Finale Part 1

programme.title: Finale Part 2

programme.title: Reunion Special

programme.title: Just Fabulous!

programme.desc: Buckle up for one of the most infamous couples in Greek mythology: Zeus and Ganymede.

programme.title: Historical Homos

programme.title: Historical Homos

programme.title: Historical Homos

programme.title: Flunk

programme.title: Flunk
programme.desc: Heartbroken that her girlfriend Jaz is moving, Dani makes a life changing decision.

programme.title: Flunk
programme.desc: In an effort to win back Celeste, Brayden is nominated to be president of the LGBTQ club.

programme.title: Flunk

programme.title: Flunk
programme.desc: After confiding in her mother, Saffron gets a surprise call from her girlfriend.

programme.title: Flunk

programme.title: Nobody Famous
programme.desc: A cottage weekend takes a turn for the worst when a guest books a blockbuster role.

programme.title: The 10 Year Plan

programme.title: The Ring Thing

programme.title: Lockdown Lovers

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Heat B features six contestants, all battling for a spot in the series finals. To make it through, they must prove their mettle in the Gauntlet, Trial (British Bulldog) and battle it out in the Arena.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Six more contestants enter the arena. This week the arena transforms into a Robot football pitch and Sergeant Bash meets his match. Which contestant will score a place in the finals?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Lightweight special; the six contestants this week make up for what they lack in size, with agility. Can they weave their way through the house robots in the gauntlet? Or will they knock each other off-course in this week’s trial, stock car racing?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Six contestants enter the arena, but how many will leave? As the robots navigate their way through this week’s trial, the Labyrinth, who knows what lies around each corner? Victory or elimination?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: No cues necessary as six new contestants play robot snooker in this week’s trial. The victors of this heat will be joining the other winners in the Grand Final. Who will be crowned champion of Robot Wars: The First Wars?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: More behind the scenes of the hit series Robot Wars. Philippa gets into the nitty gritty of why competitors choose to compete.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The undercover secrets and un-muzzled action of Robot Wars, see how competitors prepare their robots for victory, or defeat.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: See what happens when little kids become big kids, and toy trains are replaced by chainsaws. Watch the teams as they lock themselves in their workshops, creating killing machines.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Delving behind the trenches of Robot Wars, digging for dirt in the competitors own video diaries.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A unique, undercover look at Robot Wars Series 2. Featuring exclusive footage from the teams and highlights from the battles.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Debuting in the Second Wars, to becoming the most successful Robot ever to take part in Robot Wars. This Robot put the squeeze on all the competition, including the House Robots.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Learn more about this infamous Robot and the family that built it. With an unforgettable design and devastating weapon, this competitor became an instant icon.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Newcomers, veterans and a recent President enter the fray in this first Heat of the series. Competitors are eliminated left, right and centre and only the strongest will survive to compete in the finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A veteran only heat features the current reigning Champions, Carbide. Will Carbide’s streak be brought to an end by the other robots, more experienced and eager than ever?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Even the judges aren’t safe as two robots collide, sending shrapnel through the bullet-resistant shields around the arena. Two very different styles of robot meet in the finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: One newcomer stares down seven veterans, will their induction into the arena be successful, or will their inexperience find them in the pit? One robot will have a second chance to qualify in the Redemption Round.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The final heat features only veterans, here for an opportunity to make up for their mistakes in the previous tournaments. Only one competitor will make it into the Grand Finals, and the others must suffer defeat, again.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: After lengthy repairs and inspirational pep talks, the qualifiers prepare to fight for the title. A 10-way Robot Rumble will give the victor a spot in the Grand Finals, alongside the heat winners.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Robot fightings newest competition begins! In the first heat, meet new robots and some familiar faces as teams get a feel for the arena and size up their competition. Filmed in Grantham in front of a live audience, robots battle for survival in the Robots Live Arena.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Heat 2 of the UKs most brutal robot combat competition takes the action to Crawley in the south of England. Winners and losers from Heat 1 face fresh opponents, fighting to secure a win and guarantee their place in the finals.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Its the last chance for teams to secure a spot before the final. In savage and tactical 1v1 matches, teams battle for a place in the top 16. New robots join the fray, hoping for a last-minute victory to advance to the championship.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: The most battle-hardened combat robots in the UK compete in the MechMania Grand Final. After three grueling heats, only the toughest survive. The tournament is now a single-elimination, 1v1, sudden-death formatuntil one team emerges as the victorious champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Learn more about this infamous Robot and the family that built it. With an unforgettable design and devastating weapon, this competitor became an instant icon.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Debuting in the Second Wars, to becoming the most successful Robot ever to take part in Robot Wars. This Robot put the squeeze on all the competition, including the House Robots.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Ultimate Collection: House Robots
programme.desc: An extensive and informative dive behind-the-scenes on the House Robots. Get inside information from designer Chris Reynolds, on what goes into creating these killing machines.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Follow Team Chaoss journey. From humble beginnings to how they ended up building one of the most feared Robots ever to compete.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Robot fightings newest competition begins! In the first heat, meet new robots and some familiar faces as teams get a feel for the arena and size up their competition. Filmed in Grantham in front of a live audience, robots battle for survival in the Robots Live Arena.

programme.desc: Heat 2 of the UKs most brutal robot combat competition takes the action to Crawley in the south of England. Winners and losers from Heat 1 face fresh opponents, fighting to secure a win and guarantee their place in the finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 The Fourth Wars - Heat A
programme.desc: The wars begin yet again, competitors can only qualify by destroying or outsmarting their opponents, and doing their best to stay out of the house robots way. Sumo and Pinball Warrior will test the robots grit and accuracy.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 The Fourth Wars - Heat B
programme.desc: Six competitors, including World Champion Razer battle it out for a shot at the Fourth Wars title. Irreparable damage could mean the permanent end of one of the veteran competitors in the semi-finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 The Fourth Wars - Heat C
programme.desc: A competitor faces issues before the battle even begins in this week’s eliminators and the house robots stand by, ready to strike the final blow. The clock proves to be the enemy in this week’s Pinball Warrior, and the competitors prepare to stand their ground in Sumo Bash.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 The Fourth Wars - Heat D
programme.desc: Veterans and Newcomers once again face the eliminators and Dead Metal tries to make a friend. A house robot gets flipped, causing the others to go on a rampage. A uniquely designed robot takes on Pinball Warrior and two more competitors stare down Shunt in Sumo Bash.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 The Fourth Wars - Heat E
programme.desc: A single strike spells trouble for a robot in the eliminators. A fleeting alliance forms as competitor and house robot team up to make an offering to the pit. This week’s Pinball Warrior has high-hopes for a standout performance.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 The Fourth Wars - Heat F
programme.desc: A robot with a unique strategy takes part in this week’s heat. Is it a recipe for success, or a fancy gimmick? The house robot’s manners are at an all-time low as they continue to attack after cease is called.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 The Fourth Wars - Heat G
programme.desc: The robots take the term “facing off” literally this week as they rip each other apart. Will Shunt manage to shake off the competitors in this week’s Sumo Bash.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 The Fourth Wars - Heat H
programme.desc: The heat descends into chaos as the house robots team up to take down the competitors. The judges make a controversial decision in the final to decide this week’s winner.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 The Fourth Wars - Heat I
programme.desc: Over halfway through the heats and the hopefuls are still lining up to put their robots through mechanical hell, for a chance of making it to the semi-finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 The Fourth Wars - Heat J
programme.desc: An apparent malfunction gives a veteran competitor an opportunity to redeem themselves in the eliminators. The World Champion returns to take on the Pinball Warrior.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 The Fourth Wars - Heat K
programme.desc: Sparks fly in this week’s heat as competitors put their weapons to good use and a robot uses its shape to their advantage.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 The Fourth Wars - Heat L
programme.desc: The eliminator begins slowly, but as the battle heats up the robots must stay cool, or they might end up losing their head. The house robots see one of their busiest nights in the arena as they try to keep up.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The first ever Robot Wars heat begins. Six brave teams enter the arena for the first time as the four House Robots are unleashed to do what they were made for, turning competitors into twisted and scorched lumps.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Witness the human drama of competitor’s desperation for victory and the resulting mechanical carnage.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of teams all over the country as they battle it out in hopes of becoming champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The pace steps up a gear as Philippa investigates behind the scenes of the series’ first Semi-finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The second round of semi-finals follows six more teams that have made it through the heats and are one step closer to Grand Final.

programme.title: Below Her Mouth
programme.desc: Dallas on vasynyt kuvioihinsa. Han raataa paivat katontekijana ja tapaa rakastajattaria oisin – paivasta toiseen. Kunnes han tapaa itsevarman ja menestyneen muotitoimittajan Jasminen eraalla klubilla. He tuntevat vetoa toisiinsa heti ensi katseesta ja heittaytyvat intohimoiseen suhteeseen.

programme.title: Vain Frendeja
programme.desc: Tapaus: Chris Bander. High school -vuodet eivat sujuneet mallikkaasti: kaveri oli ujo, ylipainoinen ja toivottomasti rakastunut koulun suosituimpaan typyyn nimelta Jamie. Mutta kun Chris viimein saa kerattya tarpeeksi rohkeutta kertoakseen Jamielle tunteistaan, tytto sanoo haluavansa olla vain ystavia. Tanaan Chris on losangelesilainen musiikkimoguli, jolla riittaa misuja vaikka joka sormelle. Mutta kun Chris kohtalon oikusta sattuu kavaisemaan vanhoilla kotinurkillaan, sulavaliikkeiselle pelimiehelle avautuu uusi mahdollisuus yrittaa hurmata Jamie. Mutta frendivyohyke on paha, ja harvassa ovat sielta ulosmurtautuneet uskalikot.

programme.title: All For Her
programme.desc: Devina ja hanen miehensa Rick kaipaavat lasta. Monien keskenmenojen jalkeen Devina tulee lopulta raskaaksi. Mutta kun selviaa, etta han on vakavasti sairas, alkaa taistelu aikaa vastaan. Devinan on pysyttava hengissa lapsen syntymaan asti…

programme.title: Broken English
programme.desc: Nora Wilder on epatoivoinen. Hanen lahipiirissaan kaikki ovat naimisissa tai ainakin heilla on lapsia. Nora on kolmikymppinen, hanella on tylsa tyo ja aiti, joka muistuttaa Noraa jatkuvasti siita, etta tama on epaonnistunut. Surkeuden kruunaa ystavattaren taydellinen liitto. Lukuisten epaonnistuneiden treffien jalkeen Nora tapaa ranskalaisen Julienin.

programme.title: Can You Keep a Secret
programme.desc: Kun Emma luulee lentokoneen putoavan, han kertoo kaikki salaisuutensa komealle tuntemattomalle miehelle. Tai ainakin han luuli tata tuntemattomaksi... Sitten han tapaa Jackin, yhtion uuden toimitusjohtajan, joka tietaa jokaisen noyryyttavan yksityiskohdan hanesta. Elokuva perustuu menestyskirjaan Salaisuuksia ilmassa, jonka on kirjoittanut Sophie Kinsella, romaanin Himoshoppaajan salaiset unelmat kirjoittaja.

programme.title: Bottled with Love
programme.desc: Abbey on onneton, turhautunut ja melkein toivosta luopunut uranainen, koska deittailu ei ota sujuakseen. Isoaiti ehdottaa, etta Abbey kirjoittaisi kaikki toiveensa rakkauskirjeeksi suoraan sydamestaan. Abbey noudattaa neuvoa vastahakoisesti, panee kirjeen pulloon ja heittaa sen mereen. Aika kuluu, ja kuukausia myohemmin Abbey aloittaa projektin pomonsa pojan Nickin kanssa. Nick on sattumalta loytanyt pullopostin tietamatta, etta se on Abbeyn. Mutta vahitellen han tajuaa yhdistaa kirjeen Abbeyyn. Tilanne ja salaisuus kayvat hyvin kiusalliseksi ja Nick paattaa kertoa kirjeesta. Koska Nick on salannut asiaa pitkaan, Abbey kaskee hanta painumaan hemmettiin. Mutta Nick ei vahasta saikahda.

programme.title: Tyttosi sun ja mun
programme.desc: Tank (Dane Cook) joutuu todelliseen ystavyyden tulikokeeseen, kun hanen paras kaverinsa (Jason Biggs) palkkaa hanet lahtemaan surkeille treffeille entisen tyttoystavansa (Kate Hudson) kanssa todistaakseen, kuinka mainio poikaystava todella onkaan.

programme.title: Very Good Girls
programme.desc: New Yorkista kotoisin olevat Lily ja Gerry ovat parhaita ystavia, joilla on koko elama edessaan. He viettavat yhdessa viimeista kesaansa ennen yliopistoa ja paattavat menettaa neitsyytensa taman elamansa kesan aikana. Ikuinen ystavyys joutuu kuitenkin koetukselle, kun kumpikin tytoista ihastuu samaan komeaan taiteilijaan. Viattomattomuuden aika paattyy monella tapaa.

programme.title: Equals
programme.desc: Utopistisessa maailmassa, missa vakivalta ja rikollisuus on kitketty poistamalla ihmisten tunteet geneettisesti, eletaan Nian ja Silasin tavoin rauhallista ja yksitoikkoista elamaa. Tyopaikallaan tiedotusmateriaalien tuotantolaitoksessa he vaihtavat tyotoverien kesken ainoastaan kohteliaisuuksia. Elama on yksinkertaista kunnes huhu tartunnasta, jonka seurauksena ihminen nayttaa tunteensa, leviaa. Sairastuneet lahetetaan pois, eika heita nahda enaa koskaan. Silas epailee kantavansa tartuntaa, ja asian vahvistuttua hanesta tulee hylkio. Silti han tuntee vetoa Niaan, joka on myos saanut tartunnan, mutta onnistuu salaamaan oireensa.

programme.title: Long Story Short
programme.desc: Tama on kertomus Ellenista ja hanen ystavistaan seka heidan enemman tai vahemman itse aiheuttamistaan monimutkaisista rakkauselamistaan ja romanttisista unelmistaan. Kolmen vuoden ajan ystavapiirin parhaat ja huonoimmat rakkaustarinat tiivistyvat ja kerrotaan kahdeksan luvun kautta, joista jokainen sijoittuu eri juhlatilaisuuteen. Ryhma kamppailee taydellisen suhteen idean kanssa ja joutuu arvioimaan uudelleen, mita todellinen rakkaus oikein on.

programme.title: Griffin and Phoenix
programme.desc: Kun Griffin saa kuulla, etta hanella on kuolemaan johtava sairaus, han paattaa ottaa kohtalonsa omiin kasiinsa ja elaa taysilla loppuun asti. Han tapaa Phoenixin ja aikaa myoten rakastuu tahan, mutta myos Phoenixilla on salaisuus...

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: Don Martellin siloinen elama pyorii perheen, kavereiden ja punttitreenin ymparilla, minka lisaksi han kay uskollisesti kirkossa joka pyha. Kavereidensa ”Don Joniksi” ristima hurmuri iskee baarista pelkkia taydellisia naisia, joista kukaan ei kuitenkaan veda vertoja pornolle. Don joutuu arvioimaan keskenkasvuisia mieltymyksiaan uudestaan, kun han tapaa ihanan Barbaran, jonka kasitys unelmien miehesta ei vastaa lainkaan Donia.

programme.title: Kuukauden tyontekija (Employee of the Month)
programme.desc: Kaksi aarimmaisen kilpailunhaluista tukkukaupan tyontekijaa kilpailee ”Kuukauden tyontekija” -tittelista ja siita, kumpi voittaa kuuman uuden kassanhoitajan sydamen tassa hulvattomassa komediassa.

programme.title: If Only
programme.desc: Eras tragedia opettaa nuoren brittiliikemiehen Ian Wyndhamin asettamaan rakkauden tyon edelle. Han oppii avautumaan tyttoystavalleen Samantha Andrewsille, joka on vapaa oman tiensa kulkija.

programme.title: Hard Luck Love Song
programme.desc: Kantrimusiikin siivittama romanttinen draama. Hurmaava, mutta kovaonninen Jesse ajelehtii elamassaan paamaarattomasti eteenpain. Vanhan ihastuksen ilmestyessa kuvioihin, Jesse loytaa itsensa risteyskohdasta jossa hanen on paatettava jatkaako huonojen paatosten tekemista vai ryhdistaytyako.

programme.title: Toivon lahteet
programme.desc: Oltuaan 30 vuotta naimisissa keski-ikainen pariskunta ryhtyy intensiiviseen viikon kestavaan pariterapiaan tyostaakseen parisuhdettaan.

programme.title: Tyttosi sun ja mun
programme.desc: Tank (Dane Cook) joutuu todelliseen ystavyyden tulikokeeseen, kun hanen paras kaverinsa (Jason Biggs) palkkaa hanet lahtemaan surkeille treffeille entisen tyttoystavansa (Kate Hudson) kanssa todistaakseen, kuinka mainio poikaystava todella onkaan.

programme.title: Very Good Girls
programme.desc: New Yorkista kotoisin olevat Lily ja Gerry ovat parhaita ystavia, joilla on koko elama edessaan. He viettavat yhdessa viimeista kesaansa ennen yliopistoa ja paattavat menettaa neitsyytensa taman elamansa kesan aikana. Ikuinen ystavyys joutuu kuitenkin koetukselle, kun kumpikin tytoista ihastuu samaan komeaan taiteilijaan. Viattomattomuuden aika paattyy monella tapaa.

programme.title: Griffin and Phoenix
programme.desc: Kun Griffin saa kuulla, etta hanella on kuolemaan johtava sairaus, han paattaa ottaa kohtalonsa omiin kasiinsa ja elaa taysilla loppuun asti. Han tapaa Phoenixin ja aikaa myoten rakastuu tahan, mutta myos Phoenixilla on salaisuus...

programme.title: All For Her
programme.desc: Devina ja hanen miehensa Rick kaipaavat lasta. Monien keskenmenojen jalkeen Devina tulee lopulta raskaaksi. Mutta kun selviaa, etta han on vakavasti sairas, alkaa taistelu aikaa vastaan. Devinan on pysyttava hengissa lapsen syntymaan asti…

programme.title: Kesaprinssi
programme.desc: PR-kriisinhallitsija Deidre ja hanen assistenttinsa Mandy lentavat apuun, kun kapinallinen kuninkaallinen, prinssi Colin, pidatetaan idaholaisessa pikkukaupungissa. Deidren selvitellessa omaa fiaskoaan Mandy huomaa odottamattomia ura- ja romanssimahdollisuuksia.

programme.title: Love and Other Drugs
programme.desc: Vapaamielinen Maggie (Anne Hathaway) kohtaa Viagraa kauppaavan Jamien (Jake Gyllenhaal). Heidan kemiansa petihommissa toimii, joten he paattavat aloittaa suhteen – ilman sitoumuksia. Mutta Maggien ja Jamien ottaa valtaansa huumeista vaarallisin – rakkaus!

programme.title: Tyttosi sun ja mun
programme.desc: Tank (Dane Cook) joutuu todelliseen ystavyyden tulikokeeseen, kun hanen paras kaverinsa (Jason Biggs) palkkaa hanet lahtemaan surkeille treffeille entisen tyttoystavansa (Kate Hudson) kanssa todistaakseen, kuinka mainio poikaystava todella onkaan.

programme.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva komedia mallikansalaisesta Steven Russellista (JIM CARREY), jonka radikaalilla elamanmuutoksella on hintansa. Patologisen valehtelijan munaukset vievat miehen suoraan kaapista hakkiin, kun han jaa luksuselamansa rahoittamiseen kehitetyista superhuijauksista kiinni rysan paalta. Vankilassa Stevenin yllattaa kuitenkin takaapain rynniva rakkaus, jota huijarin taipumukset ja poliisien pamput kuitenkin vaikeuttavat. Stevenilla on kuitenkin sairaita suunnitelmia rakastuneen parin saattamiseksi jalleen yhteen...

programme.title: Bad Cupid
programme.desc: Archie ottaa tosissaan tehtavansa: huolehtia, etta aito rakkaus voittaa aina. Hanen toimintatapansa eivat kuitenkaan ole aina aivan tavanomaiset. Kaikki Archien tielle osuvat saavat varoa, silla han ei kaihda keinoja paatettyaan jotain.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: Don Martellin siloinen elama pyorii perheen, kavereiden ja punttitreenin ymparilla, minka lisaksi han kay uskollisesti kirkossa joka pyha. Kavereidensa ”Don Joniksi” ristima hurmuri iskee baarista pelkkia taydellisia naisia, joista kukaan ei kuitenkaan veda vertoja pornolle. Don joutuu arvioimaan keskenkasvuisia mieltymyksiaan uudestaan, kun han tapaa ihanan Barbaran, jonka kasitys unelmien miehesta ei vastaa lainkaan Donia.

Kirjailija luuli kirjoittavansa tulevaisuudesta, mutta kirjoittikin menneisyydesta. Hanen romaanissaan juna ajaa silloin talloin vuoteen 2046. Jokaisella matkustajalla oli sama aikomus: elaa kadotetut muistonsa uudestaan. Sanottiin, etta vuonna 2046 mikaan ei ollut muuttunut. Kukaan ei tarkkaan tiennyt, oliko se totta, koska matkustajat eivat koskaan palanneet - paitsi yksi. Han oli siella mutta halusi lahtea pois.

programme.title: If Only
programme.desc: Eras tragedia opettaa nuoren brittiliikemiehen Ian Wyndhamin asettamaan rakkauden tyon edelle. Han oppii avautumaan tyttoystavalleen Samantha Andrewsille, joka on vapaa oman tiensa kulkija.

programme.title: Jack and Jill Vs. The World
programme.desc: Jack on rutiineihin kangistunut mainosalan ammattilainen ja omaa New Yorkin juppien arvot. Eraana paivana han kuitenkin tormaa Jilliin, naiiviin nuoreen naiseen, joka on ihastuttava naky suurkaupungin ymparistossa. Jack tekee vaikutuksen Jilliin tarjotessaan hanelle toita seka huonetta asunnostaan. Hanen ystavallisyytensa koskettaa Jillia ja he ajautuvatkin nopeasti romanttisen suhteeseen, joka perustuu listaan saannoista joita Jill vaatii noudatettavan. Jillin eloisuus kaantaa Jackin maailman ylosalaisin, mutta hanta vaivaa uuden rakkautensa taustoja koskevien aiheiden valttely. Kaikki ei ole sita milta nayttaa ja Jillilla on salaisuus, joka saattaa muuttaa kaiken...

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: The first in the season will see Catherine Bennett and her youngest daughter Sarah Jane keen to downsize from their huge 13-bedroomed house in Mullingar. Theyre planning to move down the road, where they also own a 3-bed bungalow thats been uninhabited for the last nine years.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot faces a unique challenge in Clane, Co. Kildare.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Architect Dermot Bannon helps Senator Katherine Zappone and Dr Ann Louise Gilligan renovate a dilapidated hunting lodge in Brittas, Dublin.

programme.title: Room to Improve

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot revamps a Rathfarnham four-bed to suit the changing needs of its occupants Peter, Lisa and their twins Grace and Louise (9) live in a four-bed house in Rathfarnham, Dublin 14.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: A young couple with three children seek Dermots help in revamping their small three bedroomed bungalow in Ballinteer Ailish and Patrick Bates are a young couple running out of space - fast!

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Childhood sweethearts are up against the clock to revamp their 70s bungalow in Enniskerry before their first baby arrives.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot needs to create "a bungalow downstairs" incorporating a bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, living and dining room.

programme.title: Room to Improve

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Architect Dermot Bannon sets out to transform peoples living spaces. Before moving in to their 1940s ex-council house in Co Kilkenny, the Kirwans added a basic extension.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot wants to turn the house completely on its head, putting the bedrooms to the front and extending the back to include a kitchen, living and dining that leads into the garden.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Templetuohy, Co. Tipperary with Joanne and Sean Cleere who believe they need a substantial extension but Dermot doesnt actually concur.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Room to Improve starts with Margaret and Jodie Burke who plan to renovate the family home in Foxrock.

programme.title: Room to Improve

programme.desc: Dermot is in Laytown, co.Meath, with a budget of 60,000 euros, Dermots worry "is even if you took away the shoddy workmanship youd spend the 60k, this is a really difficult one..."

programme.desc: Relive the decade of perms and shoulder pads! The unmistakable synth pop sound of artists such as Michael Jackson, George Michael, and Whitney Houston, is bound to remind you of all your greatest 80s memories!

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - The Outlaw
programme.desc: Howard Hughes fabled film about Billy the Kid (Jake Buetel) and Doc Holliday (Walter Huston), their competition for the attention of a woman named Rio (Jane Russell), and the pursuit of Billy by sheriff Pat Garrett.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - Scapegoat
programme.desc: A harsh winter leaves the Tuscarora tribe without food or animals and desperate for help. Hawkeye tries to help them out by arranging credit at the local trading post.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - The Gun and The Pulpit
programme.desc: A gunfighter masquerades as a preacher to hide his identity from the posse who is pursuing him. He ends up ridding his new town of the menace of a tyrannical local rancher.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - Way Station
programme.desc: Two braves want to marry the daughter of Mingo Chief Nocona and Hawkeye and Chingachgook are caught in the middle.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Mohawk
programme.desc: A Boston artist (Scott Brady) goes west to paint authentic Western themes in the 1700s. He juggles his fiance and a variety of fetching models until war breaks out with the Indians and he is caught in the middle.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Cimarron Strip - The Search
programme.desc: When Marshal Crown is wounded during a failed attempt to free a man arrested for murder, Dulcey, some Cimarron townsmen and the outlaws family launch a desperate search.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - The Big Trees
programme.desc: A greedy timber baron (Kirk Douglas) wants to log the giant sequoias in northern California. He plans to cheat the Quaker colony who lives on the land, but things begin to change when a new rival comes to town.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - Powder Keg
programme.desc: A fur trader starts a war between the Hurons and a settlement that is buying furs from another trader. Hawkeye and Chingachgook are in a race against time to save the settlement from destruction.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - High Lonesome
programme.desc: A young drifter (John Drew Barrymore) is held by a family of ranchers that suspect him of committing murder.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Cimarron Strip - The Roarer
programme.desc: After a comrade’s death, a grief-stricken cavalry sergeant lashes out, killing a citizen and fleeing justice. Marshal Crown must track him down before the town takes revenge.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - The Outlaw
programme.desc: Howard Hughes fabled film about Billy the Kid (Jake Buetel) and Doc Holliday (Walter Huston), their competition for the attention of a woman named Rio (Jane Russell), and the pursuit of Billy by sheriff Pat Garrett.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Cimarron Strip - The Roarer

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - The Outlaw
programme.desc: Howard Hughes fabled film about Billy the Kid (Jake Buetel) and Doc Holliday (Walter Huston), their competition for the attention of a woman named Rio (Jane Russell), and the pursuit of Billy by sheriff Pat Garrett.

programme.title: Death Valley Days
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Death Valley Days - Sego Lillies
programme.desc: When a young Mormon couple newly arrived in Salt Lake City from Boston is chosen to help build a new settlement, they must learn to cope with the Utah wilderness.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - Hawkeyes Homecoming
programme.desc: Hawkeye returns home to find that his younger brother has joined the British Army and become a Red Coat.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Abilene Town
programme.desc: When an uneasy truce between cattlemen and homesteaders is broken in Abilene, Texas, Marshall Dan Mitchell (Randolph Scott) must resolve the conflict as he tries to manage the two women in his life.

programme.title: Death Valley Days
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Death Valley Days - Little Oscars Millions
programme.desc: Oscar Little buys a plot of land in Rawhide, Nevada and with the help of a kind stranger, he turns an enormous profit.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Threat
programme.desc: A group of settlers are trapped in Huron territory by a corrupt trading post manager. Hawkeye and Chingachgook try to help them escape to friendlier country.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Joshua
programme.desc: When a black cavalryman returns home from the Civil War to find his mother murdered, he sets out on the trail of her killers in search of revenge.

programme.title: Death Valley Days
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Death Valley Days - Land of the Free
programme.desc: Two slaves from a Louisville plantation come to California, hoping to earn their freedom in the gold fields.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - Franklin Story
programme.desc: When the corrupt authorities of a small town are guilty of numerous crimes, Hawkeye calls on his friend Ben Franklin to prosecute them to the full extent of the law.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: James Barlow (Randolph Scott) is a federal agent who is assigned to bring an end to the reign of terror brought on by a gang of train robbers. Barlow infiltrates the gang and discovers that they have been paying off local officials and finds himself caught in the middle of the good and the bad guys. Based on the exploits of the infamous Reno gang, the first train robbers in American history.

programme.title: Death Valley Days
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Death Valley Days - The Diamond Babe
programme.desc: When an epidemic hits, dance hall girl Diamond Babe cares for the townspeople whove always looked down on her.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Wild One
programme.desc: A Native American doctor finds himself the victim of discrimination when he sets up his practice in a new settlement.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: A group of West Point graduates are assigned to the U.S. Cavalry in Kansas during the time of abolitionist John Brown. Stars Ronald Reagan.

programme.title: Death Valley Days
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Death Valley Days - Little Washington
programme.desc: A young society womans life is uprooted when her husband is appointed director of the Carson City mint and the family moves from D.C. to Carson City, Nevada, otherwise known as "Little Washington".

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - Delaware Hoax
programme.desc: The Delaware tribe is framed for a murder they didnt commit and theyre ready to go to war against the white settlers. Hawkeye learns that a scheming land speculator is to blame and goes undercover to bring justice.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Mclintock
programme.desc: Cattle baron George Washington McLintock battles his headstrong wife (Maureen OHara), a ranch hand (Patrick Wayne) who wants to marry his daughter (Stefanie Powers) and evil-doers in this upbeat comedy Western with a memorable ending.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E13 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 13, Ukraine
programme.desc: Welcome to Ukraine and the wonderful capital city of Kyiv. Were here for the second time for the iconic truck pull World Championships! The reigning World champion Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland will defend his title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E14 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 14, Romania
programme.desc: In this episode, a final chance for our athletes to get vital world series ranking points on board to give them the best possible chance of success and an initial advantage at the finals. Its the last show before the world finals and the top 10 places are up for grabs, but who will they be?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E15 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkeys south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season. Here in the sunshine, well finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is - you could not ask for a better setting. Aivars Smaukstellis, the reigning world champion is defending his title, and two-time world champion Dainis Zageris is also here, but with a though competition, who will win?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - Worlds Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - Worlds Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official Worlds Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what Im going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.desc: Dave reassures Caroline that the entire police force is behind the investigation. Donna misses Rocco.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful

programme.desc: Ridge cautions his mother about jumping to conclusions. Donna and Mark assess their bleak financial situation.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful

programme.desc: Kristen is puzzled over her parents odd behavior. The police are very close to an identification.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: S01 : E115 The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 115
programme.desc: Ridge promises to check out the house that Eric visited. The police have narrowed their suspects down.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: S01 : E116 The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 116
programme.desc: Stephanie thinks that Eric is having an affair with Brooke. Throne confesses his love for Caroline to Eric.

programme.desc: Rocco considers his future and Donna reminds him about Ridges offer. Storm offers Mark some financial help.

programme.desc: Ridge cant believe that his father is seeing Brooke. Brooke comforts Caroline before the police lineup.

programme.desc: Stephanie is dismayed over Thornes silence regarding Carolines rape and why Ridge has not been informed.

programme.desc: Donna wonders if her romance with Mark will withstand the pressure of school and work. Caroline helps Katie.

programme.desc: Eric is stunned that Stephanie visited the Logan house but is relieved that she only went to visit Caroline.

programme.desc: Ridge now realizes the reason for Carolines strange disappearance. Stephanie receives a mysterious call.

programme.desc: Eric and Beth worry that Stephanie knows their secret. Bill is insane with anger and is confronted by Margo.

programme.desc: Margo is sympathetic about Carolines plight. Brooke, Katie and Caroline agree that the coverage is important.

programme.desc: Thorne and Stephanie discuss Ridges reaction. Rocco prepares for his meeting with Ridge and kisses Donna.
