programme.title: Daniel Hautot
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Daniel Hautot
programme.desc: He had a real professional rise, quickly moving from commercial to sales manager. But the awareness quickly catches up with him too: what is the purpose of all this? Is it a real pursuit of happiness? Daniel keeps his acquired skills and puts them to the benefit of his passion for yoga. Follow Daniel until the opening of his yoga and community space.

programme.title: Guillaume Nivelle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Guillaume Nivelle
programme.desc: To make a profession representative of his personality is the discovery made by Guillaume at twenty-six. After several years as a bartender and crossing a dark period, Guillaume discovers nature and falls in love with it. Accompany Guillaume in his passion, in the middle of a refitted nature.

programme.title: Laura Belfadla
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Laura Belfadla
programme.desc: Laura will not tell you the whole truth because she does not want a system where you are told what to do. After several years as head of business development in law firm, Laura changes her life and creates the plant academy. Let yourself go for a healthier life.

programme.title: Laurence Sala
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Laurence Sala
programme.desc: It took a burnout and several miscarriages to Laurence to take a new path. Its finally a bad thing for a good. Throughout her ordeals, Laurence will know how to listen to her needs, her desires and her passions. With a surprise, follow Laurence in her life as a mother and naturopath.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 2
programme.desc: With Bangladesh as a running thread, Yann Arthus-Bertrand meets several people who have changed their lives to dedicate themselves to a major project. In Bangladesh, Yves and Runa Marre have created the Friendship Foundation. Among other things, they’ve created a floating hospital installed on an old barge bought in France. Julie Andersen, an ex-advertising executive from New York, has come to South Africa to defend sharks with her Shark Angels Foundation. In North India, Kartik Satyanarayan is helping to stop the dreadful exploitation of the lippus bears (dancing bears). He’s created Wildlife SOS, a preserve to rehabilitate the bears that have been rescued and to give work to the men of...

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Day Dubai - Season 1 - LifenOne
programme.desc: In this episode, Gabriel will start her day with some vegan cuisine. She will experience facial yoga at the LifenOne holistic wellness center, before meeting Katrin from Active Escapes for a Wake surfing session in Dubai Marina.

programme.title: Seashells on the menu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Seashells on the menu
programme.desc: We will start this journey near La Rochelle to learn a little more about the breeding of the famous bouchot mussels but also a very particular technique to cook them. We will then go on a tour of Frances best oysters: towards Cancale, Arcachon, Montpellier and finally Oleron to learn about the different breeding methods and to find out more about all the species in France. Julie will cook a fricassee of berniques, the little Chinese hats that cover the rocks of the coast, as well as pink clams that are little known to the public. We will continue our journey in Finistère to meet Sylvain, the only abalone breeder in the country, and then to Meru where there are still workshops magnifying...

programme.title: Matcha Box
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Matcha Box
programme.desc: Val Kahl is taking you to discover the newest innovation in town for rejuvenation, body cleansing, and boost the body nutrition. She visits Matcha Box: the shops where you can find all drinks and food using “matcha” as the base ingredients. After trying out the refreshing matcha beverages, Val passes by the Willow Spa to experience the famous Enzyme Bath. Before stepping into the hot bath full of enzyme, Val took a sip of enzyme and ginger tea to detoxify and relax the muscles!

programme.title: Women Kundalini Yoga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Women Kundalini Yoga
programme.desc: Its an expedition in the heart of nature that is waiting for you during this day with Val Kahl. This journey begins at the top of Mount Ojai for a Kundalini Yoga session with the organization Women Kundalini Yoga. This breathtaking view of the region will allow you to fully grasp your emotions and embrace the positive energy of this group of spiritual women. Finally, the botanical garden of Santa Barbara will open up to you so to admire the well preserved variety of Californian flora as you make your way through the first botanical salon in the USA.

programme.title: How to install a plant in the garden
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - How to install a plant in the garden
programme.desc: Today, were meeting in the market garden of Romainville to learn how to install a plant in the garden. In our last episode, we saw how to plant a small seed to make it germinate and give a plant, it’s called a "seedling". To go faster, you can also buy or collect small plants that you will install in your garden. Thats what well see today.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Minute Bowl - Season 1 - Acaï Bowl
programme.desc: In this episode we decided to make an Acai bowl. For this you will need frozen bananas, milk, acai powder, kiwi, berries, chia seeds and edible flowers. Acai is a small berry, a remarkable concentrate of antioxidants that help fight against premature aging of cells and thus prevent the onset of cardiovascular disease.

programme.title: Yesmin
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 3 - Yesmin
programme.desc: Born in Mexico but always attracted to new cultures and countries, Yesmin worked many jobs until she finally found her calling. She decided to merge her passions for art and travel and became a “Vagabond Artist”. She is now able to travel the world while making a living by painting beautiful murals in her own distinct style.

programme.title: Jessica
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 3 - Jessica
programme.desc: Jessica’s life as a teenager was marked by a family tragedy that she struggled to cope with for a long time. Her anxiety had reached an all-time high and she was experiencing regular panic attacks when finally, she discovered surfing. This newfound passion thoroughly changed her lifestyle, ultimately resulting in a move to Bali, Indonesia. Today, she runs mindful surf and yoga retreats while also working online as a wellness writer.

programme.title: Lisa and Pete
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 3 - Lisa and Pete
programme.desc: Two urbanites surprise themselves by changing their city lifestyles for farm living : Lisa, an architect based in London, and her husband Pete, an actor seen in Hollywoodian movies such as “Ghost in the Shell” alongside Scarlett Johansson and a rock star in his own right in his native Malaysia. Together, they figured they were far from being ready for retirement. Instead, they dove headfirst into running an organic farm where they now both thrive while taking pleasure in returning to a simpler life.

programme.title: Meet the parents
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Family - Season 1 - Meet the parents
programme.desc: Today, we will meet Clara and Gianni. They already have a child but they’re expecting twins soon. We will also meet Coralie and Florent who have known each other since Kindergarten. Today they live the perfect love and they’re expecting a baby daughter. Kim, a young pregnant woman didn’t expect that and her boyfriend Pierre who can’tdeal with the situation deserted the scene three months before the delivery. Finally, Nathalie and Naoufel are not beginners: two boys and a baby girl on the way, much to the father’s delight! They’re making their way to the echography room with a light heart.

programme.title: Tough pregnancies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Family - Season 1 - Tough pregnancies
programme.desc: Clara and Gianni are worried, since a pregnancy with twins is always riskier. She’s due in two months, and has already undergone two medical interventions. Kim, nineteen, is fine physically, but she has to face her family’s criticism: she still lives at her parent’s, and the absence of the father-to-be worries them a great deal. Coralie would rather be safe than sorry, and meets with a prenatal consultant. Her nightmare: being turned down for an epidural procedure... Nathalie and Naoufel are looking at the bright side of life and are chilling on granddaddy’s boat, before letting themselves enjoy a family photo shoot.

programme.title: Do wild animals still exist ? - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - Do wild animals still exist ? - Part 1
programme.desc: Animals represent 2/3 of the species on earth. We are increasingly concerned about our impact on the world. But what place does man have for the wild animal? Discover how it is possible to reintroduce wild animals in South Africa, or the disaster that took place with the sea lions in Namibia, and also how to preserve rhinos or other animals in biodiversity. There, women and men manage to protect wildlife every day.

programme.title: Lamb flavors
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Lamb flavors
programme.desc: Tender and tasty, lamb plays a key role in festive cuisine but also in everyday cuisine. Julie sets off on the French roads to discover the different breeds existing across the country. It must be said that France has one of the most varied productions in the world. There are more than forty breeds listed in 5 categories. But more than the breed, it is the way in which they are fed that interests connoisseurs. Julie introduces us to producers and cooks of this refined dish!

programme.title: Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 2
programme.desc: Above all, these reports are an opportunity for Yann Arthus-Bertrand to take stock of the planet and denounce certain human behaviors that are at the root of dramatic, even irreversible, environmental and climatic degradation. Off to Tokyo, then Kenya, to an animal sanctuary. Then on to Mount Fuji to learn how to live there, and all the plastic that clogs up the seas. Reports will focus on everyday products, chosen for their destructive production practices for both people and the environment.

programme.title: The taste of bread
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The taste of bread
programme.desc: Today, Julie takes you on a bread trail to uncover the dedicated artisan bakers and millers. Her adventure will lead her through the Libourne region, then onwards to the North of France, the Ardèche, and the Aisne, where bakers have transformed bread into a powerful catalyst for social cohesion. While some individuals may avoid bread, particularly due to gluten-related concerns, others have chosen to reposition it at the forefront of the dining experience by championing its nutritional benefits. This commitment is shared by several chefs whom Julie will meet at the conclusion of her expedition.

programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Ojai Valley Lavender Festival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Ojai Valley Lavender Festival
programme.desc: Val Kahl is in the heart of Ojai, the lavender town, where she takes a tour in Ojai Valley Lavender Festival and tastes drink, gluten-free cookies and organic cooking products made of lavender. She later found herself in the middle of lavender field while stopping by the Frog Creek Farm. After working out on the hot power yoga around palm trees in Caravan Outpost, she heads out to Gratitude Rock for an organic fresh juice tasting with an avocado ranch view.

programme.title: Japanese pagodas and Coconut Massage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Japanese pagodas and Coconut Massage
programme.desc: Val goes to Nicholas, a master of enlightenment, at his wellness ranch. Here, Val will try out some new high-tech relaxation sessions. She will then go to one of the zenest hotels in California, where she will participate in a yoga session in a Japanese pagoda, followed by a coconut massage. She will test a Cryo-Cafe, a new concept store that mixes coffee break and cryotherapy session. Finally, she will attend a Theremin session, a very special relaxation ceremony.

programme.title: Thinning seedlings
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Thinning seedlings
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville to continue gardening together. In our previous episodes, we sowed chives and radishes. Today, were going to learn how to take good care of them. And as a bonus, well show you a great technique to easily get even more plants in your garden. Lets get started!

programme.title: Risotto with asparagus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Risotto with asparagus
programme.desc: In this recipe, we prepare a creamy asparagus risotto, a delicate and refined dish. Arborio rice is slowly simmered in a flavorful broth, then combined with crisp asparagus and melted Parmesan. A hint of lemon and fresh herbs enhances this delicious and comforting meal.

programme.title: Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.desc: In this recipe, well prepare delicious potato cutlets accompanied by a creamy vegetable puree. The cutlets are crispy on the outside with Japanese breadcrumbs and tender on the inside, while the celeriac puree adds a touch of sweetness and lightness. This dish is perfect for a comforting and tasty vegetarian meal.

programme.title: Juliette (Morbihan)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Juliette (Morbihan)
programme.desc: Juliette has long been aware of the delicate beauty of nature. For years she spent her life on the sea, organising regattas for the traditional sailboats that are famous in the French region of Morbihan. Her appreciation for the elements made for a smooth transition as she decided to leave the water behind and return to the earth. Learning to shape a ball of clay into a graceful and elegant object, she discovered a passion for ceramics. Today, she lives from her creations and makes pieces that reflect their surroundings, the stunning Gulf of Morbihan.

programme.title: Anna (Brittany)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Anna (Brittany)
programme.desc: Anna’s unusual background provided inspiration for her life change. Her career began as a wolf trainer for cinema and it was during these years that she developed her deep love for animals. After being tired of seeing them used as props and constantly in cages, she decided to leave the world of show business behind and start an eco-friendly sheep and goat pasture. To further share her passion for these gentle animals, Anna has opened a conservatory farm where visitors can experience first-hand the joys of being close to nature. She also makes amazing goat cheese!

programme.title: Cristina (Spain)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Cristina (Spain)
programme.desc: At 31 years old, the last thing Cristina expected when she went to see the doctor about a blocked ear was to leave the consultation with a diagnosis for Breast Cancer. This young and passionate sociologist decided to apply the same philosophy to her treatment as she did when surfing: when a wave crashes down on you, get up and try again. Through her healing journey she deepened her love for the ocean and also discovered the therapeutic capabilities of yoga for cancer patients. Today she shares her practice through surf and yoga retreats and is specialised in oncological yoga, helping others heal.

programme.title: Idoia (Spain)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Idoia (Spain)
programme.desc: Idoia thrives on weaving together the sources of inspiration that surround her. Heavily influenced by the natural beauty of her home region of Galicia, Spain, she creates unique woven pieces from diverse and beautiful materials. Idoia’s pieces represent her vision of a modern woman, drawing from the traditions and experiences of those who perfected the craft before her and also pushing to innovate and adapt her creations for the modern world. Her recent collaboration with luxury fashion house Loewe is a dream come true for this modern artisan.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 1
programme.desc: With Bangladesh as a running thread, Yann Arthus-Bertrand meets several people who have changed their lives to dedicate themselves to a major project. In Bangladesh, Yves and Runa Marre have created the Friendship Foundation. Among other things, they’ve created a floating hospital installed on an old barge bought in France. Julie Andersen, an ex-advertising executive from New York has come to South Africa to defend sharks with her Shark Angels Foundation. In North India, Kartik Satyanarayan is helping to stop the dreadful exploitation of the lippus bears (dancing bears). He’s created Wildlife SOS, a preserve to rehabilitate the bears that have been rescued and to give work to the men of...

programme.title: USA: The end of oil - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - USA: The end of oil - Part 1
programme.desc: "The end of oil" is the amazing story of a raw material which has revolutionized mans life in just a century. But today, oil reserves are depleting. In his crazy race for always more production, Man didnt manage to preserve this precious energy that took million years for the Earth to give out. To tell the adventure of oil, Yann Arthus-Bertrand and his team went to the United States, the country which depends the most on black gold. At the start of the 21st century, it is now urgent to realize that oil resources are limited. Its today that we have to act and get organized, in order to prepare the new era to come. While all our economies are based on the petrol barrels price, well...

programme.title: A la carte grills
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - A la carte grills
programme.desc: If youre a nature enthusiast and a fan of outdoor cooking, the upcoming season is perfect for barbecue enthusiasts! Our journey will take us to Aube, nestled in the heart of the Brevonnes forest, and then to the Massif des Bauges, where grilling and snow create a unique combination. Afterward, well explore the Libournais region, where well uncover cooking techniques that make use of vine shoots, which are plentiful in the area. Just a short distance from the vineyards, well arrive at another corner of Gironde, the Blaye region, where the cooking method remains consistent but features a distinctly local ingredient: eel.

programme.title: Cryotherapy and Vinyasa Yoga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Cryotherapy and Vinyasa Yoga
programme.desc: Its in an episode full of surprise that we meet with Val Khal in the heart of Los Angeles for a visit to the new trendy wellbeing boutique Springs. This new concept store offers the opportunity to make Vinyasa yoga wearing a trendy outfit, treat yourself to a revitalizing juice detox before heading to a Cryotherapy session without leaving the venue! For a relaxing time after an intensive Vinyasa yoga session, Val takes you to a session of Fire cupping where the heath is ideal for getting rid of muscular pains from day-to-day stress.

programme.title: Acro Yoga on a Skyscraper
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Acro Yoga on a Skyscraper
programme.desc: Val takes us to Los Angeles, on the roof of one of the most prestigious hotels in Beverly Hills for a session of acro yoga, aerial acrobatic yoga. Then, in the heart of Downtown, Val will experience a glass slide down one of the tallest towers in California. Shell also try SandBox Fitness, the trendy indoor surfing class, before trying Lazerfit, a new way to work out that combines warm-up, stretching and laser tag.

programme.title: Cutting a tomato plant
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Cutting a tomato plant
programme.desc: We meet a in the market garden of Romainville to continue gardening together. Come on, lets see how they have grown.

programme.title: The Iris flower
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Origami - Season 1 - The Iris flower
programme.desc: Origami is about the art of paper folding, a Japanese and Chinese millenary tradition. In modern usage, the word “origami” is used as an inclusive term for all paper folding, regardless of their cultural origin. Different folding and sculpting techniques, new models, bright colors – you’ll see all of this in our program! We will teach you how to transform a flat square sheet of paper into a finished sculpture – from simple to complex!

programme.title: Everything is living and everything is linked - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 1 - Everything is living and everything is linked - Part 2
programme.desc: Through the most magnificent images and amazing human stories, Man is at the heart of the biodiversity that he must respect and preserve. We go to China in the province of Yunan, where a plant with exceptional virtues against malaria has been discovered. Then we travel to Africa, where mans intervention in the ecosystem of Lake Victoria has triggered a considerable imbalance. We will also explore to Greenland to meet the polar bears, the first victims of the melting ice.

programme.title: Sweets on the menu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Sweets on the menu
programme.desc: Today, Julie takes us down a different kind of yellow-brick road, one that tastes of childhood and gourmet delights: the road of sweets. France may be famous for its gastronomy, but its not to be outdone when it comes to pastries and confectionery - quite the opposite. “Betises” from Cambrai, "Berlingots” from Carpentras, "Calissons” from Aix-en-provence, every region in France has its own sweet or confectionery.

programme.title: Acrobatic Yoga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Acrobatic Yoga
programme.desc: In this episode, Val gets to know Jamie and her thirty gons whom mystical sounds invite to introspection and relaxation in a relaxing setting. She then attends a perilous acrobatic yoga class with Vibe Yoga where her sense of balance has been challenged a few times. Believe or leave! This is Bol Meditation’s motto where Val discovers the benefits of Intense meditation on our body and mind. All together, this place is a piece of heaven in the middle of ettic L.A.

programme.title: Chromo Yoga and Detox Juices with Mia Frye
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Chromo Yoga and Detox Juices with Mia Frye
programme.desc: Val will make us discover Chromo Yoga, which combines light and color therapy with yoga. Then well meet Mia Frye who will present us all the detox cures of the moment at Atelier Nubio. Finally, Val will test gluten-free gourmet waffles, both sweet and savory, the new trendy dessert for Parisian women.

programme.title: Melliferous plants
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Melliferous plants
programme.desc: Lets get together to continue discovering new plants together. Look at all these flowers, they are honey plants. But what are honey plants? Doesnt that make you think of another word? The word honey? Yes, because honey plants are plants that attract insects, and in particular bees, which feed on these flowers to make honey.

programme.title: Destination Sardinia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Blue Zones of Longevity - Season 1 - Destination Sardinia
programme.desc: The first stop on this journey to the land of happy, long life is the Ogliastra region of Sardinia. Here, almost one in five inhabitants is over 90 - 20 times more than in France! Yet this is a far cry from the Mediterranean diet recommended by nutritionists: meat and cholesterol galore. Even more astonishing, consanguinity is paradoxically conducive to the extreme longevity of the inhabitants... our wellness food specialist and a general practitioner will investigate these phenomena and meet nonagenarians and centenarians with exceptional stories.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #3 Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Freeride World Tour 2021 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: Two successful competitions went down in Ordino Arcalís, and now it’s Crunch Time for athletes striving to keep their campaigns on track in Fieberbrunn, Austria.

programme.title: Athlete Profile - Aurelien Routens
programme.desc: Aurelien Routens from France was vice world champion at the Freeride World Tour 2013 and has made a name for himself with his outstanding web series "Carpe Diem". In our 26-minute portrait, the 36-year-old talks about his life as a snowboard professional.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: WOF 2023 #44: World Rowing Beach Sprint Finals 2023
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge haben wir ein besonderes Format der World Rowing Tour. In Barletta, Italien, finden die Beach Sprint Finals von 2023 statt. Auf dem Mittelmeer kampfen die Athleten um den Titel des diesjahrigen Champions. Schauen wir mal rein!

programme.title: WOF 2024 #25: Profile – Jakob Schubert and Highline Wendestein
programme.desc: Today we dive into the world of alpine sports. In the first part of the show, we look at the greatest achievements of the austian climber Jakob Schubert. Afterwards we turn to a high-wire act by highliner Lukas Irmler, who faces a special challenge in his home mountains

programme.title: World Air Games 2015 - Part 1
programme.desc: The FAI World Air Games are the most important international multi-discipline air sports event in which the best athletes in the world take part. There will be 11 sports and 24 disciplines. More than 1000 athletes, crews and officials will take part.

programme.title: World Air Games 2015 - Part 2
programme.desc: The FAI World Air Games are the most important international multi-discipline air sports event in which the best athletes in the world take part. There will be 11 sports and 24 disciplines. More than 1000 athletes, crews and officials will take part.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Kite Park League World Championships – Hood River (USA) – Best Of

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 1
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 2
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 3
programme.desc: Even Exodia the Forbidden One was unable to defeat Zorc!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 4
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated!

programme.title: In the Name of the Pharaoh
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba’s combined strength couldn’t defeat Zorc!

programme.title: The Final Journey
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel... Atem!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 1
programme.desc: The time of destiny is now! Yugi vs. Atem!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 2
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 3
programme.desc: Not only does Atem still have all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn’t have a single monster on the field!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 4
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem – more than friends, closer than brothers.

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 4
programme.desc: The secret is out! The Pharaoh’s journey was more than a trip to the past – it’s the greatest Shadow Game ever created!

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 5
programme.desc: Zorc’s incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound!

programme.title: Name of the Game
programme.desc: Karim is the next to fall under the bandit Bakura’s assault, and the ravaging robber won’t stop until he conquers the rest!

programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 2
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 3

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 4
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem – more than friends, closer than brothers.

programme.title: The Heart of the Cards
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi’s Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: The Gauntlet Is Thrown
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa’s soul as his prize!

programme.title: Journey to the Duelist Kingdom
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister’s eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi’s deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Into The Hornets Nest
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they’ve ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he’s to survive!

programme.title: The Ultimate Great Moth
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil’s first wave of Duel Monsters, Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power every turn! Can Yugi find a way to destroy this winged beast before it destroys him?

programme.title: First Duel
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai’s secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Attack from the Deep
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Everythings Relative
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp’s crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba’s brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother’s company!

programme.title: Duel With a Ghoul
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba. But with his best cards resting at the bottom of the ocean, Yugi must discover a new strategy to survive fake Kaiba’s powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragon!

programme.title: Give up the Ghost
programme.desc: Yugi defeats Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: The Dueling Monkey
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends’ help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own. But as Rex Raptor’s relentless dinos destroys Joey’s best Duel Monsters, will Tristan’s card remind him that with his friends, he is never alone in battle?

programme.title: Trial by Red-Eyes
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: Red-Eyes B. Dragon! Joey must figure out the secret of Yugi’s gift, the Time Wizard card, without Yugi’s help or he’s taking the next boat out of Duelist Kingdom!

programme.title: Evil Spirit of the Ring
programme.desc: Yugi’s classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring’s dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves! Not only must Yugi battle to avoid becoming a permanent part of the card game, but also free Bakura’s soul from the Millennium Ring’s control!

programme.title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel
programme.desc: Pegasus’s hired duelist PaniK cheats Mai of all her Star Chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when PaniK’s Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?

programme.title: Winning Through Intimidation
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes PaniK: “I’ll finish you in three turns.” Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: The Scars of Defeat
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus! Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba’s Blue-Eyes White Dragon and Joey’s Red-Eyes B. Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: The Fate of Three Worlds
programme.desc: Once friends, now foes - Yuma and Shark face off in a battle where winning could mean losing everything!

programme.title: The Battle of Three Worlds
programme.desc: Winning comes with the ultimate price when Yuma realizes victory will cost more than just losing his friendship with Shark, it will mean losing Shark forever!

programme.title: The Future of Three Worlds
programme.desc: Expect the unexpected as the game-changing conclusion of Yuma’s duel against Shark flares to a frenzied finish!

programme.title: Last First Duel
programme.desc: Having gathered all one hundred Numbers, Astral is finally prepared to fulfill his mission – to destroy Barian World! But in order to see his mission through, Astral will have to destroy his friendship with Yuma first!

programme.title: Outclassed and Outmatched
programme.desc: The battle between Yuma and Astral rages on as the best of friends become the fiercest of foes!

programme.title: Forever ZEXAL
programme.desc: Feel the flow for the final time as Yuma and Astral high-five the sky in the cosmic conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL!

programme.title: Swing Into Action- Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya Sakaki aims to become an "Entertainment Duelist". He practices dueling every day alongside his childhood friend, Yuzu. One day, he receives a challenge for an exhibition match from the Pro Duelist, "Strong Ishijima". Although Yuya excitedly fends off his attacks in their Action Duel, hes eventually pushed into a corner.

programme.title: Swing Into Action- Part 2
programme.desc: With The Sledgehammer set to strike, Yuya uses Pendulum power to swing the duel his way! Can this phenomenal new summoning method help Yuya hammer the Hammer?

programme.title: Trade Bait - Part 1
programme.desc: It could be curtains for Yuya when a rival student cons him out of his Pendulum Cards!

programme.title: Trade Bait - Part 2
programme.desc: Still shocked by Sylvios Pendulum Summon, Yuya must find his focus if he wants to save his friends from a 100-story drop!

programme.title: Toying Around - Part 1
programme.desc: The new kid in town drives Yuya bananas when he begs Yuya to be his duel teacher! Unfortunately for Yuya, this blue-haired battler wont give up until Yuya gives in!

programme.title: Toying Around - Part 2
programme.desc: Yuyas getting schooled by his wannabe student, Sora! Can Yuya turn things around and teach Sora a lesson about winning, or is Yuyas Pendulum power not going to make the grade?

programme.title: Mr. Mystery
programme.desc: Still steaming from his loss to Yuya, Sylvio looks to get some payback! But when Zuzu steps in to stop his plans, a mysterious stranger comes out of the shadows to show her how its done!

programme.title: Bad Business
programme.desc: The Leo Institute is looking to take over Yuyas duel school, and theyre bringing 3 of their most dangerous duelists to take down whoever dares stand in their way!

programme.title: Dueling with the Stars
programme.desc: The battle to save Yuyas duel school goes galactic when Yuya faces off against Leo Institutes Dipper, an out-of-this-world duelist whose interstellar skills could have Yuya seeing stars!

programme.title: You Show Em
programme.desc: Its a gem of a duel when Zuzu faces a fierce Fusion Summoner whose jewel monsters are a cut above the rest! Can Zuzu and her Divas belt out a victory, or will the Leo Institutes diamond of a duelist force a final face-off?

programme.title: Going, Going, Gong
programme.desc: Its all up to Gong to save You Show from falling into the hands of the Leo Institute! Can Gong stare down defeat without moving his feet, or will a sword-swinging Syncro Summoner slice and dice his way to victory?

programme.title: Battle Under The Big Top
programme.desc: Its a battle under the big top, but no ones clowning around! Yuya duels Declan to determine the fate of Yuyas duel school!

programme.title: Circus Surprise
programme.desc: Declan has a surprise in store that could swing the duel his way! Can Yuya take down the best the Leo Institute has to offer, or will Declans deck prove to be unbeatable?

programme.title: The Show Must Go On
programme.desc: Yuyas down in the dumps, but Principal Boyles not having it! Looking to snap Yuya out of his funk, Skip challenges Yuya to a duel to prove that the show must go on!

programme.title: In It To Win It
programme.desc: Still stinging from her defeat against the Leo Institute, Zuzu turns to an unlikely source for some assistance - Sora! But before her training can commence, a familiar looking stranger shows up, putting her lesson on hold!

programme.title: Menu Venue - Part 1
programme.desc: To gain eligibility to join the Junior Youth Championship, Yuya has to win 4 official duels consecutively. He ends up dueling is Michio Mokota, a cuisine Duelist with high popularity among the housewives.

programme.title: Menu Venue - Part 2
programme.desc: Yuya faces a ferocious attack against Michio Mokotas Cooking Duel.

programme.title: Trapped in a Card
programme.desc: Its a case of mistaken identity when Yuya is eyed as the primary suspect for attacking Leo students! But when Yuya crosses paths with the real culprit, things go from bad to worse!

programme.title: Quiz Quagmire - Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya matches minds with the quiz whiz extraordinaire Pierre LSuperieure in a duel of wits! Can Yuya outsmart the smartest boy on Earth, or will Yuya end up scratching his head in defeat?

programme.title: Quiz Quagmire - Part 2
programme.desc: In the finale of the mind-bending match thats part-duel, part-quiz show - one wrong answer could mean curtains for Yuya! Can he outduel and outthink a trivia whiz whos never wrong?

programme.title: Beyond Belief
programme.desc: Duelists throughout the city are continuously being attacked, and everyone is on the search to find out the who, how and why!

programme.title: Beyond Belief
programme.desc: Duelists throughout the city are continuously being attacked, and everyone is on the search to find out the who, how and why!

programme.title: Sleight of Hands
programme.desc: Reiji manages to defeat Reira, continuing on to fight Leo. Elsewhere, Yuri absorbs Yugo and aims to defeat Yuya so that Zarc can be completed. Yusho stands in for his son to fight the depraved youth instead.

programme.title: A Fathers Finale
programme.desc: Yushos advanced Dueltaining manages to push Yuri into a corner and bring Yuya back to his old self. But Yuri is determined to complete Zarcs revival and has one nasty surprise in store for Yusho.

programme.title: Relentless
programme.desc: Seeing his father carded in front of his eyes, Yuyas rage reaches a boiling point as he accepts Yuris challenge. But not only does he have to contend with Yugo and Yuris dragons, but Zarcs ever growing influence over him.

programme.title: Time to Reunite!
programme.desc: The four dimensions start to fuse together as Yuya continues to struggle against Yuri. Forced to discard his trump card, things seem hopeless. Yuyas friends then arrive to encourage him to keep fighting no matter what.

programme.title: A Most Brutal Duel
programme.desc: Yuya absorbs all of his counterparts and reclaimed his true form as Supreme King Z-ARC. Starting to lay waste to the Fusion Dimension, Sora and Edo challenge Zarc to try and reach out to Yuyas spirit.

programme.title: A Dark Summoning
programme.desc: The four dimensions continue to unite as Zarc effortlessly crushes Sora and Edo. Kaito and Shun continue the fight against Zarc while people from Heartland and Neo Domino City start appearing in the Fusion Dimension.

programme.title: Master of Disaster
programme.desc: Gongenzaka and Jack fight against Zarc next, trying their best to reach out to Yuyas soul buried in Zarcs darkness. A revived Crow and Sawatari decide to join in when Zarcs Supreme King Dragons swarm the field.

programme.title: Clash Talk
programme.desc: Crow notices that Zarc is starting to lose his composure, leading him and Sawatari to up their game against Zarcs dragons. As dimensional integration is getting closer to completion, Reiji tries to convince his dad to stop Zarc.

programme.title: A Ray of Hope
programme.desc: Rays soul possesses Reira so she can battle against Zarc alongside Reiji. Zarc boasts that he is the creator of Pendulum Summon, but Ray is determined to stop him once and for all using the four natural energy cards.

programme.title: Swinging Back into Action
programme.desc: Things have seemingly returned to normal in the Pendulum Dimension, but Yuya gets the feeling that something is missing. Reiji has him duel against Tsukikage to restore his memories and make him finish the Lancers goal for good.

programme.title: Deja Duel
programme.desc: The battle royale continues. As Yuya keeps fighting, his memories start flooding back to him. Yuzus dad suddenly remembers too as the rest of the world slowly begins to remember the Lancers and the battle against Zarc.

programme.title: Amateur Hour
programme.desc: Reiji reveals that Zarc is still alive and Reira is barely holding back his malevolence. The world must be united and Yuya must purge Zarcs evil once and for all. Yuya is unsure. but Gongenzaka attempts to ignite his fighting spirit.

programme.title: Showtime Showdown
programme.desc: Yuya arrives in the Xyz Dimensions with Dennis as his next opponent. Threatening to turn the traumatized citizens of Heartland into cards again, Dennis forces Yuya into a duel against him and his Xyz/Fusion mix.

programme.title: Closure By Cards
programme.desc: Yuya arrives in the Fusion Dimension where he finds a distraught Shun. Like with Yuyas counterparts, Ruri and the others have not been resurrected following Rays revival. Yuya tries to calm Shun down only to end up the target of his fury.

programme.title: One Way Street to Defeat
programme.desc: Jack appears to taunt Yuya over his fear of using his counterparts dragons in fear of summoning Zarc. Unable to accomplish anything as is, Yuya challenges Jack to a duel while Reiji makes it so everyone can watch the battle.

programme.title: One Last Duel
programme.desc: Yuya finally listens to his other selves and summons all four of his dragons to defeat Jack. However, there is one final challenge before him in order to become a Dueltainer and purge Zarc: his rival and friend Reiji Akaba.

programme.title: Thats a Wrap!
programme.desc: The curtain is about to fall for the last time. The final battle between Yuya and Reiji rages on. Dragons face off against D/D/D as the whole world watches. What will be the final fate of Yuya, Yuzu, and all four dueling dimensions?

programme.title: The Heart of the Cards
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi’s Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: The Gauntlet Is Thrown
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa’s soul as his prize!

programme.title: Journey to the Duelist Kingdom
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister’s eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi’s deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Into The Hornets Nest
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they’ve ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he’s to survive!

programme.title: The Ultimate Great Moth
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil’s first wave of Duel Monsters, Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power every turn! Can Yugi find a way to destroy this winged beast before it destroys him?

programme.title: First Duel
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai’s secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Attack from the Deep
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Everythings Relative
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp’s crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba’s brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother’s company!

programme.title: Foolish Fans
programme.desc: The second day of WDC starts. More energetic than ever, Bronk and Caswell decide to battle the Asian Duel Champion, Quattro. According to these two, the gentleman Quattro has a respectable Duel aesthetic, which is also admired by many Duelists from their hearts. Witnessed by Yuma, Astral, Tori and Trey, the Battle Royal between Quattro, Bronk, and Caswell starts, but Quattro soon reveals his true side which remained hidden until now.

programme.title: Shark Bait
programme.desc: Shark is determined to have his revenge on Quattro, but Quattros younger brother Trey snares Shark with a Duel Anchor and allows Quattro to leave. Treys mission from Vetrix and Quinton is to give a "Number" to Shark, which he accomplishes. Shark is able to resist completely being controlled by the "Number" and defeats Trey.

programme.title: Bad Developments - Part 1
programme.desc: After Yuma laments over Shark dueling in revenge against Quattro, hes irritated by everything thats going on and ends up getting into a squabble with Tori. Meanwhile, elsewhere in the tournament, a photographer named Cameron has won Duel after Duel against Duelists with the help of terrifying ability of his that leaves them in terror. Camerons superpower is apparently a gift to be able to take photographs of the future. With Camerons "Future Photographs", his opponents entire strategy is laid bare before him, allowing him to relentlessly defeat Duelists.

programme.title: Bad Developments - Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma is having trouble in his Duel against Cameron, and the dangerous future of Tori encountering an accident is continuously approaching. Then, "Number 25: Force Focus", controlled by Cameron, finally shows up. Yuma cannot win without Summoning "Utopia", but according to the prophecy, Yuma will lose in this Duel for sure if he Summons it. Under this desperate circumstance, in order to grasp the future within his own hands, Yuma delivers a bold strategy!

programme.title: Double Jeopardy - Part 1
programme.desc: In order to prevent Flip from being disqualified from the WDC, Yuma Duels against Dextra and Nistro. Meanwhile, Astral faces against an old enemy inside Emperors Key.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy - Part 2
programme.desc: The Duel between Yuma against Dextra and Nistro continues. Due to their combination, Yuma is pushed into a corner, even after Summoning "Utopia" thanks to Astral. However due to the bonds between the two, a reversal occurs!

programme.title: Pets Peeved
programme.desc: Yumas Heart Pieces are stolen by Pip, and Cathy Duels to get them back.

programme.title: About Hart
programme.desc: To heal his little brother Harts illness, Kite rigorously continues hunting the "Number" cards. Seeing his older brother exhausted, Hart sneaks away from Heartland and into Heartland City, and by chance meets Yuma, Astral and Tori. Amazingly, Hart can see Astral, who in turn seems to know Harts name. Moved by Astrals wish, Yuma takes Hart to his home. After Hart escaped from the Heartland Tower, he is chased by Dextra and Nistro in a helicopter which results in them going to a tower in order to meet Kite. Soon after, a helicopter appears, in which Hart, Yuma and Tori think it is Nistro and Dextra, resulting in Hart using his Dark Energy. After Yuma calms Hart down with a piece of...

programme.title: Losing Hart
programme.desc: Hart is kidnapped by the Vetrix Family and so Kite and Yuma join forces. However when they find their hideout, theyre forced into a Tag Duel against Quattro and Trey.

programme.title: A Dubious Duo
programme.desc: The Tag Duel of Yuma and Kite against Quattro and Trey begins! Kite duels essentially on his own, even to the extent of hurting all of his opponents, including Yuma. However, Yuma on his part, defends himself and Kite from Trey and Quattros damaging combination. Furthermore, even with "Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon" being Summoned, it falls victim to Quattro and Treys trap.

programme.title: The Dragon Awakens
programme.desc: Due to the terror of Trey and Quattros strategy, Kite and Yuma are pushed into a corner. However at the edge of defeat, Harts feelings awaken a new power inside Kite. With it, he Summons the monster created by the powerful bonds between them, "Neo Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon".

programme.title: Rock and a Hard Place
programme.desc: Yuma finds himself in conflict about the "Number" cards, knowing that both Kite and Astral have their reasons for obtaining them. However upon learning that his father is still alive, Yuma tries to leave in search for him. Roku appears to help Yuma with his situation.

programme.title: Duel With a Ghoul
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba. But with his best cards resting at the bottom of the ocean, Yugi must discover a new strategy to survive fake Kaiba’s powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragon!

programme.title: Give up the Ghost
programme.desc: Yugi defeats Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: The Dueling Monkey
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends’ help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own. But as Rex Raptor’s relentless dinos destroys Joey’s best Duel Monsters, will Tristan’s card remind him that with his friends, he is never alone in battle?

programme.title: Trial by Red-Eyes
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: Red-Eyes B. Dragon! Joey must figure out the secret of Yugi’s gift, the Time Wizard card, without Yugi’s help or he’s taking the next boat out of Duelist Kingdom!

programme.title: Evil Spirit of the Ring
programme.desc: Yugi’s classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring’s dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves! Not only must Yugi battle to avoid becoming a permanent part of the card game, but also free Bakura’s soul from the Millennium Ring’s control!

programme.title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel
programme.desc: Pegasus’s hired duelist PaniK cheats Mai of all her Star Chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when PaniK’s Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?

programme.title: Winning Through Intimidation
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes PaniK: “I’ll finish you in three turns.” Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: The Scars of Defeat
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus! Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba’s Blue-Eyes White Dragon and Joey’s Red-Eyes B. Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Arena of Lost Souls, Part 1
programme.desc: The #1 American duelist Bandit Keith’s gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith’s zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave! Joey is all alone in the battle this time!

programme.title: Arena of Lost Souls, Part 2
programme.desc: Joey’s last ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith’s zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Double Trouble Duel, Part 1
programme.desc: Trapped in the labyrinth cave, Yugi and friends find an alternate exit, but the door is guarded by Pegasus’s Paradox Brothers. Yugi and Joey will no longer be battling solo; they band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers! The battle for all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus’s castle is on the line!

programme.title: Double Trouble Duel, Part 2
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey pool their strengths and manage to fend off their opponents’ monsters, but things are about to change as the Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Double Trouble Duel, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, Summoned Skull and Red-Eyes B. Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of Gate Guardian. Individually, our heroes have no chance, but they will unleash the greatest power of all: teamwork!

programme.title: Face Off, Part 1
programme.desc: Using the magic of the Millennium Eye, Pegasus traps Mokuba’s soul inside a card right before Kaiba’s eyes! In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Face Off, Part 2
programme.desc: Kaiba summons Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: The Power
programme.desc: Kalidas, a mafia kingpin, refuses to go ahead with a drug deal, so all hell breaks loose and an attempt is made on his life. However, the killing goes haywire, leading to the death of an innocent man that starts a blood feud.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E70 Jodha Akbar S3 E70
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Attack
programme.desc: A brave officer Arjun is shattered when his beloved dies in a terrorist attack and hes left paralysed. However, Arjun is chosen as the test case for a new AI-led technology that can turn him into a super soldier. Just then, a terrorist crisis erupts. Arjun rises to the occasion, but can he avert the disaster?

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E281 King of Hearts S1 E281
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E281 Second Chances S1 E281
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E75 Jodha Akbar S3 E75
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E281 This is Fate S1 E281
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E281 Undercover Love S1 E281
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E35 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E35
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.
